featureResponse.title: According to Spencer
featureResponse.shortSummary: A man discovers that he works at the same advertising agency as his lifelong crush and goes to ridiculous lengths to win her heart.
featureResponse.summary: Spencer has had a crush on Melora since elementary school, so when he discovers that they both work at the same advertising agency, he goes to ridiculous lengths to win her heart...despite the fact that she doesn't even remember him! This romantic comedy stars Jesse Bradford, Mia Kirshner, David Krumholtz, Adam Goldberg, Brad Rowe, Marissa Ribisi, Florence Stanley.

featureResponse.shortTitle: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle
featureResponse.title: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle
featureResponse.shortSummary: The madcap moose and his trusty squirrel sidekick head into the real world to thwart a devious plot in this live-action/animated comedy.
featureResponse.summary: The madcap moose and his trusty squirrel sidekick head into the real world to thwart a devious plot in this live-action/animated comedy. Rocky & Bullwinkle have been living off residual checks, but they jump back to active cartoon duty when their nefarious enemies--Boris, Natasha and their Fearless Leader--scheme to dumb down America even further with RBTV: Really Bad TV!

featureResponse.title: Agent Cody Banks 2: Destination London
featureResponse.shortSummary: Teen spy Cody Banks infiltrates an elite London boarding school to catch an evil scientist who has stolen a mind-control device.
featureResponse.summary: Teen spy Cody Banks poses as a music student to infiltrate an elite London boarding school to catch an evil scientist who has stolen a mind-control device.

featureResponse.title: Ali
featureResponse.shortSummary: Will Smith connects with a knock-out, Oscar(R)-nominated portrayal of Muhammad Ali in this biographical film about 'The Greatest.'
featureResponse.summary: Will Smith connects with a knock-out, Oscar(R)-nominated portrayal of Muhammad Ali in this stellar biographical film of 'The Greatest.' Set from 1964 to 1974, director Michael Mann's epic captures Ali in his prime--during his domination inside the ring and his personal religious struggles outside of it--against the backdrop of the tremendous unrest of the times.

featureResponse.title: Alice Telefilm Part 1: The First Day of the Rest of My Life
featureResponse.shortSummary: Part 1 of 2. Two years after her arrival in Sao Paulo, Alice begins to question her newfound stability and her future.
featureResponse.summary: Part 1 of 2. Two years after her arrival in Sao Paulo, Alice continues her relationship with Nicholas and has begun to look for a place where they can live together. But as she goes about the apartment search and shares in the loves and uncertainties of old and new friends, what she observes leaves her far less certain of her decisions and her future.

featureResponse.title: Alice Telefilm Part 2: The Last Night
featureResponse.shortSummary: Part 2 of 2. In the wake of an argument with Nicholas, Alice has a chance encounter that transforms into a deeply affecting event.
featureResponse.summary: Part 2 of 2. Alice's play is a moderate success, and her friends get ready to celebrate. But when Alice discovers Nicholas flirting with a young actress, a fight starts that ends with Alice getting lost by herself in the streets of Sao Paulo. There, Alice hears a phone ringing, and a chance impersonal encounter is transformed into an event that will deeply affect her life.

featureResponse.title: All the Pretty Horses
featureResponse.shortSummary: Matt Damon stars as John Grady Cole in this sprawling adaptation of Cormac McCarthy's beloved western novel.
featureResponse.summary: Matt Damon stars as John Grady Cole in this sprawling adaptation of Cormac McCarthy's beloved western novel. When Grady loses his Texas home in 1949, he heads south to Mexico with his best friend. But the romance of the untamed land pales beside the more forbidden romance he encounters with the daughter of a powerful landowner...a tryst that could land him in big trouble.

featureResponse.title: Alpha Dog
featureResponse.shortSummary: The sordid true story of a young L.A. drug dealer who kidnaps a junkie's little brother before taking things to a deadly new level.
featureResponse.summary: It was a tale of youth gone wild--and over the edge. Based on the sordid true story of a young L.A. drug dealer who murdered a teen in cold blood, this stylish crime drama chronicles the events that led up to the slaying. Ben Foster delivers a 'nervy, wonderfully far-out performance' ('The New York Times') in this riveting film.

featureResponse.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
featureResponse.shortSummary: Alvin! Simon! Theodore! The classic cartoon chipmunks are back in this tuneful holiday tale about their big break.
featureResponse.summary: Alvin! Simon! Theodore! The classic cartoon chipmunks are back in this tuneful holiday tale about their big break. It's the Christmas season, but down-and-out songwriter Dave Seville's greatest gift is his discovery of three talented chipmunks who can harmonize: wily leader Alvin, super-smart Simon and adorable Theodore.

featureResponse.title: Al Sur de la inocencia (To the South of Innocence)
featureResponse.shortSummary: Two upper-class stepsiblings embark on a journey of self-discovery when they take a trip to the south of the Dominican Republic.
featureResponse.summary: Two upper-class stepsiblings embark on a journey of self-discovery and freedom when they take a trip to the south of the Dominican Republic. Frank Perozo, Christian Alvarez and Sarah Jorge Leon star in this coming-of-age tale.

featureResponse.title: American Pie
featureResponse.shortSummary: Four horny high-school virgins set their sights on scoring for the first time in this comedy classic.
featureResponse.summary: Pale ale...band camp...warm apple pie...Stifler's mom--these are just a few of the unforgettable, undeniably twisted and utterly hilarious moments from this comedy classic about four horny high-school virgins who set their sights on scoring for the first time. Jason Biggs stars in this 1999 hit that the New York Post called, 'absolutely hilarious from beginning to end.'

featureResponse.title: American Pie 2
featureResponse.shortSummary: Hold the pastry--Jim and his sex-starved buddies head to a lakeside beach house for a raunchy summer of fun in this sequel.
featureResponse.summary: Hold the pastry--Jim and his sex-starved buddies are back in search of more laughs (and action, of course) in this riotous sequel. A year older and more experienced, the boys--Jim, Stifler, Oz, Kevin and Finch--head to a beautiful lakeside house for a raucous summer complete with sexy babes, booze, crazy glue, a visit from the exotic Nadia, and the return of Stifler's mom!

featureResponse.title: American Splendor
featureResponse.shortSummary: Droll, offbeat film about underground comic-book writer Harvey Pekar.
featureResponse.summary: The life of underground comic book writer Harvey Pekar is chronicled in this exceptionally droll film. Told through a collage of dramatic sequences, interviews with the real Pekar and his pals, and quirky animated sequences, this cinematic comic book follows Pekar's career, artistic and otherwise; his marriage; his 'cancer year'; and even his boisterous television appearances.

featureResponse.shortTitle: And Starring Pancho Villa as Himself
featureResponse.title: And Starring Pancho Villa as Himself
featureResponse.shortSummary: Antonio Banderas stars in this incredible true story of the real-life Mexican revolutionary who starred in Hollywood's first action epic.
featureResponse.summary: Lights...Camera...Revolution! Antonio Banderas stars in this incredible true story of the Mexican revolutionary who starred in Hollywood's first action epic. This HBO Films production explores the fine line between fact and fiction, revealing how Pancho Villa allowed a Hollywood crew to film him and his army as they battled the nationalist Huerta forces in 1914.

featureResponse.title: And the Band Played On
featureResponse.shortSummary: Matthew Modine is a young doctor who tracks a deadly epidemic halfway around the world in this medical thriller.
featureResponse.summary: A deadly epidemic is spreading around the world. But when it first began, no one paid attention. Matthew Modine stars in this medical thriller as a young doctor tracking the disease halfway around the world and across two continents--and whose work is thwarted at every turn by fear, official indifference and bitter medical rivalries.

featureResponse.title: Angel Rodriguez
featureResponse.shortSummary: An intimate drama about the complicated relationship between a social worker and the bright but troubled teenager she tries to help.
featureResponse.summary: From HBO Films comes this intimate drama about the complicated relationship between two very different people--a 30-something social worker (Rachel Griffiths of HBO's 'Six Feet Under') and the bright but troubled teenager (Jonan Everett) she tries to help--as they reach respective turning points in their lives.

featureResponse.title: AninA
featureResponse.shortSummary: A little girl whose name is a palindrome fights back against a bully, landing both of them with a strange punishment in this animated tale.
featureResponse.summary: Anina is a little girl whose name is a palindrome--and it's that very fact that gets her relentlessly teased. When she fights back against a bully, both kids are given a unique punishment: they are each given a black envelope that they cannot open for one week. Over the course of those seven days, both come to learn a bit about themselves in this animated tale.

featureResponse.title: Annabelle
featureResponse.shortSummary: The 'supremely creepy' (Hollywood Reporter) devil doll from 'The Conjuring' terrorizes a young couple in this scary prequel.
featureResponse.summary: The 'supremely creepy' (Hollywood Reporter) devil doll from 'The Conjuring' terrorizes a young couple in this scary prequel. Set in 1969, the film follows Mia and John (note the 'Rosemary's Baby' homage) whose innocent doll begins to show a sinister side in the wake of a horrific crime. Annabelle Wallis, Ward Horton and Alfre Woodard star.

featureResponse.title: Antwone Fisher
featureResponse.shortSummary: Denzel Washington directed this true story of a Navy man who learns to confront his anger with the help of a psychiatrist.
featureResponse.summary: Denzel Washington's directorial debut tells the true story of a hot-tempered Navy man who confronts his anger with the help of a psychiatrist. Derek Luke stars as Antwone Fisher, a black sailor whose history of physical violence lands him on the couch of a Navy shrink. But as the sessions progress, Antwone discovers that the source of his rage traces back to his childhood.

featureResponse.title: Appropriate Behavior
featureResponse.shortSummary: A rough break-up leaves a flighty bisexual Iranian-American woman searching for answers in this Brooklyn-set comedy.
featureResponse.summary: A rough break-up leaves a flighty bisexual Iranian-American woman searching for answers in this 'lively' (New York Times) Brooklyn-set comedy. Opening as she moves out of the apartment she shared with her now ex-lover Maxine, Shirin (writer/director Desiree Akhavan) begins a bumpy new course in her life...while revisiting the ups and downs of her time with Maxine.

featureResponse.title: As Above/So Below
featureResponse.shortSummary: The catacombs of Paris are the setting for this claustrophobic exercise in 'found footage' terror.
featureResponse.summary: The catacombs of Paris are the setting for this claustrophobic exercise in 'found footage' terror about an archaeology student and her team whose search for the legendary Philosopher's Stone takes them deep within the landmark tunnels. What they discover is not the substance of legend, but rather a terrifying portal into hell. Perdita Weeks, Ben Feldman and Edwin Hodge star.

featureResponse.title: As You Like It
featureResponse.shortSummary: Kenneth Branagh's exotic adaptation of Shakespeare's delightful stage comedy in which a courtship plays out in the Forest of Arden.
featureResponse.summary: All the world's a stage--and Kenneth Branagh captures it all in this exotic HBO Films adaptation of William Shakespeare's delightful comedy. Witty, playful and utterly magical, the film centers on the celebrated courtship between Rosalind and Orlando as it plays out against a backdrop of rivalry, banishment and exile in the Forest of Arden--all set in 19th-century Japan!

featureResponse.title: Autumn in New York
featureResponse.shortSummary: Richard Gere is a wealthy, womanizing New York chef who begins an unlikely love affair with sweet, but ailing Winona Ryder in this romance.
featureResponse.summary: He's a wealthy, womanizing New York chef. She's a sweet-natured hat designer with a rare and potentially fatal heart problem. Richard Gere and Winona Ryder are at the top of their game in this moving tale of their star-crossed romance.

featureResponse.title: The Avengers
featureResponse.shortSummary: Snappy adaptation of the British TV show with the Savile Row-suited Steed and sexy Peel taking on a weather-controlling villain.
featureResponse.summary: This high-tech, action-packed '90s adaptation of the '60s British TV show pits Savile Row-suited John Steed and sexy, catsuited Emma Peel against Sir August de Wynter, who wants to control the weather, using blizzards as blackmail! Can mod London be rescued from this meteorological maniac?

featureResponse.title: The Babe
featureResponse.shortSummary: Babe Ruth's amazing rise and equally precipitous fall in the game of baseball is chronicled in this drama starring John Goodman.
featureResponse.summary: George Herman 'Babe' Ruth left a legacy of being a great showman and one of the most prolific home-run hitters in baseball history. But he had a dark side as well. John Goodman stars as the Sultan of Swat in this biographical film that chronicles his amazing rise and equally precipitous fall in the game.

featureResponse.title: Baby's Day Out
featureResponse.shortSummary: Three klutzy kidnappers grab a wealthy couple's baby, only to have the toddler escape and lead them on a slapstick chase all over Chicago.
featureResponse.summary: When three klutzy kidnappers grab a wealthy couple's baby, they think the $5 million ransom is a sure thing. Wrong! The nine-month-old escapes, and leads the trio on a slapstick chase around Chicago, getting into one dangerous situation after another that always end badly for the bad guys.

featureResponse.title: Bad Santa
featureResponse.shortSummary: Billy Bob Thornton is a drunken wreck of a mall Santa who plots yuletide robberies with his Elf partner.
featureResponse.summary: Santa Claus is coming to town...and he is hammered! Billy Bob Thornton delivers one of his most memorable performances as a drunken wreck of a mall Santa who plots yuletide robberies with his Elf partner--until he meets a nerdy kid who makes him question his embittered ways. Co-starring Tony Cox, Lauren Graham, Brett Kelly, Lauren Tom with John Ritter and Bernie Mac.

featureResponse.title: The Banger Sisters
featureResponse.shortSummary: Goldie Hawn and Susan Sarandon play former rock groupies who reunite decades later in this free-spirited comedy-drama.
featureResponse.summary: In their heyday, Vinnie and Suzette were inseparable groupies sleeping their way through the rock-'n'-roll elite (and not so elite). More than twenty years later, Vinnie has hidden away her past and become a respectable member of society--until the still wild Suzette loses her job, she picks up a squirrelly hitchhiker and heads for a reunion with her old pal in this comedy.

featureResponse.title: Barbershop
featureResponse.shortSummary: An eventful day in the life of a barbershop on Chicago's south side is the setting for this hit comedy..
featureResponse.summary: An eventful day in the life of a barbershop on Chicago's south side is the setting for this "warm, generous" (New York Times) hit comedy. Ice Cube stars as a would-be entrepreneur who inherits his family's barbershop and sells it to a loan shark, but tries to get it back after realizing how important it is to the community.

featureResponse.title: Barbershop 2: Back in Business
featureResponse.shortSummary: A neighborhood barbershop is threatened by a greedy developer who opens a flashy, upscale salon right across the street!
featureResponse.summary: In this "richer, smarter, funnier sequel" (LA Weekly), neighborhood barbershop proprietor Ice Cube finds his friendly mom-and-pop business threatened by a greedy developer who opens a flashy, upscale salon right across the street!

featureResponse.shortTitle: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns: Pt. 1
featureResponse.title: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns: Part 1
featureResponse.shortSummary: An aging Batman must come out of retirement to battle a newly released Two Face and a Gotham gang known as the Mutants.
featureResponse.summary: An aging Batman must come out of retirement to battle a newly released Two Face and a Gotham gang known as the Mutants in Part 1 of this animated action film. Starring the voice talents of Peter Weller, Ariel Winter, David Selby and Wade Williams.

featureResponse.shortTitle: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns: Pt. 2
featureResponse.title: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns: Part 2
featureResponse.shortSummary: The government is out to stop Batman's vigilante tactics--with Superman's help.
featureResponse.summary: With the government out to stop Batman and his vigilante tactics, the Joker enacts the ultimate evil plot to stop him forever. The result is a battle between the Dark Knight and the one-and-only Superman! Starring the voice talents of Peter Weller, Ariel Winter, Michael Emerson, David Selby, Mark Valley.

featureResponse.title: Batman: Under the Red Hood
featureResponse.shortSummary: Batman faces off against a villain--the Red Hood--with a shocking connection to his past.
featureResponse.summary: Batman's latest conflict with the Joker introduces a new villain--the Red Hood--whose crimes include a strange mix of drug trafficking and vigilantism...and who has a shocking connection to Batman's past. Starring the voice talents of Bruce Greenwood, Jensen Ackles, John DiMaggio, Neil Patrick Harris, Jason Isaacs, Wade Williams.

featureResponse.title: Batman: Year One
featureResponse.shortSummary: See how Bruce Wayne first donned his Bat-suit in this animated origins tale.
featureResponse.summary: See how Bruce Wayne first donned his Bat-suit in this animated origins tale! With crime rampaging out of control in Gotham City, Wayne adopts his vigilante alter-ego to stop it. With the voices of Bryan Cranston, Ben McKenzie, Eliza Dushku, Alex Rocco, Katee Sackhoff.

featureResponse.title: Beauty Shop
featureResponse.shortSummary: A sassy hair stylist quits her job at a posh salon in Atlanta and opens up a shop of her own to compete with her egotistical ex-boss.
featureResponse.summary: Queen Latifah is a sassy hair stylist who quits her job at a posh salon in Atlanta and opens up a shop of her own to compete with her egotistical ex-boss.

featureResponse.title: Beerfest
featureResponse.shortSummary: Munich's notorious Oktoberfest is the setting for a drinking competition that is invaded by two beer-swilling brothers and their pals.
featureResponse.summary: Broken Lizard--the comedy troupe behind 'Super Troopers'--returns to knock back a few pints in this intoxicatingly funny comedy set at Munich's Oktoberfest. A year after getting smoked at an underground drinking competition, two beer-swilling brothers and their pals return for revenge. Can their sharpened skills in Beer Pong and Quarters help them to emerge victorious?

featureResponse.title: Bee Movie
featureResponse.shortSummary: An unsatisfied bumblebee leaves the hive behind for a jaunt in the big bad human world in this animated comedy.
featureResponse.summary: An unsatisfied bumblebee leaves the hive behind for a jaunt in the big bad human world in this animated comedy. Jerry Seinfeld provides the voice of Barry B. Benson, a bee who finds himself discontented with a life of honey-making. Sneaking out with a swarm, Barry discovers an amazing new world--until he learns about man's consumption of honey and decides to fight back.

featureResponse.title: Behind the Candelabra
featureResponse.shortSummary: Michael Douglas and Matt Damon star in this film that recounts show-biz icon Liberace's tempestuous relationship with a young lover.
featureResponse.summary: Show-biz icon Liberace's tempestuous relationship with a young lover is recounted in this HBO Films production. Oscar(R) winners Michael Douglas and Matt Damon star as the entertainer and his partner Scott Thorson who lived in Liberace's opulent Las Vegas mansion from 1977 to 1982--a time when Liberace was at the height of his popularity, but remained closeted as a homosexual.

featureResponse.title: Bessie
featureResponse.shortSummary: Queen Latifah stars as Bessie Smith in this vivid portrait of the legendary 20th century blues singer.
featureResponse.summary: She was the 'Empress of the Blues,' an immense talent whose love for music took her from anonymity to international fame in the 1920s blues scene. Queen Latifah stars as legendary blues singer Bessie Smith in this vivid portrait of a tenacious spirit who, despite her own demons, went on to become one of the most successful and influential musical artists of the 20th century.

featureResponse.shortTitle: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
featureResponse.title: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
featureResponse.shortSummary: It's fun all the way when good-ol'- boy sheriff Burt Reynolds tries to save Dolly Parton's Texas bordello in this musical romp.
featureResponse.summary: High-spirited entertainment! It’s fun all the way when a good-ol’- boy sheriff tries to save the Chicken Ranch bordello, a Texas institution. Burt Reynolds plays the lawman, and Dolly Parton the charming Miss Mona in this rambunctious musical romp based on the Broadway hit. With Charles Durning in an Oscar(R)-nominated performance.

featureResponse.title: Bicentennial Man
featureResponse.shortSummary: An android domestic servant yearns to become human over the course of its 200-year life.
featureResponse.summary: In this "smart, funny and touching" (ABC-TV) sci-fi allegory starring Robin Williams, a family purchases an android to be a domestic servant. But they discover that the robot is able feel emotions and have original thoughts, and it tries to become human over the course of its 200-year life.

featureResponse.title: Big Fat Liar
featureResponse.shortSummary: A teen and his best friend take a cross country trip to get revenge on a Hollywood big shot who stole his idea for a hit movie.
featureResponse.summary: A teen and his best friend take a cross country trip to get revenge on a Hollywood big shot who stole his idea for a hit movie. Frankie Muniz, Paul Giamatti, Amanda Bynes.

featureResponse.title: The Birdcage
featureResponse.shortSummary: A gay couple have to play it straight when their son announces that he's going to marry the daughter of a conservative U.S. senator.
featureResponse.summary: Robin Williams and Nathan Lane play an openly gay couple who have to play it straight when their son announces that he's going to marry the daughter of an ultra-conservative U.S. senator.

featureResponse.title: Black Card
featureResponse.shortSummary: An African American couple finds out how far their boundaries can be pushed in a culture requiring an ID card and commitment to the code.
featureResponse.summary: An African American couple finds out how far their boundaries can be pushed in a culture requiring an ID card and commitment to the code. Dorian Missick, Simone Missick, Hisham Tawfiq and Stephen Hill star in this short film.

featureResponse.title: Bless the Child
featureResponse.shortSummary: Kim Basinger tries to save a little girl who stands at the center of a battle between good and evil in this supernatural thriller.
featureResponse.summary: A special six-year-old girl stands at the center of a battle between good and evil in this supernatural thriller. When the child is abducted by her birth mother, her guardian Kim Basinger desperately tries to find the girl with help from a detective who fears she could become the latest in a string of occult-related kidnappings. Jimmy Smits and Rufus Sewell co-star.

featureResponse.title: Blood and Wine
featureResponse.shortSummary: Jack Nicholson stars as a wine dealer whose theft of a valuable necklace with a two-bit thief unravels when his stepson gets involved.
featureResponse.summary: Greed, sex and betrayal heat up the Florida Keys in this film noir thriller. Jack Nicholson stars as a wine dealer who hungers for the easy life of his wealthy customers. Teaming up with a two-bit thief, he plans the theft of a valuable necklace. But when his stepson stumbles onto the plot, things start to go very, very wrong. With Stephen Dorff and Jennifer Lopez.

featureResponse.title: Bomba (The Bomb)
featureResponse.shortSummary: A cab driver and his passenger become prisoners of each other when they discover that the taxi is a car bomb..
featureResponse.summary: A teenager climbs into a taxi and discover that it's a car bomb. From that moment, the driver and his passenger become prisoners of each other.

featureResponse.title: The Book of Life
featureResponse.shortSummary: A bullfighter and a soldier embark on an epic quest to win the hand of a free-spirited young woman in this animated fable.
featureResponse.summary: Visually striking animated fable centering on a bullfighter and a soldier who embark on an epic quest to win the hand of a free-spirited young woman.

featureResponse.title: Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit/Kazakhstan
featureResponse.shortSummary: A TV journalist from Kazakhstan hits the U.S. in this hilarious comedy based on the character from HBO's 'Da Ali G Show.'
featureResponse.summary: Borat comes to America...and America may never be the same. Sacha Baron Cohen stars as his 'Da Ali G Show' character Borat Sagdiyev, a TV journalist from Kazakhstan. Dispatched to America along with his hefty producer, Borat leaves his village behind and attempts to observe life as only he can. From state to state, Borat proves his amazing ability to offend everyone he meets.

featureResponse.title: The Boss: HBO First Look
featureResponse.shortSummary: Behind the scenes of this comedy starring Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell, Peter Dinklage and Kathy Bates.
featureResponse.summary: Behind the scenes of this comedy starring Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell, Peter Dinklage and Kathy Bates.

featureResponse.title: Breach
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young FBI worker goes to work for a veteran agent and finds himself unraveling the worst security breach in U.S. history.
featureResponse.summary: FBI agent Robert Hanssen was a devoted man of God and family. But he had a dark side: selling top-secret information to the Russians. Based on the shocking true events of 2001, this absorbing drama chronicles a two-month period in which a young FBI worker went to work for Hanssen--and found himself unraveling the worst security breach in U.S. history.

featureResponse.title: Brewster's Millions
featureResponse.shortSummary: Richard Pryor must spend $30 million in 30 days in order to inherit $300 million in this free-spending comedy.
featureResponse.summary: This is no curveball--if Richard Pryor can spend $30 million in 30 days, he'll inherit $300 million. The bases are loaded with major league laughs as minor league pitcher Pryor hustles to unload the loot, with some help from buddy John Candy. Is there love on deck, too, with the gorgeous accountant (Lonette McKee) who is keeping tabs on Brewster's bucks?

featureResponse.title: Brokeback Mountain
featureResponse.shortSummary: Oscar(R)-winning director Ang Lee's heart-wrenching drama that chronicles the forbidden love shared by two cowboys working in 1963 Wyoming.
featureResponse.summary: Oscar(R)-winning director Ang Lee's heart-wrenching drama about the forbidden love shared by two cowboys. Oscar(R)-nominees Heath Ledger (Best Actor) and Jake Gyllenhaal (Best Supporting Actor) portray the men who meet while herding sheep on a lonely mountain in 1963 Wyoming. What begins as a friendship explodes into a physical and emotional affair that refuses to be denied.

featureResponse.title: The Brothers
featureResponse.shortSummary: Four young African American men who have been friends since childhood find solace in each other as they work through female troubles.
featureResponse.summary: Four young African American men who have been friends since childhood find solace in each other's companionship--and frank conversation--as they work through various kinds of female trouble in this drama. Derrick and Sheila's marriage is on the rocks...but that's standard compared to Jackson's problem: his girlfriend used to date his dad!

featureResponse.shortTitle: Bury My Heart at Wounded Knee
featureResponse.title: Bury My Heart at Wounded Knee
featureResponse.shortSummary: Epic 'HBO Films' adaptation of Dee Brown's book about the subjugation and cultural extermination of the Sioux tribe in the 19th century.
featureResponse.summary: Beginning just after the bloody Sioux victory over General Custer at Little Big Horn, this epic 'HBO Films' adaptation of Dee Alexander Brown's nonfiction masterpiece intertwines the unique perspectives of three characters--Charles Eastman, Sitting Bull and Senator Henry Dawes--while detailing the sprawl into the American West that tragically affected American Indian culture.

featureResponse.title: The Butterfly Effect 2
featureResponse.shortSummary: After his girlfriend is killed, a guy discovers that he has the power to go back in time and save her, but faces unexpected consequences.
featureResponse.summary: After his girlfriend is killed in a tragic accident, a guy discovers that he has the power to go back in time and save her. But he soon learns that you can't change your past without creating unexpected consequences for your future.

featureResponse.title: Cabin Fever
featureResponse.shortSummary: Five college youths on vacation encounter a fast-acting flesh-eating virus that leads to ghastly results in this horror film.
featureResponse.summary: It will make your skin crawl...literally! An idyllic vacation to the mountains takes a horrifying turn for five college youths who come into contact with a flesh-eating disease. The kids are there to party, but the fast-acting virus leaves them roaming the woods in search of help...while their flesh rots away before their very eyes.

featureResponse.title: Calvary
featureResponse.shortSummary: A priest (Brendan Gleeson) in a small Irish village is given a death threat by an unseen parishioner during confession in this potent film.
featureResponse.summary: Brendan Gleeson delivers a towering performance in this 'immensely powerful' (Hollywood Reporter) film about a priest in a small Irish village who hears a particularly disturbing confession--one in which an unseen parishioner vows to murder the priest in a week.

featureResponse.title: Camp Nowhere
featureResponse.shortSummary: A group of smart and spunky young misfits create a secret summer camp that contains all the fun without the rules!
featureResponse.summary: The kids are all right, but the adults are downright wacky in this spirited family adventure. Tired of boring summer camp, a group of smart and spunky young misfits create a secret camp that contains all the fun...without all the rules! Starring Christopher Lloyd, Jonathan Jackson, Wendy Makkena and M. Emmet Walsh.

featureResponse.title: Capturing Mary
featureResponse.shortSummary: The young concierge of a spooky London mansion entertains an elderly visitor in this follow-up film to 'Joe's Palace.'
featureResponse.summary: The young concierge of a spooky London mansion returns in this follow-up film to 'Joe's Palace.' When an elderly woman named Mary Gilbert (Maggie Smith) shows up looking for answers to events set in motion by her past experiences at the old house, Joe decides to let her in--and is taken on a journey through the house and the secrets that it holds.

featureResponse.title: Carmina y amen (Carmina and Amen)
featureResponse.shortSummary: A foul-mouthed matriarch from a working-class section of Seville hides the fact that her husband has died.
featureResponse.summary: A foul-mouthed matriarch from a working-class section of Seville hides the fact that her husband has died in order to receive his bonus paycheck.

featureResponse.title: Casper
featureResponse.shortSummary: Everyone's favorite friendly ghost scares up some family fun in this live-action film based on the beloved cartoon.
featureResponse.summary: Everyone's favorite friendly ghost scares up some family fun in this live-action film based on the beloved cartoon. A snooty heiress goes after the untapped fortunes of Whipstaff Manor, only to find ghastly ghouls safeguarding the joint! Enter a shrink hired to quickly expel the specters...until his daughter encounters a kindhearted young ghost named Casper.

featureResponse.title: Catacombs
featureResponse.shortSummary: The vast catacombs of Paris become the hunting grounds of a maniac in this claustrophobic exercise in terror.
featureResponse.summary: The vast catacombs of Paris become the hunting grounds of a maniac in this claustrophobic exercise in terror. When two sisters join a wild rave in the tunnels, they soon realize the madman wants to add them to the millions of France's dead that lie there. Starring Shannyn Sossamon and Alecia Moore (singer Pink).

featureResponse.title: Charlotte's Web
featureResponse.shortSummary: A barnyard spider saves an appealing pig from ending up as a slab of bacon in this animated musical version of E.B. White's classic story.
featureResponse.summary: A barnyard spider saves an appealing pig from ending up as a slab of bacon in this animated musical version of E.B. White's classic story of love and friendship. Debbie Reynolds is the voice of the kindly spider, Charlotte with additional voices by Paul Lynde, Henry Gibson and Agnes Moorehead. The songs are by Robert and Richard Sherman ('Mary Poppins').

featureResponse.title: Cheech & Chong's Next Movie
featureResponse.shortSummary: The follow-up to the Cheech & Chong classic 'Up in Smoke' finds the joint-toking duo on another hilarious series of adventures.
featureResponse.summary: The follow-up to the Cheech & Chong classic 'Up in Smoke' finds the joint-toking duo on another hilarious series of adventures--this time involving an angry neighbor, sexy ladies, a cool Ferrari, aliens, Pee-wee Herman and, of course, massive amounts of buds!

featureResponse.title: Cinema Verite
featureResponse.shortSummary: The fact-based story of a Santa Barbara family who were catapulted to notoriety in the early 1970s in a groundbreaking PBS series.
featureResponse.summary: Decades before we had reality television, there was the Loud family. From HBO Films comes the story of the groundbreaking PBS documentary 'An American Family' which chronicled the lives of the Loud family in the early 1970s. The cameras put the Louds in the national spotlight as parents Pat and Bill grappled with their marriage while raising their children.

featureResponse.title: Circus
featureResponse.shortSummary: A glamorous con-artist couple take on one last job that will allow them to retire in this British crime caper.
featureResponse.summary: John Hannah and Famke Janssen star in this British crime caper as a glamorous con-artist couple who decide to take on one last job that will allow them to retire. But nothing is as easy as it sounds, and the required murder is only the beginning of a path filled with twists and double-crosses.

featureResponse.title: Citizen X
featureResponse.shortSummary: A Russian police detective faces almost insurmountable odds in his search for the most savage serial killer of modern times.
featureResponse.summary: A Russian detective faces insurmountable odds in his search for the most savage serial killer of modern times in this taut thriller based on a true story. Andre Chikatilo viciously murdered 52 women and children--while the government denied that a serial killer existed. But one man became obsessed with the killer and defied the official silence in order to track him down.

featureResponse.title: Ciudad delirio
featureResponse.shortSummary: A shy Spanish doctor pursues an unlikely romance with a beautiful Salsa school owner as they prepare for the famous Delirio Salsa show.
featureResponse.summary: A shy Spanish doctor pursues an unlikely romance with a beautiful Salsa school owner as they prepare for the famous Delirio Salsa show. Starring Carolina Ramirez, Julian Villagran, Jorge Herrera, John Alex Castillo, Ingrid Rubio, Margarita Ortega and Vicky Hernandez.

featureResponse.title: Classical Baby (I'm Grown Up Now): The Poetry Show
featureResponse.shortSummary: This HBO Family special presents the world's greatest works of poetry--from Shakespeare to Frost--in a way that children can appreciate.
featureResponse.summary: Poems about love...birds...roses...weather. This HBO Family special presents the world's greatest works of poetry in a way that children can appreciate. From Shakespeare to Frost, the legendary lines are presented via whimsical animation and lovingly read by performers including Andy Garcia, John Lithgow, Susan Sarandon, Jeffrey Wright, and others.

featureResponse.title: Clear History
featureResponse.shortSummary: Larry David is a disgraced former exec whose past humiliation threatens to disrupt his new life in this HBO Films comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Larry David stars in this HBO Films comedy as Nathan Flomm, a marketing executive at a start-up company who loses a fortune after a petty argument with his boss (Jon Hamm). The company then makes billions, leaving Nathan publicly humiliated. But even after changing his identity and moving to a small island off the Massachusetts coast, his past threatens to disrupt his new life.

featureResponse.title: Cloak & Dagger
featureResponse.shortSummary: An 11-year-old computer whiz calls on an imaginary hero to help him retrieve vital coded documents in a very real espionage plot.
featureResponse.summary: A whiz at computer games, 11-year-old Davey Osborne also has a very lively imagination. Stumbling upon a real espionage plot, he calls on an imaginary hero to help him retrieve vital coded documents from the enemy. Henry Thomas ('E.T.') is the adventurous youngster in this fantasy thriller. Dabney Coleman plays both the boy's doubtful father and the make-believe superspy.

featureResponse.title: Club Paradise
featureResponse.shortSummary: Normalcy takes a holiday when Robin Williams tries to transform a seedy Caribbean resort into a tropical paradise.
featureResponse.summary: Normalcy takes a holiday when Robin Williams opens up a Caribbean resort! All comedy heck breaks loose as Williams and reggae star Jimmy Cliff try to turn a seedy hotel into a tropical Eden. The plumbing's a joke, guests vanish without a trace and the locals are plotting an uprising. And then things start to get really wild!

featureResponse.title: Cold Mountain
featureResponse.shortSummary: A Civil War deserter (Jude Law) undertakes an arduous journey to return to the woman he loves (Nicole Kidman) in this searing drama.
featureResponse.summary: A Confederate deserter (Jude Law) undertakes an arduous journey to return to the woman he loves in this Civil War drama. Nicole Kidman co-stars as the young woman who struggles to run her family farm while clinging to the hope of her beloved's return. Renee Zellweger won the Best Supporting Actress Oscar(R) for her performance as a plucky farmhand who comes to Kidman's aid.

featureResponse.title: Collision Course
featureResponse.shortSummary: Cultures clash when Detroit cop Jay Leno teams up with Japanese detective Pat Morita to find a killer in this fast-paced crime-drama.
featureResponse.summary: Detroit cop Jay Leno teams up with Japanese detective Pat Morita to find a killer in this fast-paced crime-drama. Cultures clash and cars crash as the mismatched duo turn the Motor City upside-down in search of the suspects.

featureResponse.title: Completo
featureResponse.shortSummary: Tired of his employee giving free milk to the girl he likes, Lizardo offers Completo a reward so he can ask her out on a date,
featureResponse.summary: Tired of his employee giving free milk to the girl he likes, Lizardo offers Completo a reward so he can ask her out on a date, but first Completo must make their most difficult customer pay what he owes.

featureResponse.shortTitle: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
featureResponse.title: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
featureResponse.shortSummary: New teen in town Lindsay Lohan tries to land the lead role in the school play while scheming to see her favorite band's farewell concert.
featureResponse.summary: New teen in town Lindsay Lohan battles the resident 'mean girl' over the starring role in the school play while plotting a way to see her favorite band's farewell concert in this comedy. Adam Garcia, Glenne Headly, Alison Pill and Carol Kane co-star.

featureResponse.title: Confirmation
featureResponse.shortSummary: Kerry Washington and Wendell Pierce star in this riveting film about the explosive 1991 Clarence Thomas Supreme Court nomination hearings.
featureResponse.summary: Kerry Washington, Wendell Pierce and Greg Kinnear lead a stellar cast in this HBO Films production that pulls back the curtain on the explosive 1991 Supreme Court nomination hearings of Clarence Thomas--a man whose nomination came under fire when a former employee, Anita Hill, accused him of sexual harassment.

featureResponse.title: Conspiracy
featureResponse.shortSummary: Kenneth Branagh and Stanley Tucci star in this story of the top-secret Nazi meeting to debate the merits of Hitler's 'Final Solution.'
featureResponse.summary: They came to Wannsee as high-ranking leaders of Germany's World War II effort. Two hours later, they left as co-conspirators in the murder of millions of Jews. This is the story of the top-secret Nazi meeting in which fifteen men debated--and ultimately agreed upon--the merits of Hitler's 'Final Solution,' the extermination of the entire Jewish population of Europe.

featureResponse.title: Coraline
featureResponse.shortSummary: A secret doorway leads a little girl into a fantastic alternate world that is both dazzling and dangerous in this animated tale.
featureResponse.summary: A secret doorway leads a little girl into a fantastic alternate world that is both dazzling and dangerous in this animated tale. Coraline is a quirky 11-year-old who may as well be invisible to her parents. But once she's led through the magical passageway, she enters an idealized version of her house, where everyone is sparkling and attentive...but with buttons for eyes.

featureResponse.title: The Corruptor
featureResponse.shortSummary: Chow Yun-Fat and Mark Wahlberg cops dealing with corruption, deception and violence in the powder-keg that is New York City's Chinatown.
featureResponse.summary: In a place where everyone is on the take, it's up to two polar opposite NYPD cops to find common ground in this riveting action-thriller. Chow Yun-Fat and Mark Wahlberg star as the unlikely partners--both of whom are hiding dirty secrets--dealing with corruption, deception and violence in the powder-keg that is New York City's Chinatown.

featureResponse.title: Cronica del fin del mundo (Chronicle of the End of the World)
featureResponse.shortSummary: Drama and comedy are blended in this Colombian film centering on a retired teacher who fears that the world is coming to an end.
featureResponse.summary: Drama and comedy are blended in this Colombian film centering on a retired teacher who fears that the world is coming to an end, and his jobless son, whose wife has abandoned him after having a baby.

featureResponse.title: Cry Freedom
featureResponse.shortSummary: Denzel Washington stars as black South African activist Stephen Biko, who was murdered by his country's security police in 1977.
featureResponse.summary: The shattering true drama of one man's quest for freedom--for himself and his country. Denzel Washington stars as black South African activist Stephen Biko, who was murdered by his country's security police in 1977. Kevin Kline plays his friend, white newspaper editor Donald Woods, who risked his life to escape his native land and tell Biko's story to the world.

featureResponse.title: Cry-Baby
featureResponse.shortSummary: Baltimore at the dawn of rock-'n'-roll is the setting for this musical satire about a good girl who falls for a leather-jacketed bad guy.
featureResponse.summary: Baltimore at the dawn of rock-'n'-roll is the setting for John Waters's slick musical satire about a good girl who falls for a leather-jacketed bad guy. Johnny Depp stars as the juvenile delinquent who was left scarred by tragedy; Amy Locane is the beautiful blonde who wins his heart. Can their love survive the culture clash of the times?

featureResponse.title: The Cup
featureResponse.shortSummary: A horse-racing jockey must overcome great odds and the loss of his brother to compete in the Melbourne Cup in this fact-based story.
featureResponse.summary: From one of horse racing's most inspiring stories comes this dramatic retelling of the 2002 Melbourne Cup. Brothers Damien and Jason Oliver come from a family steeped in racing tradition...and tragedy. When Jason suffers catastrophic injuries from a fall one week before the Cup, Damien must decide if he has the strength he'll need to compete without his beloved brother.

featureResponse.title: The Cure
featureResponse.shortSummary: Two best friends run off together to find a treatment for AIDS in this drama.
featureResponse.summary: Sternly warned to stay away from the boy next door, new kid Erik defies his mother and befriends Dexter, his HIV-positive preteen neighbor. A sincere friendship is formed as the boys develop make-believe cures for Dexter, but when they learn of a Louisiana doctor who might have the real deal, they launch a raft trip South to potentially save Dexter's life.

featureResponse.shortTitle: The Curse of the Jade Scorpion
featureResponse.title: The Curse of the Jade Scorpion
featureResponse.shortSummary: Woody Allen directed and stars in this period comedy about an insurance investigator who gets into trouble, thanks to a devious hypnotist.
featureResponse.summary: Woody Allen heads back to 1940 in this comedy about C.W. Briggs, a lousy insurance investigator who constantly exchanges barbs with co-worker Betty Ann Fitzgerald. As fate would have it, the pair attend a show by a devious hypnotist who uses his talents to lull them into an unlikely affair...while also turning C.W. into a nocturnal jewel thief!

featureResponse.title: Dark Floors
featureResponse.shortSummary: A mental hospital turns into an unescapable house of horrors for a man and his autistic daughter in this chilling film.
featureResponse.summary: A mental hospital turns into an unescapable house of horrors for a man and his autistic daughter in this chilling film. Joined by four others in the nightmarish place, the group desperately searches for a way out while being tormented by ghosts, demons and other supernatural terrors.

featureResponse.title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
featureResponse.shortSummary: A sad-sack fish-tank cleaner decides to give the world's oldest profession a try and become a gigolo to earn some quick cash.
featureResponse.summary: Sad-sack fish-tank cleaner Deuce Bigalow has to make some quick cash after he damages a gigolo client's swanky Malibu pad, so he decides to give the world's oldest profession a try and become a gigolo himself.

featureResponse.title: Dirty War
featureResponse.shortSummary: This thriller takes a hypothetical look at how a terrorist 'dirty bomb' attack might be planned and executed in London.
featureResponse.summary: In a post-9/11 world, how do you prepare for the unthinkable? This alarming HBO Films thriller chronicles the hypothetical story of how a terrorist 'dirty bomb' attack might be planned and executed in London despite the best efforts of law enforcement--and shows how devastating such a strike would be.

featureResponse.title: Disney's The Kid
featureResponse.shortSummary: Unlikable businessman Bruce Willis gets the wake-up call he needs when he meets his friendly eight-year-old self in this charming comedy.
featureResponse.summary: An unlikable businessman's 40th birthday comes with the arrival of a magical and totally shocking surprise: his friendly eight-year-old self. Bruce Willis stars as the unpleasant workaholic who comes to learn a lot about himself through the sweet-natured boy he once was. Co-starring Spencer Breslin, Emily Mortimer, Lily Tomlin and Chi McBride.

featureResponse.title: Disturbia
featureResponse.shortSummary: Voyeurism lands a troubled teen in the sights of a possible serial killer in this update of Alfred Hitchcock's 'Rear Window.'
featureResponse.summary: Voyeurism lands a troubled teen in the sights of a possible serial killer in this update of Hitchcock's 'Rear Window.' Stuck under house arrest, young Kale picks up binoculars and turns his attentions to his neighbors. It's all fun and sexy games until he witnesses what may have been a murder and sets out to prove it...raising the ire of the man he suspects of the crime.

featureResponse.title: The Divergent Series: Insurgent
featureResponse.shortSummary: Tris and Four are on the run from sinister Erudite leader Jeanine and her faction in this thrilling sequel to 'Divergent.'
featureResponse.summary: Tris and Four are on the run from sinister Erudite leader Jeanine and her faction in this thrilling sequel to 'Divergent.' Set five days after the events of the first film in crumbling post-apocalyptic Chicago, the film finds Tris (Shailene Woodley) searching for answers about the loss of her family...while facing threats from every side. Co-starring Theo James.

featureResponse.title: Dolphin Tale 2
featureResponse.shortSummary: Winter the dolphin with a prosthetic tail must be paired with new partner by her human friends at the aquarium in this sequel.
featureResponse.summary: Winter the dolphin is back along with her human friends at an aquarium in this 'emotional and sweet' (Roger Ebert.com) sequel. When Winter's companion dies, aquarium owner Dr. Clay Haskett (Harry Connick Jr.) and company must follow regulations and find her a new partner--or face legal ramifications. But will Winter accept the injured baby dolphin they want to pair her up with?

featureResponse.title: Double Take
featureResponse.shortSummary: A framed investment banker goes on the run from the FBI and swaps identities with a fast-talking street hustler.
featureResponse.summary: When an investment banker is framed for a money-laundering scheme, he goes on the run from the FBI and swaps identities with a fast-talking street hustler, unaware that his new alias is in even more trouble with the law than he is!

featureResponse.title: Down to Earth
featureResponse.shortSummary: When a black comedian is whisked to heaven before his time, an angel sends him back to Earth--but in the body of a ruthless white tycoon!
featureResponse.summary: xWhen a black standup comedian is whisked to heaven before his time, an angel sends him back to Earth--but in the body of a ruthless old white tycoon!

featureResponse.title: Dracula Untold
featureResponse.shortSummary: The evil origins of Bram Stoker's legendary vampire are revealed in this horror tale.
featureResponse.summary: The evil origins of Bram Stoker's legendary vampire are revealed in this tale. Prince Vlad Dracula (Luke Evans) of Transylvania is a good father and husband until his young son is targeted for military service by a sinister Turkish sultan. With nowhere to turn, Vlad gets a disturbing offer from an ancient vampire: drink his blood and inherit limitless power and eternal life.

featureResponse.title: Dreamcatcher
featureResponse.shortSummary: Four old friends experience otherworldly horrors during a hunting trip in the woods in this shocker based on Stephen King's novel.
featureResponse.summary: Four old friends experience otherworldly horrors during a hunting trip in the woods in this shocker based on Stephen King's novel. Sharing telepathic powers as a result of helping a handicapped boy during their childhood, the four are ensnared by a horrifying alien menace. When the subsequent military cover-up adds to their woes, their powers become their only hope.

featureResponse.title: The Dream Team
featureResponse.shortSummary: Four mental patients find themselves left to their own devices in New York City in this riotous comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Four mental patients find themselves left to their own devices in New York City in this riotous comedy. The wacky quartet's trip to a baseball game takes a detour when their shrink gets knocked out after witnessing a murder. It's crazy laughs to the finish as they adventure through the Big Apple trying to find the good doc...and stop the killers who want him iced!

featureResponse.title: Dressed to Kill
featureResponse.shortSummary: Brian DePalma's twisty murder mystery with Michael Caine as a psychiatrist who suspects that one of his patients is a psycho-killer.
featureResponse.summary: Brian DePalma puts his own stylish spin on 'Psycho' and other Hitchcock classics in this murder-mystery favorite. Psychiatrist Michael Caine suspects that one of his patients--a transvestite with a split personality--has stolen his straight razor and used it to kill a woman. The red herrings pile up as the dead woman's son joins up with a hooker to catch the killer.

featureResponse.title: Dr. Seuss' How the Grinch Stole Christmas
featureResponse.shortSummary: Jim Carrey brings Dr. Suess' holiday-hating heel to gloriously sinister life in this effects-filled adaptation of the classic story.
featureResponse.summary: Jim Carrey brings Dr. Suess' holiday-hating heel to gloriously sinister life in this effects-filled adaptation of the classic story. With nearby Whoville exploding with yuletide joy, Carrey's green goblin undertakes a nefarious Christmas Eve mission--to steal every shred of holiday cheer in the town.

featureResponse.title: D.C. Cab
featureResponse.shortSummary: An innocent newby joins a Washington, D.C. cab company that specializes in the worst cabs and the craziest drivers in this comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Welcome to the D.C. Cab Co., specializing in the worst cabs and the craziest drivers in Washington! Things go from bad to worse for an innocent newcomer determined to learn the tricks of the taxi trade. Mr. T plays a fellow driver who wages his own private war on the Capitol's pimps and pushers--on company time. Will the threat of bankruptcy spur the zany hacks into action?

featureResponse.title: Eagle Eye
featureResponse.shortSummary: A frightening cyber-terror frames two Chicagoans in a deadly plot and leaves them on the run from the law in this action-thriller.
featureResponse.summary: A frightening cyber-terror frames two Chicagoans in a deadly plot and leaves them on the run from the law in this thriller. Forced to act by a mysterious caller who seems to be everywhere and can control everything around them, innocent citizens Jerry and Rachel find themselves on a terrifying roller-coaster-ride. Can they unravel the high-tech mystery before it's too late?

featureResponse.title: Einstein and Eddington
featureResponse.shortSummary: The tale of the unlikely partnership between Albert Einstein and British scientist Arthur Eddington during World War I.
featureResponse.summary: Albert Einstein was a free-spirited Jewish renegade from Germany; Arthur Eddington was a conservative English Quaker. But these two very different, but incredibly brilliant scientists would form a long-distance partnership that would change the course of modern science forever as they collaborated to pursue new ideas that flew in the face of centuries-old tenets.

featureResponse.title: Elizabeth I (Part 1)
featureResponse.shortSummary: Part 1 of 2. HBO Films miniseries that explores the intersection of the public and private lives of Queen Elizabeth I.
featureResponse.summary: Part 1 of 2. Winner of nine Emmy(R) Awards, including Outstanding Miniseries! Helen Mirren and Jeremy Irons star in this HBO Films miniseries about the public and private lives of Queen Elizabeth I in the latter half of her 45-year reign. Part 1 follows the tempestuous relationship between Elizabeth and the Earl of Leicester through war, treason, illness and a French suitor.

featureResponse.title: Elizabeth I (Part 2)
featureResponse.shortSummary: Part 2 of 2. HBO Films miniseries that explores the intersection of the public and private lives of Queen Elizabeth I.
featureResponse.summary: Part 2 of 2. Winner of nine Emmy(R) Awards, including Outstanding Miniseries! Helen Mirren and Jeremy Irons star in this two-part HBO Films miniseries about the public and private lives of Queen Elizabeth I in the latter half of her 45-year reign. In Part 2, an older Elizabeth has a passionate affair with the young, ambitious Earl of Essex (Hugh Dancy), Leicester's stepson.

featureResponse.title: Ella Enchanted
featureResponse.shortSummary: Anne Hathaway tries to lift her curse--obedience--in this magical, musical take on the 'Cinderella' story.
featureResponse.summary: A magical, musical take on the 'Cinderella story,' this charming contemporary fairy tale finds sweet-natured Anne Hathaway trying to lift the 'gift' she's been cursed with--obedience--in order to be free of her wicked stepsisters, save the kingdom from tyranny, and maybe even marry a handsome prince. Co-starring Hugh Dancy, Cary Elwes, Vivica A. Fox and Joanna Lumley.

featureResponse.shortTitle: El Mar y El (The Sea and Him)
featureResponse.title: El Mar y El (The Sea and Him)
featureResponse.shortSummary: This tragicomic short film chronicles a man's quest to flee Cuba during the 1980 Mariel Boatlift.
featureResponse.summary: This tragicomic short film chronicles a man's quest to flee Cuba during the 1980 Mariel Boatlift.

featureResponse.title: Entourage
featureResponse.shortSummary: Vince's first picture for new studio head Ari threatens to come off the rails in this film follow-up to the hit HBO series.
featureResponse.summary: The boys are back! Vince, E, Drama and Turtle make a splash on the big screen in this raucous comedy adaptation of the hit HBO series. When Vince tackles directing and starring in Ari's first picture as a studio head, the boys have no idea what they are in for--especially when the film goes wildly over budget and threatens to come totally off the rails.

featureResponse.title: En las nubes (In the Clouds)
featureResponse.shortSummary: A comedic exploration of cultural disagreements about intimacy, love, and marriage proposals in the age of YouTube.
featureResponse.summary: A comedic exploration of cultural disagreements about intimacy, love, and marriage proposals in the age of YouTube. Starring Valeria Blanc, Jeremy Glazer, Martin Piroyansky, Veronica Hassan, Javier Drolas, Maria Canale, Luz Palazon, Luciano Cazaux and Alan Sabbagh. Written and directed by Marcelo Mitnik.

featureResponse.title: Eulogy
featureResponse.shortSummary: Three generations of a dysfunctional family reunite for the funeral of its patriarch, causing old conflicts and simmering secrets to erupt.
featureResponse.summary: Three generations of a dysfunctional family reunite for the funeral of its patriarch, causing old conflicts and simmering secrets to erupt, while the clan's granddaughter struggles to write a fitting eulogy.

featureResponse.title: Evan Almighty
featureResponse.shortSummary: Steve Carell finds himself answering God's request for him to build an ark in anticipation of another biblical flood in this comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Move over, Noah--there's a new ark builder in town! Steve Carell reprises his role as Evan Baxter in this hilarious follow-up to Bruce Almighty. Newly elected to congress, Evan plans to fight for change, but there's just one glitch: God (Morgan Freeman) has his own plan for change--and it involves Evan building an ark in anticipation of another biblical flood!

promotionResponse.title: Everest: Sneak Peek
promotionResponse.shortSummary: A quick look at the film 'Everest.' Premieres Saturday, June 11th at 8pm.
promotionResponse.summary: A quick look at the film 'Everest.' Premieres Saturday, June 11th at 8pm.

featureResponse.title: Everybody's All-American
featureResponse.shortSummary: The starry-eyed romance between a college football hero and his beauty-queen wife encounters the bitter realities of adulthood.
featureResponse.summary: He was the college football hero. She was Miss Magnolia, with only one goal in life--to become the wife of the gridiron star. Jessica Lange and Dennis Quaid play the golden couple who have everything going for them--until their starry-eyed romance comes up against the bitter realities of adult life. Timothy Hutton plays Quaid's worshipful nephew and Lange's lifelong friend.

featureResponse.title: The Fabulous Baker Boys
featureResponse.shortSummary: A world-weary singer may be the best thing that ever happened to the bickering Baker Boys, a lousy nightclub duo.
featureResponse.summary: A world-weary singer may be the best thing that ever happened to the bickering Baker Boys, a lousy nightclub duo in this romantic comedy with Jeff Bridges, Michelle Pfeiffer and Beau Bridges. Uptight family man Frank (Beau) has never liked his kid brother's wastrel ways, but he hits the roof when Jack (Jeff) and Susie (Pfeiffer) start 'makin' whoopee' offstage as well as on!

featureResponse.title: Face/Off
featureResponse.shortSummary: FBI agent John Travolta agrees to switch lives--and faces--with savage terrorist Nicolas Cage.
featureResponse.summary: Trying to get the inside dope on a nerve-gas bomb plot that could level L.A., FBI agent John Travolta agrees to switch lives--and faces--with savage terrorist Nicolas Cage. The result is a colossally bold film packed with terrific shootouts, stunning stunts, great effects and an ending you won't forget.

featureResponse.title: Fantastic Four
featureResponse.shortSummary: A team of scientists acquire superhuman abilities and teleport to an alternate universe to save Earth from the malevolent Dr. Doom.
featureResponse.summary: Mr. Fantastic, Invisible Woman, The Human Torch and The Thing ride again in this supercharged reboot in which a team of scientists acquire superhuman abilities and teleport to an alternate universe to save Earth from the malevolent Dr. Doom.

featureResponse.title: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
featureResponse.shortSummary: The Fantastic Four face a mysterious intergalactic visitor who eradicates everything in his path in this thrilling second 'FF' film.
featureResponse.summary: The Fantastic Four face an intergalactic visitor who eradicates everything in his path in this thrilling second 'FF' film based on the comic book series. As Mr. Fantastic Reed Richards and Invisible Woman Sue Storm prepare for a storybook wedding, their plans are halted by the deadly Silver Surfer--a villain who eradicates everything in his path.

featureResponse.title: Far From the Madding Crowd
featureResponse.shortSummary: A willful Victorian beauty attracts three very different suitors: a dashing soldier, a sheep farmer and a wealthy older man.
featureResponse.summary: Carey Mulligan stars in this “attractive, appealing and involving” (Empire) adaptation of Thomas Hardy's classic novel about a willful Victorian beauty who attracts three very different suitors: a dashing soldier, a sheep farmer and a wealthy older man.

featureResponse.title: Feast of Love
featureResponse.shortSummary: Interlocking episodes chart the joy and pain of several characters who are all searching to connect with someone.
featureResponse.summary: From Oscar(R)-winning director Robert Benton (“Kramer vs. Kramer”) comes this charming and touching look at the vicissitudes of love. A rustic town in Oregon is the backdrop for a series of interlocking episodes charting the joy and pain of several characters who are all searching to connect with someone.

featureResponse.title: Fellow Traveller
featureResponse.shortSummary: A screenwriter and a matinee film idol are caught up in the McCarthy-era blacklisting witch hunts in this drama.
featureResponse.summary: In the Golden Age of Hollywood, two men had it all: one was a top screenwriter, the other a film idol. But when the witch hunts of McCarthyism swept into Tinseltown, it drove one out of the country and the other to suicide. Ron Silver stars in this stylish drama of one man's determination to take a stand against injustice. Hart Bochner plays his tormented movie-star friend.

featureResponse.title: The Fever
featureResponse.shortSummary: A woman awakens in a war-torn country battling a raging fever and grappling with questions of wealth, guilt and revolution.
featureResponse.summary: Oscar(R)-winner Vanessa Redgrave (Best Supporting Actress for 1977's 'Julia') stars in this intimate tale. Adapted by 'HBO Films' from writer/actor Wallace Shawn's deeply personal stage play, the film focuses on a nameless woman (Redgrave) who awakens in a war-torn, third-world country battling a raging fever and grappling with questions of wealth, guilt and revolution.

featureResponse.title: Field of Dreams
featureResponse.shortSummary: Iowa farmer Kevin Costner crafts a magical baseball diamond in his cornfield after hearing an otherworldly voice in this sports classic.
featureResponse.summary: Iowa farmer Kevin Costner crafts a baseball diamond in his cornfield after hearing an otherworldly voice in this sports classic. 'If you build it, he will come': those whispered words heard by farmer Ray Kinsella inspire him to plow his family corn and construct a baseball field that attracts the ghosts of baseball past...and sends Ray on the journey of his life.

featureResponse.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
featureResponse.shortSummary: The kinky connection between a timid co-ed and a young businessman is the focus of this red-hot tale based on the sizzling bestseller.
featureResponse.summary: The sizzling bestseller from E.L. James is brought to exhilarating life! Dakota Johnson stars as timid college girl Anastasia Steele whose interview of wealthy Seattle businessman Christian Grey (Jamie Dornan) soon turns into a powerful and very kinky physical connection. But can the erotic ties that bind them allow them to also pursue something deeper?

featureResponse.title: Fighting
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young hustler finds fortune with his fists when he enters the knockout netherworld of street fighting. Channing Tatum, Terrence Howard.
featureResponse.summary: A young hustler finds fortune with his fists when he enters the knockout netherworld of street fighting. Channing Tatum stars as the New York newcomer whose lights-out fist-fighting skills spark an interest from a shadowy manager dealing in skin-on-skin bouts. But when the successful young brawler squares off against an old foe will there be a personal score to settle as well?

featureResponse.title: Finding Forrester
featureResponse.shortSummary: Sean Connery portrays a reclusive author who bonds with a talented inner-city youth.
featureResponse.summary: Words speak louder than actions in this thoughtful, inspiring drama about an inner-city youth who bonds with a long-out-of-touch writer. Newcomer Rob Brown stars as Jamal, a bright 16-year-old who develops a friendship with the reclusive William Forrester (Sean Connery), an author who wrote a legendary novel forty years earlier, but hasn't been heard from since.

featureResponse.title: First Date, Last Date
featureResponse.shortSummary: Two soulmates carry on their first date as the world comes to an end in this short film. Starring Andrea Bordeaux and Daniel Hall.
featureResponse.summary: Two soulmates carry on their first date as the world comes to an end in this short film. Starring Andrea Bordeaux and Daniel Hall. Directed by Derege Harding; written by E.V. Anderson.

featureResponse.title: Fly Me to the Moon
featureResponse.shortSummary: Three ordinary houseflies stow away on Apollo 11 for its trip to the moon in this animated adventure.
featureResponse.summary: Three ordinary houseflies have an out-of-this-world journey when they stow away on Apollo 11 for its trip to the moon in this animated adventure.

featureResponse.title: Focus
featureResponse.shortSummary: Slick con-artist Will Smith encounters his former protegee--and lover--while attempting the ultimate score in this electrifying caper.
featureResponse.summary: Slick con-artist Will Smith encounters his former protegee--and lover--while attempting the ultimate score in this electrifying caper. Margot Robbie co-stars as the fetching femme fatale who happens to turn up in Buenos Aires on the arm of the veteran grifter's biggest mark. 'Combines seamless, superbly-crafted filmmaking with the fizz and fun created by its leads' (TheWrap).

featureResponse.title: Frailty
featureResponse.shortSummary: Bill Paxton directed and stars in this unnerving tale about a man who enlists the help of his two sons to kill people he thinks are demons.
featureResponse.summary: Bill Paxton directed and stars in this unnerving tale about a mentally unraveled father who enlists his two young sons in helping do God's work to kill people he believes are really demons. Matthew McConaughey plays the grown-up version of one of the boys who reveals the terrifying truth behind the series of murders to a stumped FBI agent (Powers Boothe).

featureResponse.title: Frantic
featureResponse.shortSummary: Harrison Ford stars as an American doctor in Paris on a desperate search for his missing wife.
featureResponse.summary: What do you do when your wife disappears in a foreign city and you don't speak the language? That's the situation facing an American doctor in Paris in this taut thriller from Roman Polanski. The doctor must team up with a beautiful woman who holds the key to the mystery. Together, they uncover a plot involving stolen nuclear technology and international terrorists.

featureResponse.title: Freddy Got Fingered
featureResponse.shortSummary: Tom Green directed, co-wrote and stars in this insane comedy about a young man with a dream of becoming an animator.
featureResponse.summary: Warning: This film contains scenes that are totally twisted, wildly demented and absolutely hilarious! Tom Green directed, co-wrote and stars in this insane comedy about a young man who follows his dream of becoming an animator. Along the way, he manhandles a number of wild animals, wears roadkill and enjoys a masochistic relationship--all to the chagrin of his hapless dad.

featureResponse.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Time Travel
featureResponse.shortSummary: Three social misfits are drawn into a wild time-travel adventure via the bathroom of their favorite local pub.
featureResponse.summary: Hanging at a local pub, Ray, Pete and Toby meet a lovely young woman who claims to be a time traveler from the future. As she spins her wild tale, the skeptical Pete stumbles into a time portal--in the pub's toilet--and sets off a wild adventure that results in a comedic crisis of mistaken identities, close calls, romance and anarchy--with the future of mankind at stake.

featureResponse.title: Friday Night Lights
featureResponse.shortSummary: High-school football coach Billy Bob Thornton leads his small-town Texas team on a rocky path to the state title in this stirring drama.
featureResponse.summary: High-school football coach Billy Bob Thornton leads his small-town Texas team on a rocky path to the state title as they face the uncertainty of life beyond the field in this 'smart, sharp, stirring adaptation of the H.G. Bissinger best-seller' (Philadelphia Inquirer). Co-starring Derek Luke, Jay Hernandez, Lucas Black, Garrett Hedlund and Tim McGraw.

featureResponse.title: Furious 7
featureResponse.shortSummary: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker and company are targeted by the vengeful brother of a terrorist they stopped in part 6 in this installment.
featureResponse.summary: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker--in his final film--and their high-octane friends must put the pedal to the metal once again in this seventh exhilarating installment in the "Furious" series. Trying to adjust to normal lives after defeating international terrorist Owen Shaw in part 6 proves impossible when Shaw's vengeance-minded brother begins a campaign of violence against them.

featureResponse.title: The Gallows
featureResponse.shortSummary: Twenty years after a student is accidentally hanged during a play, a high school tries to put on the same show--with horrific results.
featureResponse.summary: Twenty years after a student is accidentally hanged during a performance of 'The Gallows,' the school tries to put the show on again--only to have four students get trapped inside the building with a murderous presence that wants to strut and fret some bloodshed upon the stage.

featureResponse.title: Game Change
featureResponse.shortSummary: The 2008 presidential campaign of John McCain and Sarah Palin is seen from the perspective of a beleaguered strategist.
featureResponse.summary: With John McCain trailing in the polls during the 2008 U.S. presidential election, strategist Steve Schmidt knew he needed a 'game changer' to turn the tide. With Sarah Palin, he thought he had found that person. This searing, behind-the-scenes look at McCain's ill-fated campaign follows the daring plan to add Palin to the ticket and the implosion that would soon follow.

featureResponse.title: The Gathering Storm
featureResponse.shortSummary: Albert Finney stars in this story of Winston Churchill's struggles to resurrect his political career and save his marriage prior to WWII.
featureResponse.summary: In his darkest hours as both a husband and a politician, Winston Churchill found the strength to wage a solitary battle against Nazi tyranny. Albert Finney and Vanessa Redgrave star as Winston and Clementine Churchill in this intimate story that chronicles the obstacles they faced in their marriage against the backdrop of the growing threat of a second World War.

featureResponse.title: Gentleman's Agreement
featureResponse.shortSummary: Journalist Gregory Peck pretends to be Jewish in order to write an expose on anti-Semitism in this 1947 Best Picture Oscar(R)-winner.
featureResponse.summary: This movie caused a sensation in 1947, won the Oscar(R) for Best Picture and brought Gregory Peck his third Best Actor nomination for his performance as a crusading journalist pretending to be Jewish in order to write an expose of anti-Semitism. Also with John Garfield.

featureResponse.title: Get Hard
featureResponse.shortSummary: Financial fraudster Will Ferrell hires Kevin Hart to 'coach' him on prison life as his sentence approaches in this comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Financial fraud lands arrogant hedge-fund manager Will Ferrell in jail in this outrageous comedy. With only 30 days before his sentence begins, Ferrell hires car-washer Kevin Hart to be his 'prison coach.' There's just one thing that Hart leaves out: he's never been in prison so his lessons lean toward teaching Ferrell self-preservation...by way of accepting the inevitable.

featureResponse.title: Get Shorty
featureResponse.shortSummary: A Miami loan shark goes to Hollywood to collect a debt and tries to break into the movie business.
featureResponse.summary: John Travolta stars in Elmore Leonard's darkly comic crime caper about a Miami loan shark who goes to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that his particular skill set makes him ideally suited to break into the movie biz!

featureResponse.title: Gia
featureResponse.shortSummary: Angelina Jolie stars in the tragic story of Gia Carangi, the supermodel who dominated the international fashion scene of the late '70s.
featureResponse.summary: She was one of the most beautiful and envied women in the world...and one of the loneliest. Angelina Jolie stars in this drama based on the tragic true story of Gia Carangi, the supermodel who dominated the international fashion scene of the late '70s until her drug-fueled lifestyle and unhappiness caught up with her.

featureResponse.title: The Girl
featureResponse.shortSummary: Iconic director Alfred Hitchcock's obsessive relationship with actress Tippi Hedren is the focus of this HBO Films drama.
featureResponse.summary: He was the Master of Suspense, a director whose films thrilled, terrified and wowed. But to Tippi Hedren, the true terror of Alfred Hitchcock came from the director himself. Mirroring Hitchcock's own movies, this tale of obsession chronicles the director's grooming of Hedren into a star--and his growing obsession with her personally--as they filmed 'The Birds' and 'Marnie.'

featureResponse.title: Girlfight
featureResponse.shortSummary: Michelle Rodriguez stars as a troubled teenage girl who finds love and success in the male-dominated world of boxing.
featureResponse.summary: Michelle Rodriguez as Diana, a troubled teenage girl raised in a dysfunctional family who finds love and success in the male-dominated world of boxing. Diana's chance entrance into a famed Brooklyn gym puts her into contact with a trainer named Hector...and into the arms of a handsome young fighter named Adrian.

featureResponse.title: The Godfather Epic
featureResponse.shortSummary: 'The Godfather' and 'The Godfather II' are edited into this single epic that reveals the saga of the Corleone crime family chronologically.
featureResponse.summary: Francis Ford Coppola's gangster epic 'The Godfather' and its Oscar(R)-winning sequel 'The Godfather II' are edited into this single film--told chronologically and with added footage. Beginning in 1902, the film reveals the saga of the Corleone family from its Sicilian beginnings to its rise as the most powerful crime family in America. Marlon Brando and Al Pacino star.

featureResponse.title: Godsend
featureResponse.shortSummary: Grief prompts a shattered couple to accept a brilliant doctor's offer to illegally clone the eight-year-old son they lost.
featureResponse.summary: Grief prompts a shattered couple to accept a brilliant doctor's offer to illegally clone the eight-year-old son they lost...but terror ensues when their perfect new child reaches the same age at which the original boy died. Greg Kinnear, Rebecca Romijn-Stamos and Robert De Niro star in this bone-chilling tale.

featureResponse.shortTitle: Gold Diggers: Secret of Bear Mountain
featureResponse.title: Gold Diggers: The Secret of Bear Mountain
featureResponse.shortSummary: Two teenage girls set out on a quest to find gold buried in Bear Mountain in this 'delightful' ('The Washington Post') family film.
featureResponse.summary: Could gold be buried in Bear Mountain? Two teenage girls set out on a quest for the truth in this family film. City-raised Beth thought she would loathe her new country home, but when she meets the rugged Jody, she embarks on a riveting adventure. Convinced that treasure awaits, the new pals trade their troubles for an exciting trek into the depths of Bear Mountain.

featureResponse.title: Goodnight Moon & Other Sleepytime Tales
