featureResponse.shortSummary: Clement Hurd's 'Goodnight Moon' is the highlight of this animated special that features a collection of bedtime stories and lullabies.
featureResponse.summary: One of the most beloved children's books of all time comes to life for the first time ever in this animated special. Margaret Wise Brown and Clement Hurd's 'Goodnight Moon' is the highlight of this special that will feature a delightful collection of bedtime stories and lullabies--all connected by a selection of amusing interviews with precocious kids!

featureResponse.title: Good Boy!
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young boy adopts a stray dog that turns out to be an emissary from outer space that was sent to Earth to prepare for a canine invasion!
featureResponse.summary: A lonely young boy adopts a stray dog that becomes his best friend, unaware that the pup is actually an emissary from outer space that was sent to Earth to prepare for a canine invasion!

featureResponse.title: The Good Shepherd
featureResponse.shortSummary: The creation of the Central Intelligence Agency is seen through the eyes of a top young operative in this gripping drama.
featureResponse.summary: The creation of the C.I.A. is seen through the eyes of a top young operative in this gripping drama directed by Robert De Niro. Matt Damon is exceptional as Edward Wilson, who--while dealing with the 1961 Bay of Pigs crisis in Cuba that may cost him his job--reflects back on his dedicated career in the espionage business since World War II and everything it has cost him.

featureResponse.title: The Grapes of Wrath
featureResponse.shortSummary: John Ford's classic about Depression-era farmers who leave drought-stricken Oklahoma and migrate to California.
featureResponse.summary: One of Hollywood's greatest movies, this classic adaptation of John Steinbeck's novel was nominated for seven 1940 Oscars(R), and won for Best Supporting Actress (Jane Darwell) and Best Director (John Ford). Henry Fonda gives one of his most memorable performances in the gripping drama of Depression-era farmers who leave drought-stricken Oklahoma and migrate to California.

featureResponse.title: The Great Outdoors
featureResponse.shortSummary: John Candy and clan have their country vacation rudely interrupted by Dan Aykroyd and his obnoxious family.
featureResponse.summary: Bats, leeches and bears are one thing--but it's his brother-in-law who is driving John Candy crazy in this back-to-nature laugh fest. Nestled in a cozy cabin on vacation, Candy and clan are rudely interrupted by Dan Aykroyd and his obnoxious family. Mother Nature takes it on the chin when these goofballs tangle in the great outdoors.

featureResponse.title: Grey Gardens
featureResponse.shortSummary: The lives of two eccentric, mutually dependent women play out in a decaying house known as Grey Gardens.
featureResponse.summary: They were once steeped in affluence, enjoying a luxurious lifestyle in East Hampton while they defied convention amidst the social royalty. Based on the women who inspired the Maysles brothers' 1975 documentary, this film tells the story of 'Big Edie' and 'Little Edie' Bouvier Beale, whose eccentric, mutually dependent lives played out in a decaying house known as Grey Gardens.

featureResponse.title: Gridlock'd
featureResponse.shortSummary: Two junkie musicians try to enroll in a government detox program, but get caught up in endless red tape and bureaucracy.
featureResponse.summary: After a friend's drug overdose, two junkie musicians (Tim Roth and Tupac Shakur) decide to get clean and try to enroll in a government detox program. But first they have to deal with endless red tape and bureaucracy while being pursued by drug dealers and cops.

featureResponse.title: Grilled
featureResponse.shortSummary: A pair of struggling door-to-door meat salesman get mixed up with mobsters, hit men and a shady seductress while trying to make a big sale.
featureResponse.summary: Comedy superstars Ray Romano and Kevin James team up in this well-done farce about a pair of struggling door-to-door meat salesman who get mixed up with mobsters, hit men and a shady seductress while trying to make a big sale.

featureResponse.title: Gus Van Sant's Last Days
featureResponse.shortSummary: An insecure rock star's final moments before suicide are documented in this moving drama.
featureResponse.summary: An insecure rock star's final moments before suicide are documented in this moving drama. Blake is the lead singer in a successful band and has it all--fame, fortune, friends. But these are the very things that lead to his self-doubt and anxiety, and he detaches himself from life, seeking refuge in the woods behind his home as his personal tragedy unfolds.

featureResponse.title: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
featureResponse.shortSummary: Serial madman Michael Myers returns to hunt Jamie Lee Curtis again 20 years after his Halloween killing spree in this terrifying sequel.
featureResponse.summary: Twenty years after his horrifying Halloween night murder spree, Michael Myers returns to kill again! Jamie Lee Curtis reprises the role that made her famous as the maniac's sister, now living under a new identity as a school headmistress...until her seemingly unkillable brother arrives to finish the bloody business he started in 1978.

featureResponse.title: Happily N'Ever After
featureResponse.shortSummary: Cinderella's evil stepmother schemes to make sure there won't be any more happy endings in Fairy Tale Land.
featureResponse.summary: When the Wizard of Fairy Tale Land goes on vacation, Cinderella's evil stepmother schemes to make sure there won't be any more happy endings.

featureResponse.title: Happily N'Ever 2
featureResponse.shortSummary: Snow White is a spoiled teen who has to change her ways when she discovers that her father's fiancee is a real witch!
featureResponse.summary: Snow White is a spoiled teen who suddenly has to grow up and change her ways when she discovers that her father's fiancee is a real witch!

featureResponse.title: Happy Feet
featureResponse.shortSummary: An outcast penguin with mad dance skills heads out on the ice for an epic adventure in this 2006 Best Animated Feature Oscar(R)-winner.
featureResponse.summary: An outcast penguin with mad dance skills heads out on the ice for an epic adventure in this 2006 Best Animated Feature Oscar(R)-winner. Emperor penguins are all expected to be born with perfect voices. Unfortunately, "Mumble" can't sing a lick--but he is a born dancer. Cast out on his own, Mumble heads out on an adventure where he learns it's not so bad to be different!

featureResponse.title: The Haunted Mansion
featureResponse.shortSummary: Eddie Murphy brings his family to a crumbling, spook-infested palace in this tale inspired by the Disney theme park ride.
featureResponse.summary: It's hair-raising hijinx for real-estate salesman Eddie Murphy and his family in this effects-filled horror-comedy inspired by the beloved Walt Disney theme park ride. Unable to pass on a possible listing, Murphy detours his family's vacation for a visit to the ultra-creepy Gracey Manor--a crumbling, spook-infested palace that comes replete with its own graveyard!

featureResponse.title: Havoc
featureResponse.shortSummary: Bored, rich white kids from the 'burbs looking for thrills get mixed up with Latino gangstas in East L.A.
featureResponse.summary: Rich white kids from the 'burbs take a walk on the wild side in this gritty drama from Oscar(R)-winning documentary filmmaker Barbara Kopple. Anne Hathaway and Bijou Phillips star as bored teens looking for thrills who get more than they bargained for when they get mixed up with Latino gangstas in East L.A.

featureResponse.title: HBO Access 01: The Walk
featureResponse.shortSummary: A Mexican man and his son are faced with a major crisis of conscience as they try to cross the border illegally.
featureResponse.summary: A Mexican man and his son are faced with a major crisis of conscience as they try to cross the border illegally.

featureResponse.title: HBO Access 02: Emergency Contact
featureResponse.shortSummary: An inexperienced emergency-room nurse becomes the voice of reason to a woman having a breakdown.
featureResponse.summary: An inexperienced emergency-room nurse becomes the voice of reason to a woman having a breakdown.

featureResponse.title: HBO Access 03: Progress
featureResponse.shortSummary: The last black man on Earth stays in isolation until his existence is discovered by a white woman with a reason to find him.
featureResponse.summary: The last black man on Earth stays in isolation until his existence is discovered by a white woman with a reason to find him.

featureResponse.title: HBO Access 04: The Last Song
featureResponse.shortSummary: A Korean woman working at a karaoke bar bonds with a mysterious stranger who refuses to leave at closing time.
featureResponse.summary: A Korean woman working at a karaoke bar bonds with a mysterious stranger who refuses to leave at closing time.

featureResponse.title: Head Office
featureResponse.shortSummary: Judge Reinhold stars in this spoof about a naive young MBA who struggles to survive in this corporate shark pool.
featureResponse.summary: INC International produces everything from hair removal cream to nuclear warheads. How can a naive young MBA survive in this corporate shark pool? Judge Reinhold stars in this spoof of corporate life.

featureResponse.title: Hearts in Atlantis
featureResponse.shortSummary: A man recalls his childhood friendship with a clairvoyant stranger in this Stephen King adaptation starring Anthony Hopkins.
featureResponse.summary: Based on a book by Stephen King, this intriguing, nostalgic drama relates a man's recollections of a clairvoyant stranger who befriended him during the summer of 1960. Anthony Hopkins stars as the mysterious boarder who helps the youth during that tumultuous summer--while hiding from a lurking danger in his past.

featureResponse.title: Hemingway & Gellhorn
featureResponse.shortSummary: The powerful story of the war-torn romance between literary giant Ernest Hemingway and trailblazing war correspondent Martha Gellhorn.
featureResponse.summary: It was a romance born out of war...and later torn apart by it. This powerful HBO Films drama recounts the relationship between literary giant Ernest Hemingway and trailblazing war correspondent Martha Gellhorn. Nicole Kidman and Clive Owen star as the two writers whose passionate romance played out against such epic backdrops as the Spanish Civil War and World War II.

featureResponse.title: Her Alibi
featureResponse.shortSummary: A mystery writer who is blocked and bored falls hard for a mysterious beauty who convinces him to serve as her alibi in a murder case.
featureResponse.summary: He's a mystery writer who's blocked and bored. She's a mystery woman who's either the inspiration of his life--or the end of it! In this daffy romantic whodunit, the smitten writer agrees to serve as the alibi for a Romanian beauty who might be a murderess. He's sure she can't be a killer, but doubts creep in when she impales a bug with a kitchen knife...from across the room!

featureResponse.title: The Hills Have Eyes II
featureResponse.shortSummary: An unprepared squadron of National Guard trainees wind up in the deadly desert lair of murderous mutants in this harrowing sequel.
featureResponse.summary: An unprepared squadron of National Guard trainees wind up in the deadly desert lair of murderous mutants in this sequel. Battling the rugged terrain and their clashing egos, the overmatched recruits are slaughtered in grisly fashion one by one as they try to escape the horrifying creatures--residents of the remote region who were left hideously deformed by nuclear testing.

featureResponse.title: The Hitcher
featureResponse.shortSummary: An innocent young man is dragged into a nightmare of murder in the remote desert by a crazed hitchhiker in this 1986 classic.
featureResponse.summary: An exciting blend of chills and action runs through this stylish suspense thriller. C. Thomas Howell plays an innocent young man dragged into a nightmare by a crazed hitchhiker (Rutger Hauer) who enjoys a deadly game of cat and mouse. With Jennifer Jason Leigh.

featureResponse.title: Home Alone
featureResponse.shortSummary: Macaulay Culkin stars in this comedy smash about a boy who is accidently left behind when his family goes to Paris for the holidays.
featureResponse.summary: Macaulay Culkin rocketed to stardom as Kevin, a young boy who's accidently left behind when his family goes to Paris for the holidays. Having the house to himself is a dream come true, and Kevin easily masters grocery shopping and laundry. He even takes on two determined but dimwitted burglars, who can't believe the house is being defended by an eight-year old!

featureResponse.shortTitle: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
featureResponse.title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
featureResponse.shortSummary: Macaulay Culkin returns as America's funniest kid in distress, this time on his own in the Big Bad Apple.
featureResponse.summary: Kevin's back! Macaulay Culkin returns as America's favorite kid in distress, and this time he's on his own in the Big Bad Apple. Armed with Dad's wallet and credit cards, Kevin's having the time of his life! But uh-oh! Those two inept burglars from back home show up to rob a kindly old toy-store owner of the money he was planning on donating to a children's hospital.

featureResponse.title: Honey
featureResponse.shortSummary: Jessica Alba heats up the floor as an aspiring dancer from the Bronx looking to make it big in this hip-hop-flavored tale.
featureResponse.summary: Jessica Alba heats up the floor as an aspiring dancer from the Bronx looking to make it big in this 'upbeat hip-hop fable' (New York Times). Groovin' tracks, red-hot dance footage and cameos by real-life hip-hop stars are sure to set your toes-a-tappin'. Mekhi Phifer, Joy Bryant and Lil' Romeo co-star.

featureResponse.title: Hoot
featureResponse.shortSummary: Three kids create chaos to save endangered owls from a construction firm in this family film based on the award-winning novel.
featureResponse.summary: Three kids create covert chaos to save endangered owls in this family film based on the award-winning novel. Roy Eberhardt, the new kid in school, joins forces with tomboy Beatrice and a peculiar loner named Mullet Fingers. Together, they make it their mission to wreak havoc to prevent a construction-site supervisor from destroying the natural habitat of a flock of owls.

featureResponse.title: House of Saddam - Part I
featureResponse.shortSummary: Baghdad, 1979. Deputy President Saddam Hussein and his allies take control of Iraq after intimidating the President into resigning.
featureResponse.summary: Baghdad, 1979. Deputy President Saddam and his allies intimidate President Ahmed Hassan al-Bakr into resigning. Convening his first Ba'ath party congress, the new president exposes 'detractors,' who are forced to confess to an attempted coup and executed by party members in a test of loyalty. The personality of Saddam soon permeates Iraq.

featureResponse.title: House of Saddam - Part II
featureResponse.shortSummary: 1988. Baghdad is jubilant in victory after the war with Iran, but Kuwait's upsurge in oil output prompts Saddam's wrath.
featureResponse.summary: 1988. Though Iraq is on the brink of bankruptcy, Baghdad is jubilant in victory after the war with Iran. Uday celebrates in a nightclub by getting drunk and firing a gun into the crowd. As Kuwait's upsurge in oil output challenges Iraqi prosperity, a family lunch reveals fractures in Saddam's household. Later, Saddam leads his army into 'the mother of all battles.'

featureResponse.title: House of Saddam - Part III
featureResponse.shortSummary: May 1995. Iraq is crippled by UN sanctions for refusing to comply with weapons inspections.
featureResponse.summary: May 1995. Iraq is crippled by UN sanctions for refusing to comply with weapons inspections. When inspectors are finally admitted, a cat-and-mouse game begins. In charge of the subterfuge is Qusay, Saddam's new successor--a move that infuriates Hussein Kamal. Later, Hussein and his brother cross the border to take diplomatic asylum in Jordan.

featureResponse.title: House of Saddam - Part IV
featureResponse.shortSummary: March 2003. As U.S. forces seize control of Iraq, Saddam instructs most of his family to flee and prepares to hide himself.
featureResponse.summary: March 2003. As Bush declares "the day of liberation is near," Saddam instructs most of his family to flee to Syria; only Uday, Qusay and grandson Mustapha remain. As coalition forces flood Baghdad, Saddam remains holed up in a hut. Uday, Qusay and Mustapha hide in a relative's house, but the location leaks to U.S. officials. Later, Saddam senses the net closing in on him

featureResponse.shortTitle: Huntsman: Winter's War: HBO First Look
featureResponse.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War: HBO First Look
featureResponse.shortSummary: A sneak peek at this fantasy adventure starring Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Chris Hemsworth.
featureResponse.summary: A sneak peek at this fantasy adventure starring Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Chris Hemsworth.

featureResponse.title: Indictment: The McMartin Trial
featureResponse.shortSummary: A fact-based drama based on the longest and most expensive trial in American history that ended without a single conviction.
featureResponse.summary: The longest and most expensive trial in American history ended without a single conviction! The state of California spent seven years and 15 million dollars to prosecute the McMartin child-abuse case--a case that ended in deadlocked juries, a mistrial and outright acquittals. What's wrong with a criminal justice system that lets that happen? James Woods stars.

featureResponse.title: Inherent Vice
featureResponse.shortSummary: Stoner P.I. Joaquin Phoenix searches for a missing ex-girlfriend in the sex-and-drug fueled underbelly of 1970 L.A.
featureResponse.summary: 'Boogie Nights' director Paul Thomas Anderson goes retro once again with this quirky mystery about a dope-smoking private eye whose search for a missing ex-girlfriend leads him into a bizarre mystery within the sex-and-drug fueled underbelly of 1970 L.A. Joaquin Phoenix stars as the stoner P.I. who runs into dirty cops, hookers, Nazi bikers help, cult members, and more.

featureResponse.title: The Insider
featureResponse.shortSummary: Fact-based story of a tobacco company chemist-turned-whistleblower and the battles he faces when he tries to tell his story on TV..
featureResponse.summary: Michael Mann's gripping true-life thriller chronicles the ordeal of a tobacco company chemist-turned-whistleblower and the battles he faces when he tries to tell his story on "60 Minutes."

featureResponse.title: Inspector Gadget
featureResponse.shortSummary: A nerdy security guard is transformed into a high-tech crime-fighting machine in order to defeat the nefarious Dr. Claw.
featureResponse.summary: Matthew Broderick stars as the greatest hero ever assembled in this family comedy based on the 1980s animated TV series. Broderick plays a nerdy security guard who is transformed into a high-tech crime-fighting machine in order to defeat the nefarious Dr. Claw.

promotionResponse.title: The Intern: Sneak Peek
promotionResponse.shortSummary: A quick look at the film 'The Intern.' Premieres Saturday, May 28th at 8pm.
promotionResponse.summary: A quick look at the film 'The Intern.' Premieres Saturday, May 28th at 8pm.

featureResponse.title: Into the Blue 2: The Reef
featureResponse.shortSummary: Scuba divers are hired to find hidden treasure, but soon discover that their clients have a sinister agenda.
featureResponse.summary: Scuba divers think they've struck it rich when they're hired to find hidden treasure, but soon discover that their clients have a sinister agenda and their lives are in danger.

featureResponse.title: Into the Storm
featureResponse.shortSummary: This follow-up to 'The Gathering Storm' follows Winston Churchill from 1940 to 1945 as he led his beleaguered nation through World War II.
featureResponse.summary: For five years, Winston Churchill played a huge role in thwarting the Nazis during World War II, his intrepid leadership inspiring millions. This powerful follow-up to HBO's Emmy(R)-winning 'The Gathering Storm' follows Churchill from 1940 to 1945 as he guided his beleaguered nation through the crucible of the war years--even as his marriage was encountering its own struggles.

featureResponse.title: The Invasion
featureResponse.shortSummary: Alien spores begin to takeover mankind in this chilling new version of 'Invasion of the Body Snatchers.'
featureResponse.summary: Don't go to sleep! Alien spores infiltrate the U.S. and quietly begin taking control of its citizens while they sleep--and resurrecting them as emotionless replicas in this chilling new version of 'Invasion of the Body Snatchers.' Nicole Kidman stars as a psychiatrist who uncovers the plot and desperately tries to find other survivors...without attracting 'their' attention.

featureResponse.title: In Pursuit of Honor
featureResponse.shortSummary: Four U.S. Army men risk their careers--and their lives--to stand up for their beliefs in this rousing drama based on a true story.
featureResponse.summary: In 1935, General Douglas MacArthur saw the rising threat in Germany and determined to modernize the army. He ordered the last Cavalry unit to disband--and for the horses to be destroyed. But one group of soldiers were determined to save the animals, and took off across the plains on a mad dash for freedom--with an army tank unit in pursuit!

featureResponse.title: The Iron Giant
featureResponse.shortSummary: A boy is befriended by a giant metal monster from outer space in this masterful animated adventure.
featureResponse.summary: McCarthy-era Cold War fears resurface in this masterful animated adventure. Hogarth is a mischievous, nine-year-old horror-film fanatic...until he meets an enormous iron creature from outer space! When Hogarth saves the giant's life one night, the pair become inseparable. But their friendship is soon threatened by a cruel government agent who wants the beast destroyed.

featureResponse.title: I Have Tourette's but Tourette's Doesn't Have Me
featureResponse.shortSummary: Insightful family documentary that takes a candid look at the lives of more than a dozen American children who have Tourette Syndrome.
featureResponse.summary: This insightful family documentary takes a candid look at the lives of more than a dozen American children who have Tourette Syndrome. The film explores what it is like for them, what measures they are taking to control it, and the challenges they face in their efforts to be accepted into the social mainstream as 'normal' kids.

featureResponse.title: I Origins
featureResponse.shortSummary: A molecular biologist studying the evolution of the eye makes a profound discovery after a chance encounter with a young woman.
featureResponse.summary: This "captivating, suspenseful and thought-provoking" (USA Today) blend of science, spirituality and romance focuses on a molecular biologist studying the evolution of the eye who makes a profound discovery after a chance encounter with a young woman.

featureResponse.shortTitle: I Think I Love My Wife
featureResponse.title: I Think I Love My Wife
featureResponse.shortSummary: Chris Rock is a banker in a lackluster marriage who is tempted by a spicy woman in this comedy remake.
featureResponse.summary: Chris Rock is a banker in a lackluster marriage who is tempted by a spicy woman in this comedy remake. With a good job, home and family, things are stellar in Richard Cooper's life...except the missing spark with his wife. Enter the sizzling Nikki, an old acquaintance who shows up for career advice...and possibly something more. Can he stay faithful in the face of temptation?

featureResponse.title: The Jacket
featureResponse.shortSummary: A Gulf War vet who suffered a head wound lands in a terrifying predicament between his past and his future in this mind-bending tale.
featureResponse.summary: A Gulf War veteran who suffered a horrible head wound finds himself in a terrifying predicament in this mind-bending tale. A year after almost losing his life in the war, Jack (Adrien Brody) winds up in an insane asylum, where a sadistic doctor holds him prisoner in a straitjacket, and Jack undergoes intense experiences that take him into the past and the future.

featureResponse.title: Joe Versus the Volcano
featureResponse.shortSummary: Tom Hanks is an average Joe who agrees to a bizarre deal to jump into an island volcano in exchange for six weeks of a king's lifestyle.
featureResponse.summary: When an ordinary guy dumps his ho-hum life, the laughs never stop in this romantic romp. Tom Hanks is a nowhere Joe until he makes a bizarre deal with businessman Lloyd Bridges: for six weeks of a king's lifestyle, he'll jump into a Pacific island volcano. Meg Ryan has a triple role as co-worker, California girl and captain of the yacht sailing Joe to his destiny.

featureResponse.title: Joe's Palace
featureResponse.shortSummary: An empty London mansion casts a spell over an innocent young boy in this thought-provoking psychological drama.
featureResponse.summary: Young Joe takes a job as concierge for enigmatic billionaire Elliot Graham. His assignment: record the visitors at Graham's abandoned mansion across the street. While Joe befriends a pair of illicit lovers who use the home for their trysts, a young woman hired by Graham exposes a stunning family secret--and it's up to Joe to prevent the revelation from destroying Graham.

featureResponse.title: John Grisham's The Rainmaker
featureResponse.shortSummary: Rookie lawyer Matt Damon battles a big insurance company for his dying client in this courtroom crackler.
featureResponse.summary: Rookie lawyer Matt Damon battles a big insurance company for his dying client, a leukemia victim denied benefits. It's a fiery courtroom crackler from renowned director Francis Ford Coppola and best-selling legal eagle John Grisham.

featureResponse.title: Jonas Brothers: The Concert Experience
featureResponse.shortSummary: Join the superstar Jonas Brothers on the road for this concert film that features their biggest hits, behind-the-scenes footage, and more.
featureResponse.summary: Join the superstar Jonas Brothers on the road for this energizing concert film that features live performances of their biggest hits, appearances by Demi Lovato ('This Is Me'), Taylor Swift ('Should've Said No') and Robert 'Big Rob' Feggans ('Burnin' Up'), and behind-the-scenes footage of the band in New York City.

featureResponse.title: Joy
featureResponse.shortSummary: A Nigerian woman living in America struggles to convince her husband not to circumcise their 10-year-old daughter in this short film.
featureResponse.summary: A Nigerian woman living in America struggles to convince her husband not to circumcise their 10-year-old daughter in this short film. Starring Sope Aluko, Bayo Akinfemi and Hannah Tarver. Written and directed by Solomon Onita Jr.

featureResponse.title: Juice
featureResponse.shortSummary: Four young Harlem men face their futures with differing ambitions in this tough, unflinching look at life on the streets.
featureResponse.summary: Four young Harlem men face their futures with differing ambitions in this tough, unflinching look at life on the streets. Q (Omar Epps) dreams of being a disc jockey. But when his friends want him to join in a robbery, can he refuse and still keep their respect? Tupac Shakur co-stars.

featureResponse.title: Juno
featureResponse.shortSummary: An unexpected pregnancy sends a wisecracking high-school teen down an unusual path in this endearing comedy.
featureResponse.summary: An unexpected pregnancy sends a wisecracking teen down an unusual path in this comedy. Ellen Page stars as the quirky Juno who makes the tough decision to give the baby up for adoption. But as the months count down toward the big day and she grows closer to the couple she has chosen to adopt the child, Juno comes to some realizations that will change her perspective forever.

featureResponse.title: Jupiter Ascending
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young woman in Chicago learns that she is the reincarnation of the Queen of the Universe.
featureResponse.summary: A hunter from another planet tracks down an impoverished young Russian immigrant living in Chicago and informs her that she is the reincarnation of the Queen of the Universe, with the power to control the cosmos.

featureResponse.title: Jurassic World
featureResponse.shortSummary: The genetically spawned dinosaurs of 'Jurassic World' escape and wreak havoc on the park's terrified visitors in this blockbuster sequel.
featureResponse.summary: Bringing dinosaurs back to life just wasn't enough. With Jurassic World a massive success, the theme park's greedy brain trust decides to create a new attraction: Indominus Rex! The trouble is, this genetically modified super-dinosaur has its own agenda that includes terrorizing (and devouring) the throngs of tourists with help from the park's other escaped denizens.

featureResponse.title: Kamikaze
featureResponse.shortSummary: A would-be suicide bomber's plan to blow up a plane from Moscow to Madrid is detoured when a snowstorm delays the flight.
featureResponse.summary: A would-be suicide bomber's plan to blow up a plane from Moscow to Madrid is detoured when a snowstorm delays the flight and he gets to know some of his intended victims.

featureResponse.title: Keeping the Faith
featureResponse.shortSummary: A rabbi and a priest who have been best friends since childhood both fall head over heels for the same woman..
featureResponse.summary: A rabbi and a priest who have been best friends since childhood find their relationship strained when they are reunited with another childhood friend and both fall head over heels for her.

featureResponse.title: Killing Me Softly
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young American in London begins a passionate and kinky affair with a handsome stranger who may be a killer.
featureResponse.summary: A young American in London begins a passionate and kinky affair with a handsome stranger that quickly leads to marriage. But the more she learns about his mysterious past, the more she starts to fear for her life.

featureResponse.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
featureResponse.shortSummary: A tough street kid is recruited by a spy to join a super-secret espionage agency and battle a twisted tech genius.
featureResponse.summary: A tough street kid is recruited by a spy to join a super-secret espionage agency and battle a twisted tech genius who has concocted a diabolical plot to take over the world in this irreverent and stylish thriller.

featureResponse.title: Kissing a Fool
featureResponse.shortSummary: A groom-to-be and his best friend fall for the same lovely lady in this romantic comedy.
featureResponse.summary: It's a riotous race to the altar for a groom-to-be and his best friend who fall for the same lovely lady in this romantic comedy. David Schwimmer plays the flirty sportswriter who fears a future with only one woman. In order to gauge her level of loyalty, he enlists best bud Jason Lee to make a play for the future Mrs.--a plan that leads to romantic complications.

featureResponse.title: Kissing Jessica Stein
featureResponse.shortSummary: A straight girl's search for Mr. Right takes a turn when she gets involved with a bisexual woman in this delightful romantic comedy.
featureResponse.summary: A straight single girl is entangled in a dilemma of the heart when she begins a relationship with a bisexual woman in this romantic comedy. Jennifer Westfeldt stars as Jessica, a copy editor whose blossoming romance with gallery manager Helen (Heather Juergensen) is slowed by endless interruptions and Jessica’s hesitation to reveal the details of her new partner’s gender!

featureResponse.title: Kiss the Girls
featureResponse.shortSummary: A detective tracks a serial killer with the help of a doctor who escaped from the maniac in this thriller based on James Patterson's novel.
featureResponse.summary: A ladykiller prowls the Carolina woods...and Morgan Freeman tracks his murderous trail in this sleek suspenser based on the thrilling bestseller from James Patterson. Is the police psychologist's own niece among the criminal's "collection" of kidnapped women? Aided by a beautiful doctor who escaped from the psychopath's clutches, Freeman fights time to find the awful truth.

featureResponse.title: A Knight's Tale
featureResponse.shortSummary: A 14th-century peasant puts a lance through the class system when he poses as a knight in order to join the nobles sport of jousting.
featureResponse.summary: A 14th-century peasant puts a lance through the class system in this entertaining tale with a contemporary touch. Heath Ledger stars as the young squire whose desire to change his fate leads him to pose as a knight...in order to join the nobles-only sport of jousting!

featureResponse.title: Knocked Up
featureResponse.shortSummary: A booze-fueled roll in the hay results in an unexpected pregnancy for an ambitious TV reporter and a scraggly slacker in this hit comedy.
featureResponse.summary: He's a scraggly slacker with a penchant for pot; she's an ambitious TV reporter who has just gotten her big break. Their chance meeting in a nightclub leads to a booze-fueled roll in the hay...and a big shock when she discovers she's pregnant! Can these two polar opposites put their differences aside and make it work for the sake of the baby? They have nine months to find out!

featureResponse.title: Kuffs
featureResponse.shortSummary: Christian Slater takes the reigns of a San Francisco police-protection organization in this action-comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Christian Slater takes the reins of a police-protection organization in this action-comedy. Young George Kuffs (Slater) is working with his older brother Brad, who runs a "Patrol Special" district--protecting cops while on the job. But when Brad is suddenly murdered, George takes over the organization and must choose whether to avenge his brother's death or follow the law.

featureResponse.title: Kull the Conqueror
featureResponse.shortSummary: Kevin Sorbo ('Hercules') tackles the title role as the battle-ready brute in this action-packed medieval fantasy.
featureResponse.summary: Kevin Sorbo ('Hercules') is a battle-ready brute in this medieval fantasy. A former slave, Kull rises to royalty when he duels a king and inherits the dying noble's title and kingdom. But in an attempt to dethrone Kull, the powerful minions of the former royal conjure up a fiendish witch from the beyond who puts the untouchable spirit and strength of Kull to the ultimate test.

featureResponse.title: Kung Fu Panda
featureResponse.shortSummary: A portly panda becomes an unlikely kung-fu fighting guardian of a peaceful valley community in this animated hit.
featureResponse.summary: A portly panda becomes an unlikely kung-fu fighting guardian of a peaceful valley community in this animated hit. It's time for a new Dragon Warrior to be chosen and five contenders stand before the great (and possibly senile) temple master. To the shock of everyone, he picks an overweight panda named Po--who must then prepare to take on the evil Tai Lung in a kung-fu battle!

featureResponse.title: Kung Pow! Enter the Fist
featureResponse.shortSummary: Steve Oedekerk added new footage and dialogue to a 1976 martial-arts film to form this hilarious parody about a vengeful warrior.
featureResponse.summary: A great warrior called Chosen One...his evil nemesis Master Pain (better known as Betty)...a one-breasted female warrior...a black-belt cow. They all come together to form the prime comic ingredients in this insane comedy from writer-director-producer Steve Oedekerk--who made the film by redubbing and adding footage to a 1976 martial-arts flick called 'Tiger Crane Fists.'

featureResponse.shortTitle: Lady Day at Emerson's Bar & Grill
featureResponse.title: Lady Day at Emerson's Bar & Grill
featureResponse.shortSummary: Tony Award-winner Audra McDonald plays Billie Holiday in this adaptation of the hit Broadway play.
featureResponse.summary: Tony Award-winner Audra McDonald plays Billie Holiday in this adaptation of the hit Broadway play.

featureResponse.title: The Laramie Project
featureResponse.shortSummary: A groundbreaking drama that recreates the efforts of a NYC theater troupe who traveled to the scene of a gay man's brutal murder.
featureResponse.summary: What happens to an American town when a terrible crime rips it apart and thrusts it into the national spotlight? That is the question that led a New York City theatre troupe to the town of Laramie, Wyoming, to seek out residents whose lives were changed after a gay college student named Matthew Shepard was brutally beaten, tied to a fence and left for dead off a rural road.

featureResponse.title: The Last Castle
featureResponse.shortSummary: Robert Redford stars as an incarcerated former general who leads his fellow prisoners to rebel against a tyrannical warden.
featureResponse.summary: On the most unlikely of battlegrounds, one man is about to inspire a mutiny steeped in patriotism and pride. Robert Redford stars as a three-star U.S. general who is sent to a fortress-like prison for disobeying orders where he finds himself leading his fellow prisoners to rebel against a tyrannical warden.

featureResponse.title: Las Horas Muertas (Empty Hours)
featureResponse.shortSummary: A teen takes over running his uncle's no-tell motel on the coast of Veracruz for the summer and becomes smitten with an older woman.
featureResponse.summary: A 17-year-old boy takes over running his uncle's no-tell motel on the coast of Veracruz for the summer and becomes smitten with an older woman neglected by her lover in this languid drama called "a delight...captivating" by the NY Times.

featureResponse.title: The Late Shift
featureResponse.shortSummary: David Letterman and Jay Leno battle for Johnny Carson's vacant job in this compelling story of the late-night talk-show wars.
featureResponse.summary: In 1990, Johnny Carson announced he was retiring...and all hell broke loose. While NBC schemed, CBS dreamed, and the question on everyone's lips was 'Who will get Johnny's job?' Jay Leno thought he deserved it, David Letterman knew he had earned it, and everybody else wanted a piece of the action. Kathy Bates won a Golden Globe(R) for her performance.

featureResponse.title: La jaula de oro
featureResponse.shortSummary: Teens from the slums of Guatemala journey north to find a better life in the United States.
featureResponse.summary: Teens from the slums of Guatemala journey north to find a better life in the United States in this harrowing drama.

featureResponse.title: La mujer de mi hermano
featureResponse.shortSummary: Stuck in a stale marriage, an unfulfilled young woman begins a steamy affair with her husband's younger brother.
featureResponse.summary: Stuck in a stale marriage, a beautiful, sexually unfulfilled young woman begins a steamy affair with her vain husband's free-spirited younger brother.

featureResponse.title: Legally Blondes
featureResponse.shortSummary: The perky British cousins to Elle Woods bring a similarly smashing sense of style and attitude to an L.A. prep school.
featureResponse.summary: The perky British cousins to Elle Woods of the original 'Legally Blonde' bring a similarly smashing sense of style and attitude to an L.A. prep school in this third film in the series.

featureResponse.title: The Leisure Class
featureResponse.shortSummary: A charming English con man's scheme to marry a wealthy socialite comes unraveled with the arrival of his wild and unpredictable brother.
featureResponse.summary: A charming con man's scheme to marry a wealthy socialite comes unraveled when his wild and unpredictable brother arrives on the night before the wedding. Directed by 'Project Greenlight' Season 4 winner Jason Mann, the film stars Ed Weeks as the sneaky William Rooney who desperately tries to keep the ruse--and his real identity--under wraps over the course of one crazy evening.

featureResponse.title: The Leopards Take Manhattan: The Little Band That Roared
featureResponse.shortSummary: A profile of the young members of the Louisville Leopard Percussionists as they embark on a trip from their Kentucky home to NYC.
featureResponse.summary: Prepare for a fun-filled, emotional journey with 52 young musicians from a variety of backgrounds! This delightful film--the final installment in HBO's acclaimed 'The Music in Me' specials--profiles the young members of the Louisville Leopard Percussionists as they embark on a trip from their Kentucky home to the Big Apple.

featureResponse.title: Less Than Zero
featureResponse.shortSummary: Spoiled teenagers surrounded by the wealth and decadence of L.A.'s fast lane head for tragedy in this glossy, compelling melodrama.
featureResponse.summary: Spoiled teenagers surrounded by the wealth and decadence of L.A.'s fast lane head for tragedy in this glossy, compelling melodrama. Rich and ambitious, young Clay (Andrew McCarthy) goes East to an Ivy League college. But when he returns for Christmas, he finds his girl involved with his best friend--who is hooked on cocaine. With Jami Gertz, Robert Downey Jr. and James Spader.

featureResponse.shortTitle: Les ovejas no pierden el tren
featureResponse.title: Les ovejas no pierden el tren (Sidetracked)
featureResponse.shortSummary: The midlife crises of three Spanish couples are played for laughs in this warm romantic comedy.
featureResponse.summary: The midlife crises of three Spanish couples are played for laughs in this warm romantic comedy starring Raul Arevalo, Inma Cuesta, Alberto San Juan, Candela Pena, Jorge Bosch, Irene Escolar, Kiti Manver. Directed and written by Alvaro Fernandez Armero.

featureResponse.title: License to Drive
featureResponse.shortSummary: Teenage heartthrob Corey Haim steers a prized Caddy on the highway of love in this boisterous comedy hit.
featureResponse.summary: Get your learner's permit for laughs when teenage heartthrob Corey Haim tries to hit the highway of love in this boisterous comedy hit. The good news is, he has a date with his dream girl. The bad news is, he flunked his driving test, so he swipes his grandfather's prized Cadillac and steers straight for disaster. Pal Corey Feldman keeps the laugh action speeding along.

featureResponse.title: Life Support
featureResponse.shortSummary: An HIV-positive woman's work at an AIDS outreach group helps her atone for the past, but winning back her family proves more difficult.
featureResponse.summary: Oscar(R)-nominee Queen Latifah stars as an HIV-positive Brooklyn woman who channels her energy and regret over past drug addiction into working for an AIDS outreach group. Her passion for her job reveals her deep desire for atonement, but her stubbornness threatens to drive her family even further away leading her to learn a poignant lesson about loving...and letting go.

featureResponse.title: Life With Mikey
featureResponse.shortSummary: Struggling talent agent Michael J. Fox discovers a gifted street urchin in this 1993 family comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Former child star Michael J. Fox is reduced to running a failing talent agency for child stars--that is, until he is pickpocketed by a street urchin whose imagination and magnetism are obvious signs of acting ability. As he takes her in to groom her for an upcoming commercial, the pair discover they have much to learn from each other.

featureResponse.title: Like Mike
featureResponse.shortSummary: Lil' Bow Wow stars as a young orphan who becomes an NBA superstar when he acquires a pair of sneakers once owned by a basketball legend.
featureResponse.summary: Lil' Bow Wow stars as a young orphan who becomes an NBA superstar when he acquires a pair of sneakers once owned by a basketball legend. The shoes are electrocuted as young Calvin makes a wish to be like his idol and soon he's dribbling circles around the best ball players in the NBA...and continuing his search for an adoptive family.

featureResponse.title: Like Mike 2: Streetball
featureResponse.shortSummary: Magical basketball sneakers transform a wispy young hoops player into a slam-dunking superstar in this comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Magical basketball sneakers transform a wispy young hoops player into a slam-dunking superstar in this comedy. Jerome Jenkins Junior (Jascha Washington) becomes an instant legend on his local streetball and even gets a cool nickname--"Triple J"--but his arrogant new off-court attitude is nothing but an air ball to his family and friends.

featureResponse.title: A Little Chaos
featureResponse.shortSummary: Kate Winslet stars as a gardener hired to bring her unconventional style to the Gardens of Versailles for King Louis XIV.
featureResponse.summary: Oscar(R)-winner Kate Winslet stars as gardener Sabine de Barra, who is hired by landscaper Andre Le Notre to bring her unconventional style to the Gardens of Versailles for King Louis XIV. Matthias Schoenaerts, Alan Rickman and Stanley Tucci co-star in this lush period drama.

featureResponse.title: Living Out Loud
featureResponse.shortSummary: A lonely, recently divorced New Yorker tries to reinvent herself with the help of her doorman and a sassy nightclub singer.
featureResponse.summary: Holly Hunter and Danny De Vito give "a master class in the craft of acting" (Roger Ebert) in this bittersweet comedy-drama co-starring Queen Latifah. Hunter plays a lonely, recently divorced New Yorker who tries to reinvent herself with the help of her doorman (DeVito) and a sassy nightclub singer (Latifah) whom she befriends.

featureResponse.title: The Longest Ride
featureResponse.shortSummary: A couple's budding affair is complicated by a fateful encounter with a nonagenarian, which changes their lives forever.
featureResponse.summary: While preparing for a job in New York, a college student falls for a champion bull rider attempting a comeback. But their budding affair is complicated by a fateful encounter with a nonagenarian, which changes their lives forever.

featureResponse.title: Longford
featureResponse.shortSummary: 'HBO Films' drama about Frank Pakenham, the Earl of Longford, and his controversial friendship with notorious child-killer Myra Hindley.
featureResponse.summary: Frank Aungier Pakenham, the 7th Earl of Longford, was one of the most controversial public figures in modern British history, a crusader with a proclivity for championing lost causes. But it was his last cause--an unlikely friendship with reviled child-killer Myra Hindley--that would undermine his political career and, possibly, her 36-year attempt to win her freedom.

featureResponse.title: Lost River
featureResponse.shortSummary: A single mother and her two sons struggle to survive in what's left of their decaying city in Ryan Gosling's directorial debut.
featureResponse.summary: Ryan Gosling makes his directorial debut with this surreal, Lynchian film about a single mother and her two sons trying to survive in what's left of their decaying city. Starring Christina Hendricks, Saoirse Ronan, Iain de Caestecker and Matt Smith with Eva Mendes and Ben Mendelsohn. Written and directed by Ryan Gosling.

featureResponse.title: Los ases del corral (Barnyard Aces)
featureResponse.shortSummary: In this animated short, a mischievous chick wants to get a jukebox.
featureResponse.summary: In this animated short, a mischievous chick wants to get a jukebox.

featureResponse.title: Los Contreras Familia (The Contreras Family)
featureResponse.shortSummary: A dysfunctional family whose members are criminals--unbeknownst to one another--hide evidence when they notice cops outside their home.
featureResponse.summary: A dysfunctional family whose members are criminals--unbeknownst to one another--hide evidence when they notice cops outside their home. Luis Alonso Moreno, Carlos Herrera, Denis Montes and Concepcion Marquez star in this short film. Written and directed by Alejandro Becerril Elias.

featureResponse.title: Los insolitos peces gato (The Amazing Catfish)
featureResponse.shortSummary: An aimless twentysomething finds her place in the home of a single mother dying of AIDS and her four children.
featureResponse.summary: An aimless twentysomething finds her place in the home of a single mother dying of AIDS and her four children in this 'charming...sweetly emotional' (Variety) film.

featureResponse.title: Love & Basketball
featureResponse.shortSummary: Next-door neighbors fall in love and grow up to become big-time hoop stars, but have to choose between each other and the game.
featureResponse.summary: "Sanaa Lathan and Omar Epps are a dream team" (San Francisco Chronicle) in this critically acclaimed romance about next-door neighbors who fall in love and grow up to become big-time hoop stars. But their love of the sport will force them to choose between each other and the game.

featureResponse.title: Lucky Numbers
featureResponse.shortSummary: TV weatherman John Travolta and girlfriend Lisa Kudrow plot to rig the state lottery in this hilarious comedy.
featureResponse.summary: TV weatherman John Travolta is a local legend until money troubles inspire him to find his criminal side in this comedy. With help from girlfriend and lotto-ball girl Lisa Kudrow, they plot to rig the lottery, a scheme that goes hilariously awry. Tim Roth, Ed O'Neill, Michael Rapaport and Bill Pullman co-star.

featureResponse.title: Lucy
featureResponse.shortSummary: A woman gains superhuman powers after accidentally ingesting an experimental drug allowing her to harness 100% of her brain capacity.
featureResponse.summary: After accidentally ingesting an experimental drug allowing her to harness 100% of her brain capacity, a woman is transformed into an omnipotent avenging angel with superhuman powers.

featureResponse.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
featureResponse.shortSummary: Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron lead a battle-packed race across a post-apocalyptic wasteland in this fourth film in the 'Mad Max' series.
featureResponse.summary: George Miller returns to his high-octane, post-apocalyptic roots with his exhilarating fourth 'Mad Max' film. Tom Hardy takes over as Max who is captured by a violent band of warriors only to land in an escape plot led by Charlize Theron against their deranged leader. The result is a furious, battle-packed race across the wasteland that drops the hammer and never lets up.

featureResponse.title: Magallanes
featureResponse.shortSummary: A Peruvian cabbie who was once a brutal colonel's aide tries to make amends for his past sins.
featureResponse.summary: In this "taut, quietly gripping political thriller" (Variety), a Peruvian cabbie who was once a brutal colonel's aide tries to make amends for his past sins.

featureResponse.title: Magic Mike
featureResponse.shortSummary: Channing Tatum struts his stuff as a veteran male stripper who takes a naive, young newcomer under his wing.
featureResponse.summary: Channing Tatum struts his stuff as a veteran male stripper yearning for something more who takes a naive, young newcomer under his wing. Alex Pettyfer and Matthew McConaughey co-star in this 'funny, enjoyable romp' (New York Times) that was inspired by Tatum's own experiences as a teen in Tampa, Florida.

featureResponse.title: Magic Mike XXL
featureResponse.shortSummary: Three years after hanging up his G-string, hunky stripper Magic Mike reunites with his old gang to compete at a stripping convention.
featureResponse.summary: Three years after hanging up his G-string, hunky stripper Magic Mike reunites with his old gang--Ken, Big Dick Richie, Tarzan and Tito--for a raunchy and raucous road trip from Florida to Myrtle Beach to compete at a stripping convention.

featureResponse.title: Magnolia
featureResponse.shortSummary: Paul Thomas Anderson's rollicking epic that chronicles a tumultuous day in the lives of 12 disparate and often desperate people.
featureResponse.summary: 'Strange things happen all the time'--that's the common thread in Paul Thomas Anderson's rollicking epic that chronicles a tumultuous day--replete with an amphibious rainstorm--in the lives of 12 disparate and often desperate people. Nominated for three Oscars(R), including Best Original Screenplay. 'Four stars' (Roger Ebert).

featureResponse.title: Malcolm X
featureResponse.shortSummary: Denzel Washington stars as the controversial man who transformed himself into one of the great leaders of the 20th century.
featureResponse.summary: 'One of the great screen biographies' (New York Daily News)! Denzel Washington was nominated for a 1992 Best Actor Oscar(R) for his performance as the controversial man who transformed himself from a petty thief into one of the great leaders of the 20th century...only to be struck down by an assassin's bullet in 1965. Angela Bassett plays his wife, Betty Shabazz.

featureResponse.title: Mandrake Telefilm: Part 1
featureResponse.shortSummary: An intriguing case lands on Mandrake's desk. Just when he thinks he has it solved, some unexpected news changes the course of events.
featureResponse.summary: An intriguing case lands on Mandrake's desk. Just when he thinks he has it solved, some unexpected news changes the course of events.

featureResponse.title: Mandrake Telefilm: Part 2
featureResponse.shortSummary: After the murder of his client, Joao Paulo Birman, Mandrake investigates and uncovers new suspects--and Birman family secrets.
featureResponse.summary: After the murder of his client, Joao Paulo Birman, Mandrake investigates and uncovers new suspects--and Birman family secrets.

featureResponse.title: Manos Sucias (Dirty Hands)
featureResponse.shortSummary: An impoverished Colombian fisherman and his younger brother try to transport drugs up the Pacific coast to Panama.
featureResponse.summary: In search of a better life, an impoverished Colombian fisherman and his younger brother try to transport drugs up the Pacific coast to Panama while contending with the coast guard, a thief and local paramilitaries.

featureResponse.title: The Man from U.N.C.L.E.
featureResponse.shortSummary: An American spy reluctantly teams up with a KGB agent to take down a mysterious international crime organization.
featureResponse.summary: The classic 1960s spy series--which James Bond creator Ian Fleming had a hand in developing--comes to the big screen in this stylish and exciting update. Henry Cavill stars as American agent Napoleon Solo, who reluctantly teams up with KGB operative Ilya Kuryakin (Armie Hammer) to take down a mysterious international crime organization.

featureResponse.title: Maria y el arana (Maria and the Spiderman)
featureResponse.shortSummary: A 13-year-old girl living in a Buenos Aires shantytown falls for a 17-year-old boy who earns a living juggling in a Spiderman costume.
featureResponse.summary: A 13-year-old girl living in a Buenos Aires shantytown falls for a 17-year-old boy who earns a living juggling in a Spiderman costume.

promotionResponse.title: The Martian: Sneak Peek
promotionResponse.shortSummary: A quick look at the film 'The Martian.'
promotionResponse.summary: A quick look at the film 'The Martian.'

featureResponse.title: Mary and Martha
featureResponse.shortSummary: Two very different women forge a bond steeped in tragedy and African culture in this uplifting tale.
featureResponse.summary: Two women forge a unique bond steeped in tragedy in this uplifting, emotional film. Hilary Swank stars as an interior designer who takes her little boy on an extended trip to Africa; Brenda Blethyn is an English housewife whose own son heads to Africa as a volunteer. When malaria strikes, the lives of these two women are changed forever, uniting them on an epic journey.

featureResponse.title: Material Girls
featureResponse.shortSummary: Sisters Hilary and Haylie Duff vow to save their late father's cosmetics company from being sold to the competition in this witty comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Sisters Hilary and Haylie Duff vow to save their late father's cosmetics company from being sold to the competition in this witty comedy. Co-starring Anjelica Huston, Lukas Haas and Maria Conchita Alonso as Inez with Brent Spiner.

featureResponse.title: Max
featureResponse.shortSummary: After his handler is killed in Afghanistan, a traumatized military dog is adopted by the soldier's family.
featureResponse.summary: After his handler is killed in Afghanistan, a traumatized military dog is sent back to the U.S., where he is adopted by the soldier's family and develops a strong bond with his handler's younger brother.

featureResponse.title: Mean Streets
featureResponse.shortSummary: Martin Scorsese's stark, realistic look at the life of a loan shark on the streets of Manhattan's Little Italy.
featureResponse.summary: A stark, realistic look at the life of a loan shark on the streets of Manhattan's Little Italy. This gritty 1973 crime drama was a breakthrough for both Robert De Niro and director Martin Scorsese.

featureResponse.shortTitle: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
featureResponse.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
featureResponse.shortSummary: A quirky high-school senior strikes up an unexpected friendship with a Leukemia-stricken classmate in this poignant, funny tale.
featureResponse.summary: A quirky high-school senior strikes up an unexpected friendship with a Leukemia-stricken classmate in this poignant, funny tale. Greg works hard to stay below the radar while making film parodies with his best--and pretty much only--friend Earl. When he's pushed by his parents to visit the ailing Rachel, a girl he barely knows, his life heads off in a surprising new direction.

featureResponse.title: Mike Tyson: Undisputed Truth
featureResponse.shortSummary: Former heavyweight champion Mike Tyson and legendary filmmaker Spike Lee bring Tyson's one-man hit stage show to HBO in this special.
featureResponse.summary: Former heavyweight champion Mike Tyson and legendary filmmaker Spike Lee bring Tyson's one-man hit stage show to HBO in this exclusive HBO Films presentation. Enjoy a front-row seat as 'Iron Mike' opens up about his troubled youth, landmark boxing career, key influences, controversies, prison, loss, and most recently, his rehabilitation and redemption.

featureResponse.title: Milk
featureResponse.shortSummary: Sean Penn delivers a superb, Oscar(R)-winning performance in this story of famed gay-rights activist and politician Harvey Milk.
featureResponse.summary: Sean Penn delivers a superb, Oscar(R)-winning performance in this story of famed gay-rights activist and politician Harvey Milk.The film chronicles Milk's move from New York to San Francisco in the early 1970s, his impressive rise up the political ladder to become the first openly gay man to reach a major U.S. public office, and his tragic and shocking assassination in 1978.

featureResponse.title: Millennium
featureResponse.shortSummary: An airplane crash investigator meets a mysterious blonde at the site of a disaster...and discovers she's a time-traveling alien.
featureResponse.summary: Past, present and future converge in this 'intriguing sci-fi mystery' ('New York Post') about lovers from different millennia. Kris Kristofferson plays an airplane crash investigator who meets up with a mysterious blonde (Cheryl Ladd) at the site of a disaster. After falling in love, he discovers she's a time-traveling alien who knows more than she's telling about the crash.

featureResponse.title: Missing
featureResponse.shortSummary: A desperate American father searches through Chile for his son, who has mysteriously disappeared during the coup of 1973.
featureResponse.summary: A desperate American father searches through Chile for his son, a journalist who has mysteriously disappeared during the coup of 1973. Jack Lemmon and Sissy Spacek received Academy Award(R) nominations for their performances in this shattering drama. Based on a true story.

featureResponse.title: Miss Evers' Boys
featureResponse.shortSummary: Emmy(R)-winning story of a 1930s experiment in which the U.S. government withheld treatment from African American syphilis patients.
featureResponse.summary: Winner of the 1997 Emmy(R) for Best TV Movie! In the 1930s, U.S. government doctors began a controversial experiment. They withheld treatment from a group of African-American men infected with syphilis in order to study the fatal course of the disease...and they didn't tell the men what they were doing. Alfre Woodard plays a dedicated nurse caught in the web of official lies.

featureResponse.title: Mistress America
featureResponse.shortSummary: A lonely college freshman in New York City gets caught up in the whirlwind schemes of her free-spirited future stepsister.
featureResponse.summary: Greta Gerwig, whom Variety called "one of the great, fearless screen comediennes of her generation," co-wrote and stars in this "sharp, fast and witty" (Empire) screwball comedy about a lonely college freshman (Lola Kirke) in New York City who gets caught up in the whirlwind schemes of her free-spirited future stepsister (Gerwig).

featureResponse.shortTitle: Mom and Dad Save the World
featureResponse.title: Mom and Dad Save the World
featureResponse.shortSummary: A California couple are kidnapped by a lovestruck intergalactic despot in this riotous interstellar comedy.
featureResponse.summary: In the mood for total silliness on a planet of idiots? Then you couldn't do better than this comedy about a California couple kidnapped by intergalactic despot Jon Lovitz. He's fallen in love with Teri Garr, and unless she marries him, he'll destroy Earth!

featureResponse.title: Money Talks
featureResponse.shortSummary: A hustler who is wrongly suspected of being involved in a deadly prison break tries to clear his name with the help of a TV reporter.
featureResponse.summary: A small-time hustler who is wrongly suspected of being involved in a deadly prison break tries to clear his name with the help of an ambitious TV news reporter looking for a big story.

featureResponse.title: Mr. Kaplan
featureResponse.shortSummary: A grumpy old man sees opportunity when he learns of a mysterious German man he suspects is a Nazi in hiding.
featureResponse.summary: At 76 years old, Jacob has become grumpy and begins to question his self-worth. However, an unexpected opportunity to achieve greatness arises when he learns of a mysterious German prowling the shores of a nearby beach and suspects he is a Nazi in hiding.

featureResponse.title: Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium
featureResponse.shortSummary: Dustin Hoffman is the oddball owner of an old toy store with wild, enchanting wares in this family film.
featureResponse.summary: It's been a joy, but at the age of 243, the dazzling Mr. Magorium (Dustin Hoffman) is ready to pass on his world of magical playthings. His modest store manager Molly (Natalie Portman) is his preferred new proprietor, but can she get her confidence up to take creative control of the extra-special shop?

featureResponse.title: Muerte en Buenos Aires (Death in Buenos Aires)
featureResponse.shortSummary: The investigation of the murder of a wealthy gay man plunges a veteran police inspector into a dark mystery and sexual desire.
featureResponse.summary: The investigation of the murder of a wealthy gay man in 1980s Buenos Aires plunges a veteran police inspector into a dark mystery and sexual desire involving a young and handsome officer.

featureResponse.title: Muhammad Ali's Greatest Fight
featureResponse.shortSummary: Nine Supreme Court justices spar over the legitimacy of Muhammad Ali's conscientious-objector appeal during the Vietnam War.
featureResponse.summary: He was one of boxing's all-time greats, but Muhammad Ali's biggest challenge took place far from the ring--in the United States Supreme Court, where the justices debated the outcome of his 1971 conscientious-objector appeal during the Vietnam War. Christopher Plummer, Frank Langella and Benjamin Walker star in this riveting HBO Films drama.

featureResponse.title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
featureResponse.shortSummary: Muppets, music and Michael Caine power this delightful adaptation of Dickens' classic holiday tale.
featureResponse.summary: Muppets, music and Michael Caine power this delightful adaptation of Dickens' classic holiday tale about a penny-pinching grouch visited by ghosts who transport him to his past, present and future on Christmas Eve.

featureResponse.title: Music and Lyrics
featureResponse.shortSummary: Washed-up pop star Hugh Grant gets a second chance at success--and love--thanks to foxy Drew Barrymore in this lyrical romantic comedy.
featureResponse.summary: A washed-up pop star gets a second chance at success--and love--in this lyrical romantic comedy. Hugh Grant is the singer whose band peaked in the '80s. He is thrilled when a young pop diva asks him to write a song, but he hasn't written anything in years. Enter Drew Barrymore, whose latent writing talent bubbles to the surface as sparks begin to fly between the pair.

featureResponse.shortTitle: The Music in Me: A Family Special
featureResponse.title: The Music in Me: A Family Special
featureResponse.shortSummary: Kids from all over the U.S. and from diverse cultural backgrounds perform the music they love in this refreshing family special.
featureResponse.summary: HBO asked young musicians from all over the U.S. to send in videotapes of the music they play. The joyful result is this refreshing look at kids from diverse cultural backgrounds, each playing the music they love. Among the young people who are introduced are: 11-year-old Neidin, a tin whistle player; 10-year-old Tony, a jazz pianist; and 11-year-old Maddie, a fiddle player.

featureResponse.shortTitle: The Music in Me: Children's Recitals
featureResponse.title: The Music in Me: Children's Recitals
featureResponse.shortSummary: This HBO Family documentary profiles young musicians, ages 7 to 11, each from a different musical and cultural tradition.
featureResponse.summary: These kids play from the heart. HBO asked young musicians from all corners of the U.S. to send in videotapes of the music they play. The joyful result is 'The Music in Me,' the first of three HBO Family documentary specials that profile young musicians, ages 7 to 11, each from a different musical and cultural tradition.

featureResponse.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
featureResponse.shortSummary: Nia Vardalos stars as a girl who creates a stir within her traditional Greek family by falling for a guy with one flaw--he's not Greek!
featureResponse.summary: Nia Vardalos stars as a single girl who creates a major stir within her traditional Greek family by falling for a guy who has one fatal flaw--he's not Greek! John Corbett plays the handsome gentleman who gets swept up in a big Greek love story in this riotous 2002 Best Original Screenplay Oscar(R) nominee that has become one of the most successful independent films ever made.

featureResponse.title: My Zinc Bed
featureResponse.shortSummary: Alcohol addiction and obsession form the core of this searing adaptation of renowned writer David Hare's play.
featureResponse.summary: Alcohol addiction and obsession form the core of this searing adaptation of renowned writer David Hare's play. The three-character piece follows a poet and recovering alcoholic named Paul, the billionaire businessman who befriends and employs him, and the tycoon's alcoholic wife who has chosen her own road to recovery that doesn't involve AA meetings.

featureResponse.title: The Nativity Story
featureResponse.shortSummary: The birth of Jesus Christ and the arduous journey of his parents Mary and Joseph are chronicled in this compelling Biblical drama.
featureResponse.summary: The birth of Jesus Christ and the arduous journey of his parents Mary and Joseph are chronicled in this compelling Biblical drama. Inspired by the Gospel of Matthew, the film follows the story of the teenage Mary, her immaculate conception, the rough road that followed for her and her betrothed husband Joseph as they headed for Bethlehem, and the threat of wrathful King Herod.

featureResponse.title: Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising: HBO First Look
featureResponse.shortSummary: An inside look at this comedy sequel with Seth Rogen, Rose Byrne and Zac Efron.
featureResponse.summary: An inside look at this comedy sequel with Seth Rogen, Rose Byrne and Zac Efron.

featureResponse.title: Nightingale
featureResponse.shortSummary: David Oyelowo delivers a powerhouse performance as a troubled war veteran who comes unraveled in his isolation.
featureResponse.summary: David Oyelowo delivers a powerhouse performance as a troubled war veteran who comes unraveled. A compassionate depiction of isolation in the midst of a world ruled by social media, the film follows Oyelowo as Peter--the sole character in the film--who shares an ongoing monologue with himself via his laptop's video recorder...after admitting he has snapped and killed his mother.

featureResponse.shortTitle: Night at the Museum: Secret of/Tomb
featureResponse.title: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
featureResponse.shortSummary: Museum guard Ben Stiller discovers the late-night magic that brings the relics to life could be in trouble in this third 'Museum' film.
featureResponse.summary: At the American Museum of Natural History--where the exhibits come to life after dark--director of nighttime operations Ben Stiller discovers the late-evening magic could be in trouble in this third 'Museum' adventure. It's off to London's British Museum where Stiller and his late-night compatriots encounter a whole new pack of lively relics as they try to solve the mystery.

featureResponse.title: Normal Adolescent Behavior
featureResponse.shortSummary: A group of high school friends find their tight-knit bond shattered when one of them falls for her new neighbor.
featureResponse.summary: A group of high school friends vow to only be with each other--both emotionally and sexually. But their tight-knit bond is shattered when one of them falls for her new neighbor.

featureResponse.title: The Normal Heart
featureResponse.shortSummary: The early days of the HIV-AIDS crisis in 1980s New York City is the focus of this searing HBO Films drama.
featureResponse.summary: The early days of the HIV-AIDS crisis in 1980s New York City is the focus of this searing HBO Films drama. Adapted from Larry Kramer's Tony(R)-winning play, the film provides an unflinching look at the nation's sexual politics as gay activists and their allies in the medical community fight to expose the truth about the burgeoning epidemic to a city and nation in denial.

featureResponse.title: The Notorious Bettie Page
featureResponse.shortSummary: Gretchen Mol plays the 1950s pin-up girl in this film that reveals her traumatic youth and later rise into the role of sex goddess.
featureResponse.summary: One of the most idolized pin-ups of all time, Bettie Page had a fresh, breezy appeal that belied the pornographic content of her photos. Director Mary Harron ('American Psycho') looks at Page through a new lens, revealing her traumatic youth and the ease with which she assumed the role of sex goddess in often strange circumstances. Gretchen Mol stars as the 1950s idol.

featureResponse.title: No robaras (Thou Shall Not Steal)
featureResponse.shortSummary: A teen resorts to theft to care for her siblings after her mother is accused of trying to kill her abusive husband.
featureResponse.summary: When 16-year-old Lucia's mother is accused of attempted murder after pushing the abusive father of her baby down a flight of stairs, Lucia is left in charge of her siblings. Unable to find any help, she has no choice but to start stealing to support her family. Vanessa Alvario stars.

featureResponse.title: A Number
featureResponse.shortSummary: In a world where human cloning is a reality, two genetically identical brothers confront their father in separate, chilling encounters.
featureResponse.summary: In a world where human cloning has become a reality, two genetically identical brothers confront their father as they search for explanations into their past. Tom Wilkinson and Rhys Ifans star in this haunting drama in which the two young men discover they have genetic doubles...and want answers from their father. But will the disturbing truth be more than they can handle?

featureResponse.title: Odd Jobs
featureResponse.shortSummary: Five college buddies start their own moving business only to find themselves tangling with sleazy competitors and the mob.
featureResponse.summary: Nothing seems to work for five college buddies who thought they would have the time of their lives at summer jobs. Whether caddying, waiting tables or peddling vacuum cleaners, the boys just can't succeed. So why not start their own moving business? Before long, the Maximum Movers are tangling with sleazy competitors and the mob!

featureResponse.title: Olvidados (Forgotten)
featureResponse.shortSummary: Powerful look at the era of torture and mass killings committed by Bolivia's military dictatorship during the 1970s.
featureResponse.summary: This powerful, fact-based story exposes the era of torture and mass killings committed by Bolivia's military dictatorship during the 1970s.

featureResponse.shortTitle: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
featureResponse.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
featureResponse.shortSummary: Jack Nicholson at his Oscar(R)-winning best as a free-spirited drifter who goes to war with an iron-fisted nurse in a mental ward.
featureResponse.summary: Here's the powerhouse performance that won Jack Nicholson his first Oscar! He's R.P. McMurphy, a free-spirited drifter who fakes mental illness to get transferred from a prison work detail to the easy life of a state mental ward. But McMurphy hadn't reckoned on the iron-fisted Nurse Ratched (Oscar-winner Louise Fletcher). Winner of five Oscars, including Best Picture.

featureResponse.title: On a Clear Day
featureResponse.shortSummary: An unemployed middle-aged man sets out to conquer his depression by swimming across the English Channel.
featureResponse.summary: An unemployed middle-aged man sets out to conquer his depression by swimming across the English Channel. Peter Mullan delivers a 'quietly affecting performance' ('San Francisco Chronicle') as the Glasgow shipbuilder whose layoff inspires him to take to the waters with training help from his pals. Brenda Blethyn co-stars as his wife, who secretly takes a job as a bus driver.

featureResponse.title: Other People's Money
featureResponse.shortSummary: Danny DeVito stars as a ruthless corporate raider who is opposed by a beautiful lawyer whose agenda is to stop him any way she can.
featureResponse.summary: Meet Larry the Liquidator, one of the most ruthless corporate raiders ever to strut down Wall Street. He collects companies like other guys collect baseball cards, but he may have trouble making his latest acquisition. Opposing him is a beautiful lawyer, who's determined to stop him any way she can!

featureResponse.title: Ouija
featureResponse.shortSummary: An antique Ouija board opens a group of mourning teens to an ancient evil in this spine-tingling horror film.
featureResponse.summary: An antique Ouija board opens a group of mourning teens to an ancient evil in this spine-tingling horror film. Playing the age-old supernatural game in an effort to communicate with a dead friend, the teens instead encounter a sinister presence that wants them to join it. Starring Olivia Cooke, Daren Kagasoff, Douglas Smith and Bianca Santos.

featureResponse.title: Out on a Limb
featureResponse.shortSummary: Matthew Broderick is a big businessman whose fortunes are sidetracked by a family crisis in a rustic town.
featureResponse.summary: Businessman Bill Campbell (Matthew Broderick) is on the verge of sealing a major corporate deal when a hysterical call from his sister sends him on the road to the rough and rural town of Buzzsaw, California. Bill hopes to settle matters quickly and get back to business, but as he pulls up in his fancy car, the eccentric locals are ready to give him a crazy extended stay.

featureResponse.title: The Painted Veil
featureResponse.shortSummary: The loveless marriage between an upper-class lady and a quiet scientist turns upon their move to a remote, disease-filled Chinese village.
featureResponse.summary: The loveless marriage between an upper-class lady and a quiet scientist takes a turn upon their move to a remote, disease-filled Chinese village in this adaptation of W. Somerset Maugham's novel. Naomi Watts stars as the flighty socialite; Edward Norton is the husband who forces her to move with him to cholera-riddled Mei-tan-fu--where they finally get to know each other.

featureResponse.title: Pancho, el perro millonario (Millionaire Dog)
featureResponse.shortSummary: After winning the lottery, a pampered pooch becomes the target of kidnappers.
featureResponse.summary: After winning the lottery, a pampered pooch discovers that being rich isn't all it's cracked up to be when he becomes the target of kidnappers and unscrupulous businessmen.

promotionResponse.title: Pan: Sneak Peek
promotionResponse.shortSummary: A quick look at the film 'Pan.' Premieres Saturday, May 14th at 8pm.
promotionResponse.summary: A quick look at the film 'Pan.' Premieres Saturday, May 14th at 8pm.

featureResponse.title: Paper Towns
featureResponse.shortSummary: A teen goes on an quest to find his mysterious longtime crush after she suddenly vanishes following a prank-filled night of misadventures.
featureResponse.summary: From the author of "The Fault in Our Stars" comes this "irresistible" (Rolling Stone) coming-of-age dramedy about a teen who goes on an epic quest to find his mysterious longtime crush after she suddenly vanishes following a prank-filled night of misadventures.

featureResponse.title: Papita, Mani, Toston (Peanuts and Crackerjacks)
featureResponse.shortSummary: Baseball fans Andres and Julissa fall hard for one another and have to keep Andres' love of a rival team secret from Julissa's father.
featureResponse.summary: Andres and Julissa, both baseball fans, fall hard for one another and have to keep Andres' love of a rival team secret from Julissa's father. Starring Jean Pierre Agostini, Juliette Pardau, Miguelangel Landa and Jose Roberto Diaz. Written and directed by Luis Carlos Hueck.

featureResponse.title: Pathfinder
featureResponse.shortSummary: Born of one world, but raised in another, a young warrior finds himself standing at the center of a bloody war between the two cultures.
featureResponse.summary: Born of one world, but raised in another, a young warrior finds himself standing at the center of a bloody war between the two cultures. Orphaned during an ill-fated Viking journey to North America, a boy is raised by local Indians. When the Vikings return years later in a violent assault for land and slaves, it's up to 'Ghost' to lead his Native American brethren into battle.

featureResponse.title: Path to War
featureResponse.shortSummary: John Frankenheimer's powerful look at how President Lyndon Johnson became the symbol for the most unpopular war in U.S. history.
