featureResponse.summary: From director John Frankenheimer ('The Manchurian Candidate') comes this powerful drama of soaring ambition and shattered dreams that takes a provocative insider's look at the way our country goes to war--as seen from inside the LBJ White House leading up to and during Vietnam. Michael Gambon stars as the former president.

featureResponse.title: Pelo malo (Bad Hair)
featureResponse.shortSummary: The relationship between a precocious 9-year-old boy and his young, widowed mother is examined.
featureResponse.summary: This "artful, wrenching fable" (Boston Globe) examines on the relationship between a precocious 9-year-old boy and his young, widowed mother, who fears that her son may be showing early signs of homosexuality.

featureResponse.title: The Pentagon Wars
featureResponse.shortSummary: An honest Air Force officer tries to expose a case of government spending gone mad in this satirical comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Truth is stranger than fiction in this satiric comedy about an honest Air Force officer's attempt to expose a case of government spending gone mad! How could the government spend 17 years and $14 billion developing a simple troop carrier? Colonel Cary Elwes is determined to find out...and Pentagon general Kelsey Grammer is just as determined to stop him!

featureResponse.title: Pen Pals
featureResponse.shortSummary: Foreign pen pals tell their American friends about their daily lives through touching and informative letters.
featureResponse.summary: What is it like to live in exotic lands like Tibet, Hong Kong, Finland and Chile? This original HBO special, shot in four locations, gives you the chance to find out as foreign pen pals tell their American friends about their daily lives through touching and informative letters.

featureResponse.title: The Phantom of the Opera
featureResponse.shortSummary: Stirring adaptation of Andrew Lloyd Webber's Broadway smash about a disfigured stranger who haunts a Paris opera house.
featureResponse.summary: The music of the night is brought to vibrant life in this stirring adaptation of Andrew Lloyd Webber's Broadway hit. In 19th-century Paris, pretty chorus girl Christine Daae is secretly trained to sing by a masked man who haunts the opera house. Christine soon lands a lead role, but her romance with a childhood friend sends the scarred, lovelorn phantom into a deadly rage.

featureResponse.title: Phil Spector
featureResponse.shortSummary: Al Pacino and Helen Mirren star in this riveting HBO Films drama that follows the murder trial of legendary music producer Phil Spector.
featureResponse.summary: The client-attorney relationship between legendary music producer Phil Spector and defense lawyer Linda Kenney Baden--who represented Spector during his first murder trial--is explored in this HBO Films drama written and directed by David Mamet. Oscar(R) winners Al Pacino and Helen Mirren star in this work of fiction that recounts Spector's first trial in Lana Clarkson's death.

featureResponse.title: The Pianist
featureResponse.shortSummary: Roman Polanski's Oscar(R)-winner with Adrien Brody as a talented Jewish pianist struggling to survive during the Nazi occupation of Poland.
featureResponse.summary: Roman Polanski's masterpiece with Adrien Brody as a talented Jewish pianist who desperately struggles to survive during the Nazi occupation of Poland. Thomas Kretschmann co-stars in this film the San Francisco Chronicle called 'one of the great Holocaust films.' Winner of three Oscars(R), including Best Director (Polanski), Best Actor (Brody) and Best Adapted Screenplay.

featureResponse.title: The Piano
featureResponse.shortSummary: A passionate love affair ignites between an unhappily married mute woman and the man who bought her cherished piano in this acclaimed film.
featureResponse.summary: A passionate love affair ignites between an unhappily married mute woman and the man who bought her cherished piano in this acclaimed drama. Holly Hunter, Harvey Keitel, Sam Neill star in this 1993 hit. Winner of three Oscars(R), including Best Actress (Hunter), Best Supporting Actress (Paquin), and Best Original Screenplay (Jane Campion). 'Beautiful.' (The New York Times).

featureResponse.title: Pinochet's Last Stand
featureResponse.shortSummary: The fascinating story of former Chilean dictator Augusto Pinochet's surprise arrest for crimes against humanity while in London in 1998.
featureResponse.summary: In 1973, General Augusto Pinochet overtook Chile in a violent coup. During his 17-year rule, he suppressed all opposition, and gained a reputation as one of the world's most oppressive dictators. This HBO Films movie based on real-life events tells the fascinating story of Pinochet's surprise arrest for crimes against humanity while in London for back surgery in 1998.

featureResponse.title: Pitch Perfect 2
featureResponse.shortSummary: Anna Kendrick and her college a capella teammates try to restore their good name by winning the world championships in this sequel.
featureResponse.summary: The Pitch is Back! Led by fiery Anna Kendrick, college a capella stars The Bellas return to restore their good name after being utterly embarrassed in front of the President of the United States. Their seemingly impossible mission: to win the world competition in Copenhagen...where no American team has ever won. Co-starring Rebel Wilson, Hailee Steinfeld and Brittany Snow.

featureResponse.title: Play it to the Bone
featureResponse.shortSummary: Woody Harrelson and Antonio Banderas play over-the-hill boxer friends who get an unexpected shot at a big fight.
featureResponse.summary: Woody Harrelson and Antonio Banderas play over-the-hill boxer friends who get an unexpected shot at a big fight in this “wonderfully entertaining...raunchy and hilarious” (L.A. Times) knockout punch from the writer and director of “Bull Durham.”

featureResponse.title: Police Academy 3: Back in Training
featureResponse.shortSummary: In their third mad caper, the loony crimebusters try to save their beloved academy from being forced to close!
featureResponse.summary: The boneheads in blue are back! In their third mad caper, the loony crimebusters face their toughest assignment: to save their beloved academy from being forced to close! An outrageous battle is on when Commandant Lassard's half-wits pull out all the stops against the enemy.

featureResponse.title: Police Academy 5: Assignment Miami Beach
featureResponse.shortSummary: The pinheads of the penal code bring their hilarious brand of law and disorder to sunny Florida in this comedy sequel.
featureResponse.summary: Those pinheads of the penal code are spreading law and disorder through sunny Florida. Almost all the outrageous academy regulars reunite for a farewell salute to retiring Commandant Lassard. While pain-in-the-neck Captain Harris schemes to advance his own career, Lassard stumbles onto a cache of stolen diamonds.

featureResponse.title: Police Academy 6: City Under Siege
featureResponse.shortSummary: The bunglers in blue fight a major crime wave in this arresting comedy sequel.
featureResponse.summary: Hightower, Tackleberry, Jones, Callahan, Hooks--your favorite police pinheads are back for more arresting comedy. A crime wave has hit town, and our bunglers in blue are called in to save the day. But as usual, these klutzy clowns have enough trouble just staying on their feet, let alone trying to outsmart a thieving mastermind!

featureResponse.title: Police Academy: Mission to Moscow
featureResponse.shortSummary: The boobs in blue take on the Russian Mafia in this seventh slapstick cop farce.
featureResponse.summary: The boobs in blue take on the Russian Mafia in this seventh slapstick cop farce. When a top Russian cop needs help dealing with Moscow's crime wave, he calls on old friend Lassard, who sends Jones, Tackleberry, Callahan and Harris over to show the Russians how to fight crime...Police Academy-style!

featureResponse.title: Pretty in Pink
featureResponse.shortSummary: The 1980s teen classic with Molly Ringwald and Andrew McCarthy as lovestruck teens from opposite sides of the tracks.
featureResponse.summary: Can a girl from the wrong side of the tracks find love with a boy from the rich part of town? Molly Ringwald and Andrew McCarthy star as the lovestruck teens who battle peer pressure and their own prejudices in the quest for true love. 'Fascinating deep tones, surprising poignancy and tender humor' ('San Francisco Chronicle') highlight this hip, heartwarming comedy.

featureResponse.title: Primo
featureResponse.shortSummary: The atrocities of the Third Reich are witnessed through the vivid, first-person recollections of an Auschwitz survivor.
featureResponse.summary: The atrocities of the Third Reich are witnessed through the vivid, first-person recollections of an Auschwitz survivor. Adapted by Antony Sher from the memoir of Holocaust survivor Primo Levi and featuring Sher in the starring role, the film reveals Primo's gripping story of his capture and the scary subsequent tenure at the notorious Nazi concentration camp.

featureResponse.title: Proof of Life
featureResponse.shortSummary: Meg Ryan and Russell Crowe star in this tale about a housewife who falls for the man she hired to rescue her kidnapped husband.
featureResponse.summary: When an American engineer working in South America is abducted by mercenary terrorists, his wife Alice learns that there is only one man who can help. Rugged hostage negotiator Terry Thorne is experienced and powerfully effective, and after getting to know him, Alice begins to feel a strong attraction--whether or not the kidnappers give up her husband!

featureResponse.title: The Purge: Anarchy
featureResponse.shortSummary: A group of innocents run from murderous hordes during the annual Purge when lawlessness is permitted.
featureResponse.summary: It's 'Purge' time again: the one government-sanctioned night every year in which lawlessness--including murder--is permitted. With residents desperately trying to avoid the bloodthirsty hordes, one heavily armed man on a mission of his own becomes the unlikely guardian angel of four innocents. A 'satisfyingly creepy, blunt, down-and-dirty thriller' (New York Times).

featureResponse.title: Pu-239
featureResponse.shortSummary: A Russian nuclear-plant worker facing certain death from radiation exposure steals plutonium to sell in order to provide for his family.
featureResponse.summary: For a Russian nuclear-plant worker facing certain death after being exposed to a lethal dose of radiation, his wife and son's future is worth stealing for--even if it's the most dangerous substance on earth. Paddy Considine stars in this gripping thriller as the ailing man who steals weapons-grade plutonium--and heads for Moscow to attempt to sell it on the black market.

featureResponse.title: The Pyramid
featureResponse.shortSummary: Archaeologists uncover an incredible new pyramid in the Egyptian desert--and awaken an ancient curse with a bloodlust that knows no bounds.
featureResponse.summary: Archaeologists uncover an incredible new pyramid in the Egyptian desert--and awaken an ancient curse with a bloodlust that knows no bounds. Ashley Hinshaw, Denis O'Hare and James Buckley star in this harrowing horror film.

featureResponse.title: Racing Stripes
featureResponse.shortSummary: A little girl and her horse-trainer dad rescue a baby zebra who grows up thinking he's a racehorse in this family film.
featureResponse.summary: The barnyard fun begins when a little girl named Channing and her horse-trainer dad rescue a baby zebra they name Stripes. Growing up on the farm with his animal pals, Stripes yearns to race. Channing's dad gave up racing years earlier after a tragedy. Can he put aside the past in order to let Channing and Stripes prove their mettle in the Kentucky Open?

featureResponse.title: Raising Arizona
featureResponse.shortSummary: The Coen Brothers' cult comedy about a quirky couple whose child-bearing troubles prompt them to take one of a set of newborn quintuplets.
featureResponse.summary: An offbeat plot and off-center characters made this wacky farce the surprise hit of 1987. When small-time thief Nicolas Cage weds tough cop Holly Hunter, their marital bliss lacks only one thing: a baby. Why not snatch one of the quints just born to a famous local, Nathan Arizona? He'll never miss just one!

featureResponse.title: Ramona
featureResponse.shortSummary: An octogenarian announces she's ready to die, but changes her mind while her family is making the preparations.
featureResponse.summary: Prize-winning short film about an octogenarian who announces she's ready to die, but changes her mind while her family is making the preparations.

featureResponse.title: Real Women Have Curves
featureResponse.shortSummary: A Mexican-American teen struggles to strike a balance between her college ambitions and the pull of her traditional cultural heritage.
featureResponse.summary: Real women take chances, have flaws, embrace life...and have curves. In her feature film debut, America Ferrera stars as 18-year-old Ana, a first-generation Mexican-American from East L.A., who struggles between her ambition of attending college and her cultural traditions--as personified by Ana's needy mother, who wants the girl to work at the family's sewing factory.

featureResponse.title: Recount
featureResponse.shortSummary: Kevin Spacey stars in this gripping film that explores the human drama surrounding the controversial 2000 presidential election.
featureResponse.summary: In 2000, the presidential election boiled down to a few precious votes in Florida--and a mandatory recount that would add 'hanging chad' to the American political lexicon. Haggling over every ballot, Republican and Democratic campaigners waged a 36-day street fight in the Sunshine State--with the presidency of the United States as the ultimate prize.

featureResponse.title: Red State
featureResponse.shortSummary: Three horny teens are lured into the trap of a maniacal preacher and his followers in this lurid horror tale from director Kevin Smith.
featureResponse.summary: Three horny teens in search of sex are lured into the trap of a maniacal preacher and his followers in this lurid horror tale from writer/director Kevin Smith. The notoriously anti-homosexual Pastor Abin Cooper believes the End of Times is near...and his terrified captives are about to find out just how far he's willing to go to deliver his hellish message.

featureResponse.title: Refugiado
featureResponse.shortSummary: An abused pregnant woman and her young son go on the run from the boy's violent father and embark on a harrowing search for a safe haven.
featureResponse.summary: An abused pregnant woman and her young son go on the run from the boy's violent father and embark on a harrowing search for a safe haven in this powerful drama from Argentina.

featureResponse.title: Remember the Titans
featureResponse.shortSummary: Denzel Washington stars in one of his most unforgettable roles as the determined head football coach in a desegregated high school in 1971.
featureResponse.summary: Denzel Washington stars in one of his most unforgettable roles as the determined head football coach of a newly desegregated high school in 1971. Based on a true story, Washington portrays Herman Boone who must guide the racially diverse team to overcome the racism that contaminates their locker room before they can find success on the field. Will Patton co-stars.

featureResponse.title: Renegades
featureResponse.shortSummary: An undercover cop and a Native American man form an unlikely partnership aimed at a common goal: revenge.
featureResponse.summary: 'Young Guns' stars Kiefer Sutherland and Lou Diamond Phillips re-team in this rousing action film about an undercover cop and a Native American man who form an unlikely partnership aimed at revenge. Sutherland is the detective who is determined to expose police corruption, while Phillips wants to bring down the thug who killed his brother and stole an ancient tribal artifact.

featureResponse.title: Ricochet
featureResponse.shortSummary: Denzel Washington stars as an assistant D.A. who must face off against an ex-con he put away who is out of prison--and out for revenge.
featureResponse.summary: Two old enemies battle to the death in this electrifying crime drama. Denzel Washington is an assistant D.A. who once helped send John Lithgow to prison. Now Lithgow's out of the joint--and out for revenge!

featureResponse.shortTitle: A Ritmo de Fe (Rhythm of Faith)
featureResponse.title: A Ritmo de Fe (Rhythm of Faith)
featureResponse.shortSummary: A poor, but talented, dancer lands a spot as a contestant on a TV dance competition show.
featureResponse.summary: A poor, but talented, dancer relies on his faith to overcome obstacles and lands a spot as a contestant on a dance competition show on Dominican television.

featureResponse.title: Road House
featureResponse.shortSummary: Bouncer-for-hire Patrick Swayze sets out to clean up the baddest honkytonk in a Missouri town.
featureResponse.summary: Brawling, two-fisted action ignites this tale of a bouncer hired to clean up the baddest honkytonk in a Missouri town. Armed with a black belt in karate and a Ph.D. in philosophy, Patrick Swayze sets out to tame the Double Deuce for its owner. But bad guy Ben Gazzara wants the wrong side of town run his way and sends his men in to stop Swayze--any way they can.

featureResponse.title: RoboCop
featureResponse.shortSummary: Motown gets the ultimate law enforcer in a crime-riddled future when scientists use a murdered cop's body to create a cyborg crime fighter.
featureResponse.summary: Motown gets the ultimate law enforcer in a crime-riddled future when scientists use a murdered cop's body to create an unstoppable cyborg crime fighter. Director Paul Verhoeven's sci-fi cult classic stars Peter Weller as the first robotic member of Detroit's finest whose human memories begin to invade his computerized brain--and lead him on a bloody mission of revenge.

featureResponse.title: RoboCop 2
featureResponse.shortSummary: The cyborg super-cop is back to save crime-riddled Detroit from a deadly drug and a new cybernetic nemesis in this sequel.
featureResponse.summary: Peter Weller is back as the superhero cyborg cop in this sci-fi sequel set in a futuristic Detroit that is riddled with crime, thanks to a new drug. After being rebuilt, RoboCop finds himself facing a cybernetic nemesis: an evil drug lord whose brain and spine were used to create a tougher RoboCop. When the new Robo goes berserk, trusty old Robo comes to the rescue.

featureResponse.title: RoboCop 3
featureResponse.shortSummary: The cyborg super-cop returns to take on a devious real-estate conglomerate in this explosive third installment in the 'RoboCop' series.
featureResponse.summary: The cyborg super-cop returns to take on a devious real-estate conglomerate in this explosive third 'RoboCop' film. With the OCP corporation using force to jettison residents of a poverty stricken area so they can construct a massive high-rise, it's up to RoboCop to stop it. But with the police under OCP's payroll, he'll need the help of an underground movement to succeed.

featureResponse.title: Rocket Science
featureResponse.shortSummary: A stuttering New Jersey teen competes on a debate squad to win over his ambitious, beautiful teammate. Reece Daniel Thompson stars.
featureResponse.summary: A stuttering teen competes on a debate squad to win over his ambitious, beautiful teammate. High-school teen Hal Hefner has suffered relentless ridicule thanks to a persistent speech impediment. But when the sharp and pretty Ginny Ryerson persuades Hal to be her new debate partner after a team blunder, the outcast is coached to compete and may possibly stammer into love.

featureResponse.title: Rugrats in Paris: The Movie
featureResponse.shortSummary: Tommy, Angelica, Chuckie and the rest of TV's 'Rugrats' take the City of Lights by storm in this animated sequel.
featureResponse.summary: Tommy, Angelica, Chuckie and the rest of TV's 'Rugrats' take the City of Lights by storm in this animated sequel that Variety magazine called 'superior on every level' to the first film.

featureResponse.title: The Ruins
featureResponse.shortSummary: Youths partying in the Mexican sun are hunted by a carnivorous terror when they veer off the beaten path in this horror film.
featureResponse.summary: Youths partying in the Mexican sun are hunted by a carnivorous terror when they veer off the beaten path in this horror film. Exploring the jungle ruins of an ancient Mayan temple that isn't on any map, the co-eds find themselves trapped atop the structure--with gun-toting locals holding them there...while a bloodthirsty threat picks them off one by one.

featureResponse.title: Run All Night
featureResponse.shortSummary: Feared Brooklyn assassin Liam Neeson becomes the hunted one, running all over New York City on a bullet-riddled Christmas eve.
featureResponse.summary: Feared Brooklyn assassin Liam Neeson becomes the hunted one, running all over New York City from hired guns and the law in this non-stop action-thriller. Forced to kill his boss's screw-up of a son, Irish hit man Jimmy Conlon (Neeson) faces his former friend's cold-blooded wrath over the course of a bullet-riddled Christmas eve.

featureResponse.title: The Salton Sea
featureResponse.shortSummary: Val Kilmer stars as a drug-addicted jazz musician whose life hangs amidst a garish underworld of dirty cops and criminal lowlifes.
featureResponse.summary: Val Kilmer stars as a drug-addicted jazz musician whose life hangs amidst a garish underworld of dirty cops and criminal lowlifes. Told in flashback, the film follows Kilmer's character through an endless series of methamphetamine-influenced sequences in which he reveals his wife's murder, his fall into speed addiction and his shaky walk between the lines of two worlds.

featureResponse.title: Same Time, Next Year
featureResponse.shortSummary: Alan Alda and Ellen Burstyn co-star as two strangers who meet at a romantic little inn, become lovers and return annually for 26 years.
featureResponse.summary: They are happily married, but not to each other! Alan Alda and Ellen Burstyn co-star as two strangers who meet at a romantic little inn, become lovers and return annually for 26 years. This delightful, sophisticated comedy looks at the joys and problems of a long, loving relationship.

featureResponse.title: San Andreas
featureResponse.shortSummary: Dwayne Johnson races to save his daughter after an earthquake demolishes California in this mind-blowing disaster epic.
featureResponse.summary: When a terrifying series of earthquakes leaves California in ruins, intrepid rescue pilot Dwayne Johnson and his wife set out to save their daughter in demolished San Francisco--where a brilliant scientist has predicted the worst has yet to come! 'The CGI effects...are quite remarkable' (Christian Science Monitor). Carla Gugino co-stars.

featureResponse.title: Satisfaction
featureResponse.shortSummary: Justine Bateman rocks out as leader of an all-girl band that struggles with men and drugs during a summer resort gig.
featureResponse.summary: Cutting her 'Family Ties' to rock out as leader of an all-girl band, Justine Bateman stars in a song-filled coming-of-age tale. Leaving the city for a summer resort gig, Bateman and her motley crew find off-stage struggles with men and drugs as much a part of the scene as music.

featureResponse.title: Saving Grace
featureResponse.shortSummary: A widow with a mountain of debt is persuaded by her gardener to take the high road and raise some quick cash by growing marijuana plants.
featureResponse.summary: When newly widowed Grace discovers that her late husband left her with a mountain of debt, her gardener persuades her to take the high road and raise some quick cash by growing marijuana plants.

featureResponse.title: Saving Silverman
featureResponse.shortSummary: Two pals kidnap their third friend's fiancee in a moronic effort to prevent the marriage in this crazy comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Darren, Wayne and J.D. have been lifelong pals who have had little luck with the ladies. When Darren becomes engaged to the prickly Judith, Wayne and J.D. realize they must save him from making the biggest mistake of his life. The plan? Kidnap Judith and set Darren up with his long-lost high-school love Sandy--who is days away from becoming a nun!

featureResponse.title: Scary Movie 2
featureResponse.shortSummary: The Wayans brothers poke fun at horror films once again in this second installment in their hilarious and popular film series.
featureResponse.summary: The Wayans brothers poke fun at horror films once again in this second installment in their hilarious and popular film series. When a screwball group of college kids are lured to an old mansion (which was part of a comical 'Exorcist' parody in the opening scene), it's open season on all the tropes of the genre, from ghosts to deformed handyman.

featureResponse.title: Scream
featureResponse.shortSummary: Wes Craven's scary, funny horror parody about a high-school teen and her friends who are hunted by a masked killer.
featureResponse.summary: Wes Craven's scary, funny horror parody about a high-school teen and her friends who are hunted by a masked killer. One year after her mother's murder, Neve Campbell is tormented by a prank-calling psycho in a fright costume. A nosey reporter is sure the teen fingered the wrong person in her mother's death. Is the real killer still at large...or is a copycat at work?

featureResponse.shortTitle: The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
featureResponse.title: The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
featureResponse.shortSummary: Resort owner Sonny has to juggle plans to open a second property while making arrangements for his upcoming wedding.
featureResponse.summary: An all-star ensemble cast led by Judi Dench and Maggie Smith return for this warm and witty sequel to the 2011 hit “The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel.” This time, resort owner Sonny has to juggle plans to open a second property while making arrangements for his upcoming wedding.

featureResponse.shortTitle: The Secret of the Magic Gourd
featureResponse.title: The Secret of the Magic Gourd
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young boy begins a magical adventure when he finds a magical gourd that grants his every wish.
featureResponse.summary: A young boy begins a magical adventure when he finds a magical gourd that grants his every wish. Starring Gigi Leung, Zhu Qi Long and Peisi Chen with the voices of Corbin Bleu, Megan Hilty, Takayo Fischer and Drake Johnston.

featureResponse.title: The Seduction of Joe Tynan
featureResponse.shortSummary: Moving drama about the personal problems and family dilemmas of an ambitious young Senator.
featureResponse.summary: There are many ways to be seduced: by fame, by power--and by love. Senator Joe Tynan, Washington's ambitious new wonder boy, knows them all. Alan Alda wrote the screenplay and stars in this moving drama about the personal problems and family dilemmas of a very public person. Barbara Harris plays his wife; Meryl Streep is the other woman in his life.

featureResponse.shortTitle: The Seeker: The Dark is Rising
featureResponse.title: The Seeker: The Dark is Rising
featureResponse.shortSummary: A teenage boy discovers his destiny lies in leading the forces of Light against an evil uprising in this adaptation of the novel.
featureResponse.summary: A teenage boy discovers his destiny lies in leading the forces of Light against an evil uprising in this superb adaptation of Susan Cooper's novel. On his 14th birthday, young Will Stanton learns that he is fated to become the last of the Old Ones--ancient warriors who guard against the powers of Dark. With the help of four elders, Will begins to realize his latent powers.

featureResponse.title: Senseless
featureResponse.shortSummary: A college student volunteers for a medical experiment that gives him superhuman senses--along with some hilarious side effects.
featureResponse.summary: In order to beat a snooty WASP in a competition to win a dream Wall Street job, an underprivileged college student volunteers for a medical experiment that gives him superhuman senses--along with some hilarious side effects.

featureResponse.title: Shakedown
featureResponse.shortSummary: A legal-aid lawyer teams up with a detective to find out if a drug kingpin killed a cop in cold blood or in self-defense.
featureResponse.summary: Did a drug kingpin kill a New York City policeman in cold blood or in self-defense? That's what legal aid lawyer Peter Weller ('RoboCop') wants to find out in this gritty action drama. He teams up with undercover detective Sam Elliott to get at the root of the murder...but their task is complicated by the discovery of widespread police corruption.

featureResponse.title: She's All That
featureResponse.shortSummary: A mean-spirited wager prompts high-school hunk Freddie Prinze Jr. to pursue artistic Rachael Leigh Cook in this rom-com hit.
featureResponse.summary: A mean-spirited wager prompts high-school hunk Zack (Freddie Prinze Jr.) to pursue sensitive artist/uber-nerd Laney (Rachael Leigh Cook). But as the sensitive Laney is transformed by Zack and his popular pals, the arrogant jock begins to fall in love for real. Matthew Lillard, Paul Walker, Jodi Lyn O'Keefe, Kevin Pollak and Kieran Culkin co-star in this memorable 1999 hit.

featureResponse.title: Shrek
featureResponse.shortSummary: The 2001 Oscar(R)-winning Best Animated Feature about an ornery ogre who attempts to rescue a princess with the help of a chatty donkey.
featureResponse.summary: Winner of the 2001 Oscar(R) for Best Animated Feature! This 'Ugly Duckling'-style story follows the fortunes of Shrek, an ornery ogre who agrees to rescue a beautiful princess from a dragon's lair for a height-challenged lord. Joined by the exuberant Donkey, the cranky Shrek begins a journey that leads him to discover things he never thought possible--including love.

featureResponse.title: Shrek the Third
featureResponse.shortSummary: The motley green ogre prepares to deal with fatherhood and a possible kingship in this third riotous installment in the series.
featureResponse.summary: The motley green ogre prepares to deal with new responsibilities--including fatherhood and a possible kingship--in this third installment. For a guy who loves the simple swamp life, Shrek is dealing with more stress than one ogre can take. It's off with Donkey and Puss in Boots to find the other heir to the throne--while having one comical adventure after another.

featureResponse.title: Shrink
featureResponse.shortSummary: A burned-out, pot-smoking Hollywood psychiatrist struggles to cope with his own problems as well as those of his neurotic showbiz clients.
featureResponse.summary: Kevin Spacey gives a searing performance as a burned-out, pot-smoking Hollywood psychiatrist struggling to cope with his own problems as well as those of his neurotic showbiz clients, including a fading starlet, a paranoid agent, a sexaholic, a drug-addicted actor and an aspiring screenwriter.

featureResponse.title: The Signal
featureResponse.shortSummary: A computer-whiz MIT student tries to track down a mysterious hacker, only to find himself lured into a terrifying trap.
featureResponse.summary: In this "exceedingly stylish...sci-fi head trip" (Variety), a computer-whiz MIT student and his two friends try to track down a mysterious hacker who is taunting them, only to find themselves lured into a terrifying trap.

featureResponse.title: The Sissy Duckling
featureResponse.shortSummary: This animated updating of Hans Christian Andersen's 'The Ugly Duckling' tells the poignant tale of a duckling who doesn't fit in.
featureResponse.summary: Elmer is an unusual young duckling who doesn't quite fit in with the rest of the flock. But that doesn't mean he's a sissy--or that he can't be a hero to his family. Narrated by Sharon Stone, this HBO animated musical special, a delightful updating of Hans Christian Andersen's 'The Ugly Duckling,' features a star-studded voice cast.

featureResponse.title: Slayground
featureResponse.shortSummary: An amusement park becomes a deadly playground in this harrowing thriller. Peter Coyote plays a man stalked by a professional killer.
featureResponse.summary: An amusement park becomes a deadly playground in this harrowing 1983 thriller. Peter Coyote ('Jagged Edge') plays a man stalked by a professional killer. Mel Smith and Billie Whitelaw co-star.

featureResponse.title: Slither
featureResponse.shortSummary: Flesh-eating slugs from outer space lay siege to a small redneck town, turning locals into acid-spewing zombies in this horror-comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Flesh-eating slugs from outer space lay siege to a small redneck town in this horror-comedy. Arriving via meteorite, one slimy creature finds a human host to help breed millions of the killer slugs. As the bloodthirsty creatures turn the locals into acid-spewing zombies, it's up to a few survivors to stop the horrific invasion!

featureResponse.title: Smokin' Aces
featureResponse.shortSummary: The world's deadliest assassins converge on a Vegas casino to take their shot at a $1 million hit in this stylish action-thriller.
featureResponse.summary: The world's deadliest assassins converge on a Vegas casino to take their shot at a $1 million hit in this stylish action-thriller. Buddy Israel is a Vegas entertainer who's about to spill his guts to the Feds--if the killers hired by a mob boss don't spill them for real first! It's double-barrel action as bullets blaze all across the glitzy scene with Buddy in the middle.

featureResponse.title: Snakes on a Plane
featureResponse.shortSummary: Deadly poisonous snakes of all kinds are unleashed on the unsuspecting passengers of a red-eye flight in this high-altitude thriller.
featureResponse.summary: Deadly poisonous snakes of all kinds are unleashed on the unsuspecting passengers of a red-eye flight from Hawaii to L.A. in this high-altitude thriller. FBI agent Samuel L. Jackson is up to his eyeballs in venom as the nasty serpents sink their fangs into everything and everyone in their way--including the crew trying to fly the aircraft.

featureResponse.title: Snatch
featureResponse.shortSummary: An extremely large diamond is stolen and finds its way through several different hands in this darkly comic heist flick.
featureResponse.summary: The theft of massive diamond launches a wild goose chase as it goes through a number of hands including a pair of illegal boxing promoters (Jason Statham, Stephen Graham), a crooked gambler disguised as a Hasidic Jew (Benicio Del Toro), an unintelligible Irish boxer (Brad Pitt) and a toothy thug named Brick Top (Alan Ford), and even involves a dog who swallowed a squeaky toy.

featureResponse.title: Soapdish
featureResponse.shortSummary: A soap queen desperately tries to hold on to her starring role in the face of plotting by a jealous rival.
featureResponse.summary: You think the plots on those daytime soap operas are complicated? Wait until you see what goes on behind the scenes! Sally Field stars in this frenetic comedy as a soap queen trying to hold on to her starring role in the face of plotting by a jealous rival. Kevin Kline plays a no-talent leading man who was once her lover.

featureResponse.title: Soldier
featureResponse.shortSummary: Obsolete super-soldier Kurt Russell must battle his genetically enhanced replacement in a cold, forbidding future.
featureResponse.summary: In a desolate future, soldiers are trained in savagery from the moment they're born. Super-warrior Todd (Kurt Russell) is the best there is...until he becomes obsolete and is thrown into battle with a genetically enhanced model (Jason Scott Lee). Nearly destroyed and left on a remote trash planet, Todd slowly finds his humanity while preparing for the ultimate rematch.

featureResponse.title: Someone Had to Be Benny
featureResponse.shortSummary: The story of Benny Agrelo, a terminally ill 15-year-old who fought to live the remainder of his life on his own terms.
featureResponse.summary: This is the story of a dying teen who fought to live on his own terms. Benny Agrelo stopped taking the drugs that helped his body accept a transplanted liver due to side effects. After convincing his mother to let him live his last months 'without hurting,' Benny was taken from his family by court order--and had to go to court to fight for the right to determine his own fate.

featureResponse.title: Something the Lord Made
featureResponse.shortSummary: Fact-based story of a white surgeon and a black lab technician who revolutionized heart surgery amidst the racial injustice of the 1940s.
featureResponse.summary: Two men--one a wealthy white chief surgeon, the other a poor black lab technician--achieve a monumental medical breakthrough that earned one accolades...and the other a painful lesson in racism and unequal opportunity in 1940s Baltimore. Alan Rickman and Mos Def star in this 'HBO Films' drama.

featureResponse.title: Sometimes a Great Notion
featureResponse.shortSummary: The lusty, brawling members of an Oregon logging family refuse to join the union on strike in this stirring saga with Paul Newman.
featureResponse.summary: The lusty, brawling members of an Oregon logging family refuse to join the union on strike in this stirring saga. Paul Newman directed as well as stars as the eldest son of tough family patriarch Henry Fonda. With Lee Remick, Michael Sarrazin, 1971 Best Supporting Actor Oscar(R) nominee Richard Jaeckel, Linda Lawson and Cliff Potts.

featureResponse.title: Sometimes in April
featureResponse.shortSummary: Two brothers are divided by marriage and fate during the 100 horrifying days of the 1994 Rwandan genocide.
featureResponse.summary: In a nation decimated by ethnic rage, two brothers are divided by marriage and fate. This gripping drama based on true events focuses on the 100 horrifying days of the 1994 Rwandan genocide, when over 800,000 Tutsi people were killed by Hutu nationalists. Against this terrifying backdrop is the story of two Hutu brothers--one in the military, the other a radio personality.

featureResponse.title: Soul Plane
featureResponse.shortSummary: Tom Arnold, Kevin Hart, Method Man and Snoop Dogg star in this outrageous farce about the raunchiest flight in history.
featureResponse.summary: Get down for an airline film that the New York Times described as making 'Airplane' look like a 'vintage drawing-room comedy'! Tom Arnold, Kevin Hart, Method Man and Snoop Dogg star in this outrageous farce about the raunchiest flight in history--a high-altitude, cross-country party featuring wild antics from cockpit to coach and everywhere in between.

featureResponse.title: South Central
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young black man is determined to break the cycle of crime and imprisonment that has made up his life in this gritty urban drama.
featureResponse.summary: A young black man is determined to break the cycle of crime and imprisonment that has made up his life in this gritty urban drama. Two things help him toward his goal--the guidance of an older convict, and his love for his young son.

featureResponse.title: Spaceballs
featureResponse.shortSummary: The madcap leader of Planet Spaceball tries to steal air from a neighboring world in Mel Brooks' outrageous sci-fi spoof.
featureResponse.summary: Buckle up for the wackiest outer space adventure that ever rocketed across a screen! Mel Brooks takes on every sci-fi epic ever made in this 'deliciously dippy... goofy spoof' ('New York Daily News'). The lunacy begins when the planet Spaceball runs out of air, and its leader makes plans to steal the atmosphere of a peaceful, neighboring world.

featureResponse.title: The Special Relationship
featureResponse.shortSummary: The unique friendship shared by British prime minister Tony Blair and U.S. president Bill Clinton in the 1990s.
featureResponse.summary: They were two of the most powerful leaders of the free world who forged a loyal, if tempestuous, friendship out of the crucible of political necessity. Michael Sheen and Dennis Quaid star in the HBO Films drama that chronicles the 'special relationship' shared by British prime minister Tony Blair and U.S. president Bill Clinton in the 1990s.

featureResponse.title: Spy
featureResponse.shortSummary: CIA desk jockey Melissa McCarthy takes to the field to avenge her partner's murder and recover a suitcase nuke in this raucous spy comedy.
featureResponse.summary: CIA desk jockey Melissa McCarthy takes to the field to avenge her partner's murder and recover a suitcase nuke before it winds up in the wrong hands in this raucous spy comedy. Nominated for two Golden Globes: Best Picture-Comedy or Musical and Best Actress (McCarthy)-Comedy or Musical. With Jason Statham, Rose Byrne, Miranda Hart, Bobby Cannavale, Allison Janney and Jude Law.

featureResponse.title: Stanhope
featureResponse.shortSummary: A Brooklyn teen gets caught up in a web of violence as a paid assassin in this short film.
featureResponse.summary: A Brooklyn teen gets caught up in a web of violence as a paid assassin in this short film. Starring Malik Lockett, Johnnie Mae, Rob Morgan, Nedra McClyde and Simeon Buresch. Written and directed by Solvan Slick Naim.

featureResponse.title: State and Main
featureResponse.shortSummary: A large-scale movie crew turns a picture-perfect Vermont town upside down in David Mamet's highly amusing Hollywood satire.
featureResponse.summary: A large-scale movie crew turns a picture-perfect Vermont town upside down in David Mamet's highly amusing Hollywood satire. Between the film's troublesome stars (he beds a local teen, she won't do a nude scene) and the fact that 'The Old Mill' of the title no longer exists, it's a comical shoot from hell as only big-budget Hollywood can create.

featureResponse.title: Step Up All In
featureResponse.shortSummary: Champions from previous films reunite for an all-star competition in Las Vegas to win a casino dance contract.
featureResponse.summary: Featuring "stunning dance numbers" (Variety), this installment in the popular franchise reunites champions from previous films for an all-star competition in Las Vegas to win a casino dance contract.

featureResponse.title: Strictly Business
featureResponse.shortSummary: A buttoned-down exec cuts a deal with a mailroom buddy who promises to show him how to land the girl of his dreams.
featureResponse.summary: What happens when a buttoned-down exec falls for a downtown girl who thinks he's hopelessly square? Well, Joseph C. Phillips (TV's 'The Cosby Show') makes a deal with mailroom buddy Tommy Davidson (TV's 'In Living Color'): If Davidson shows him how to get with it, he'll show him how to get on the corporate fast track. Halle Berry co-stars in this hip romantic comedy.

featureResponse.title: Stuart: A Life Backwards
featureResponse.shortSummary: A poignant, tragic true story that traces in reverse the events that shaped a homeless man's life.
featureResponse.summary: Meet Stuart Shorter. He's a homeless, delusional, psychotic, substance-abusing ex-convict. And his life story is utterly irresistible. Adapted by Alexander Masters from his award-winning biography, this HBO Films production is a poignant, tragic true story that unfolds in reverse the life of a young boy who was transformed into a violent convict and substance abuser.

featureResponse.title: Sudden Death
featureResponse.shortSummary: Jean-Claude Van Damme races to stop terrorists from blowing up a packed hockey arena in this action-thriller.
featureResponse.summary: 'Van Damme's the man' in this 'whipcord-taut' action-adventure ('Variety') that pits the 'Muscles from Brussels' against a pack of loathsome thugs who threaten to blow a packed hockey arena to smithereens if they aren't paid $1.7 billion. With the U.S. vice president and his own children in attendance, fire marshal Jean-Claude Van Damme races to save the day.

featureResponse.title: Suicide Kings
featureResponse.shortSummary: A bunch of rich kids abduct a retired mafia boss to force him to help save the kidnapped sister of one of the boys.
featureResponse.summary: A bunch of rich kids abduct a retired mafia boss to force him to help save the kidnapped sister of one of the boys, but the cunning crook turns his captors against each other by playing clever mind games.

featureResponse.title: The Sunset Limited
featureResponse.shortSummary: A black ex-con and a suicidal white professor share a philosophical debate within the confines of a New York tenement apartment.
featureResponse.summary: From Cormac McCarthy comes this searing drama that explores the debate between belief and atheism...afterlife and nihilism...salvation and suicide. Starring Tommy Lee Jones and Samuel L. Jackson and set in a New York apartment, the film focuses on a high-stakes philosophical debate between a black ex-con who claims to hear the voice of Jesus and a suicidal white professor.

featureResponse.title: Superbabies: Baby Geniuses 2
featureResponse.shortSummary: A gang of super-intelligent toddlers must save the world from a global villain in this comedy sequel.
featureResponse.summary: A gang of super-intelligent toddlers must save the world from a global villain in this comedy sequel. These tots do more than play games--they devise a strategy to thwart the evil plans of media man Bill Biscane. Led by the super-child Kahuna, the brainy kids team up to stop Bill from launching a universal brainwashing program to take over children's minds.

featureResponse.title: Superstition
featureResponse.shortSummary: A reverend and his family move into a house that happens to be the cursed site of an evil witch's execution in this 1982 horror film.
featureResponse.summary: 'The victims who died...were the lucky ones!' blared the trailer for this rarely seen 1982 shocker. James Houghton, Albert Salmi, Lynn Carlin and Larry Pennell star in this vintage fright-fest about a family whose new home happens to be on the cursed site of an evil witch's execution in 1692. Now, the sinister spell-caster returns to avenge her death.

featureResponse.title: Super Troopers
featureResponse.shortSummary: You have the right to remain laughing at this outrageous comedy about a pack of screwball state troopers trying to save their jobs.
featureResponse.summary: You have the right to remain laughing at this outrageous comedy about a pack of screwball state troopers. Spurbury, Vermont isn't exactly a mecca of criminal activity, but when a dead body turns up, the 'staties' go all out to break the case and save their jobs while competing with local cops. The result is a film that is guilty of being hilarious in the first degree!

featureResponse.shortTitle: Sweeney Todd: Demon Barber of Fleet St
featureResponse.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
featureResponse.shortSummary: Johnny Depp is the vengeful barber whose victims become a tasty favorite of London in this adaptation of the hit Broadway musical.
featureResponse.summary: Johnny Depp is the vengeful barber whose victims become a tasty favorite of London in this adaptation of the hit Broadway musical. Sent away on false charges, Sweeney returns to his old shop above the shop of his landlady Mrs. Lovett, Sweeney sets about carving up his customers--and sending them downstairs where Mrs. Lovett can add them to her suddenly delicious pies!

featureResponse.title: Sweet Dreams
featureResponse.shortSummary: Jessica Lange stars in this bio-pic of Patsy Cline, the gifted, passionate queen of the Nashville sound.
featureResponse.summary: Before there was a 'coal miner's daughter,' there was Patsy Cline, the woman who inspired a whole generation of country singers. Jessica Lange stars as the gifted, passionate queen of the Nashville sound. Ed Harris co-stars as her husband. Patsy's own voice is on the rich country sound track.

featureResponse.title: Sweet Liberty
featureResponse.shortSummary: Summer madness strikes a small North Carolina town when a Hollywood film crew arrives to make an epic about the American Revolution.
featureResponse.summary: Summer madness strikes a small North Carolina town when a Hollywood film crew arrives to make an epic about the American Revolution. Alan Alda stars as the author of the lusty historical novel being filmed. But Hollywood wants to forget about the history and concentrate on the lust! Meanwhile, the actors are all too ready for romantic flings with the townspeople.

featureResponse.title: Sweet Sixteen
featureResponse.shortSummary: A Scottish boy becomes involved in a drug-dealing scheme that threatens his life and friendships in this drama.
featureResponse.summary: A Scottish boy becomes involved in a drug-dealing scheme that threatens his life and friendships in this drama. After he is assaulted by his mother's boyfriend and his own grandfather, young Liam steals their drug stash and with his pal Pinball's help runs away from home. Together, the duo deal in order to buy a trailer...until their work catches the eye of a local drug lord.

featureResponse.title: Switch
featureResponse.shortSummary: A dead man is refused entrance into Heaven unless he returns to Earth as a female and finds a woman who likes him.
featureResponse.summary: Boy, has Steve got a problem! After he is killed by three angry ex-girlfriends, God won't let him enter Heaven unless he can go back and find a woman on Earth who likes him. And Satan, who wants him for Hell, insists he return as a woman! Ellen Barkin stars as the new, improved (?) Steve in Blake Edwards' gender-bending comedy-romance. Jimmy Smits plays his/her best friend.

featureResponse.title: Take the Lead
featureResponse.shortSummary: A ballroom-dance instructor takes over detention class in an inner-city high school in this inspiring fact-based tale.
featureResponse.summary: In this fact-based tale, Antonio Banderas stars as dynamic ballroom-dance instructor Pierre Dulaine, who wakes up the minds and feet of a detention hall full of disaffected inner-city high-school students. After witnessing an incident of violence perpetrated by one of the students, Banderas decides that what this class needs is some class--and proceeds to teach them to tango!

featureResponse.title: Taking Chance
featureResponse.shortSummary: A military officer's life is changed after taking an assignment to escort home the body of a 19-year-old Marine killed in Iraq.
featureResponse.summary: In 2004, Lt. Col. Michael Strobl volunteered to escort home the body of a 19-year-old Marine killed in Iraq. It would prove to be a life-altering experience. Kevin Bacon stars as Strobl in this profoundly moving 'HBO Films' drama that looks at the military rituals for honoring its war dead from the perspective of one fallen soldier named Chance Phelps.

featureResponse.title: Tammy
featureResponse.shortSummary: After getting fired and catching her husband with another woman, a woman hits the road with her randy, hard-drinking grandmother.
featureResponse.summary: Melissa McCarthy co-wrote and stars in this offbeat blend of comedy and drama, about a frustrated, working-class Midwesterner who, after losing her job and catching her husband with another woman, decides to hit the road with her randy, hard-drinking grandmother.

featureResponse.title: Temple Grandin
featureResponse.shortSummary: An autistic woman becomes an unlikely hero to America's cattle industry--and to autistic people everywhere--in this fact-based story.
featureResponse.summary: Claire Danes shines in this fact-based story of an autistic woman who became an unlikely hero to America's cattle industry--and to autistic people everywhere. This HBO Films production is an engaging portrait of a stigmatized, misunderstood young woman who learned to channel her unique gifts into a brilliant career as a scientist, author and groundbreaking animal advocate.

featureResponse.shortTitle: Tenacious D in The Pick of Destiny
featureResponse.title: Tenacious D in The Pick of Destiny
featureResponse.shortSummary: The heavy-metal parody duo go in search of a guitar pick with the power to make its owners the greatest band in the world.
featureResponse.summary: The hilarious heavy-metal parody duo gets its own star vehicle in this cameo-filled comedy. JB and KG were two wandering souls who found each other and created a niche for impassioned hard rock with comic lyrics. Now they are looking for something else--a guitar pick with the power to make its owners the greatest band in the world. Only one problem: it's in a museum!

featureResponse.title: Thirteen Ghosts
featureResponse.shortSummary: A family's first night in their newly inherited house becomes a haunting experience in this electrifying remake of the 1960 chiller.
featureResponse.summary: Arthur Kriticos (Tony Shalhoub) is a financially troubled father of two who thinks his ship has just come in: he's inherited a dazzling mansion made entirely of movable glass and steel panels. Just one problem...his late uncle has stocked the place with a baker's dozen of the scariest and most murder-happy spooks ever seen!

featureResponse.title: Thunderbirds
featureResponse.shortSummary: A family that operates a top-secret organization battles their arch nemesis, who plans to rob the world's richest banks.
featureResponse.summary: A family that operates a top-secret international rescue organization battles their arch nemesis--The Hood--who plans to steal their high-tech equipment to rob the world's richest banks.

featureResponse.title: Thunderstruck
featureResponse.shortSummary: A teen's chance meeting with his idol, basketball star Kevin Durant, results in a mystical mix-up of hoops talent in this fun family comedy.
featureResponse.summary: A teen's chance meeting with his idol, basketball star Kevin Durant, results in a mystical mix-up of hoops talent in this fun family comedy. The youth--whose court skills ranged from slim to none--suddenly starts pouring in the points while the Oklahoma City Thunder superstar begins shooting nothing but bricks!

featureResponse.title: Too Big to Fail
featureResponse.shortSummary: A gripping look at the financial crisis of 2008 from the perspective of the insiders who prevented a global economic meltdown.
featureResponse.summary: In the mid-2000s, Wall Street was booming: record high bonuses, multimillion-dollar salaries, a skyrocketing housing market. But in 2008, it all came crashing down. This gripping drama chronicles that unprecedented financial crisis and the inner sanctum of men and women who played key roles in preventing a global meltdown unlike anything seen before.

featureResponse.title: Torque
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young biker burns rubber to set the record straight after he is framed for the murder of a gang leader's brother.
featureResponse.summary: A young biker burns rubber to set the record straight after he is framed for the murder of a gang leader's brother. Cary Ford is a young hot rodder who discovers that two bikes he's stored for shady fellow rider Henry contain a shipment of drugs. Cary hides the machines, but Henry enacts a deadly plan to get them back--leaving Cary running for his life.

featureResponse.title: Trabajo (Job)
featureResponse.shortSummary: An 11-year-old Dominican deaf boy searches for a job to help his struggling single-mother in this short film.
featureResponse.summary: An 11-year-old Dominican deaf boy searches for a job to help his struggling single-mother in this short film. Laura Gomez, Jafrar Paulino, Christian Gerez. Directed and written by Kase Pena.

featureResponse.title: Trainwreck
featureResponse.shortSummary: Amy Schumer is hilarious as a commitment-phobic writer who is terrified to find she may be falling for sweet sports doctor Bill Hader.
featureResponse.summary: Two of the funniest and most twisted minds in comedy--Judd Apatow and Amy Schumer--unite for this 'hilarious four-star ride' (New York Post). Commitment-phobic Amy (Schumer) has spent her adult life using and abusing men. But when she gets involved with a sweet sports surgeon (Bill Hader), she finds herself questioning everything she learned from her philandering father.

featureResponse.title: Transformers
featureResponse.shortSummary: Teenage nerd Shia LaBeouf finds himself at the center of a centuries-old war between two races of transformable alien robots.
featureResponse.summary: Sam is just your average teen who sees his purchase of a junky Camaro as the key to his manhood. But this is no ordinary car and Sam finds himself at the center of a war between two races of transformable alien robots: the Autobots and the Decepticons. With the world doomed if the Decepticons win, it's up to Sam and the Autobots--which include his Camaro--to save the day.

featureResponse.title: Tron
featureResponse.shortSummary: Computer whiz Jeff Bridges is zapped into a computer, where he must fight for his life in a living video game.
featureResponse.summary: Computer whiz Jeff Bridges is zapped into a computer, where he must fight for his life in a living video game. Bruce Boxleitner, David Warner, Cindy Morgan and Barnard Hughes co-star in this cult 1982 film that featured state-of-the-art special effects for the time.

featureResponse.title: Troop Beverly Hills
featureResponse.shortSummary: Wealthy Beverly Hills matriarch Shelley Long is in for a rude awakening when she decides to lead a troop of Wilderness Girls in this comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Wealthy Beverly Hills matriarch Shelley Long is in for a rude awakening when she decides to lead a troop of Wilderness Girls in this comedy. When a rival tries to shut them down, it's up to the ill-equipped diva and her equally privileged troops to show off their survival skills at the annual Jamboree. Craig T. Nelson, Betty Thomas, Mary Gross and Stephanie Beacham co-star.

featureResponse.title: Tropic Thunder
featureResponse.shortSummary: Ben Stiller directed and stars in this outrageous comedy about an oblivious group of actors who bumble through the jungle during a shoot.
featureResponse.summary: Ben Stiller directed and stars in this outrageous and controversial comedy about an oblivious group of actors who bumble through the jungle on a shoot. Unaware that the film has taken a wrong turn, the thespians--led by fading star Stiller, method madman Robert Downey Jr. and fart specialist Jack Black--dodge real danger while delivering the performances of their lives.

featureResponse.title: The Trouble With Spies
featureResponse.shortSummary: Spyjinks reach an all-time high when bumbling British agent Donald Sutherland tangles with the KGB and gets caught up in a major mess!
featureResponse.summary: Slaphappy spyjinks reach an all-time high when bumbling British agent Donald Sutherland tangles with the KGB and gets caught in the middle of a Mediterranean mess! Sutherland thinks he's tracking a missing operative, but he's unwittingly on the trail of a Soviet truth serum. A local lovely, a wacky widow and a triple-twist climax add to the fun.

featureResponse.title: Trouble With the Curve
featureResponse.shortSummary: Ornery baseball scout Clint Eastwood finds his once-great career suddenly undermined by age and modern thinking.
featureResponse.summary: Clint Eastwood delivers a 'vastly entertaining' (Variety) performance as a once-great baseball scout who finds his career suddenly undermined by age and modern thinking. With his eyesight faltering, ornery Gus Lobel (Eastwood) is forced to lean on his sharp, but sensitive daughter (Amy Adams) as he tries to make one final mark on the game he loves. Justin Timberlake co-stars.

featureResponse.title: True Story
featureResponse.shortSummary: A reporter develops an unlikely--and possibly dangerous--relationship with a murder suspect who used his identity while on the run.
featureResponse.summary: A disgraced reporter develops an unlikely--and possibly dangerous--relationship with a murder suspect who used his identity while on the run in this drama. Jonah Hill stars as former NY Times reporter Michael Finkel whose discovery of his strange connection to Christian Longo (James Franco)--on trial for the murder of his family--prompts him to seek out the accused killer.

featureResponse.title: Tsunami, The Aftermath Part 1
featureResponse.shortSummary: Part 1 of 2. HBO Films' miniseries event that focuses on the aftermath of the tsunami that devastated the coast of Thailand in late 2004.
featureResponse.summary: Part 1 of 2. HBO Films in association with BBC presents this two-part miniseries event that focuses on the aftermath of the tsunami that devastated the coast of Thailand on December 26, 2004. This gripping tale of loss, survival and hope follows a group of fictional characters whose lives are irrevocably transformed by the cataclysmic destruction.

featureResponse.title: Tsunami, The Aftermath Part 2
featureResponse.shortSummary: Part 2 of 2. HBO Films' miniseries event that focuses on the aftermath of the tsunami that devastated the coast of Thailand in late 2004.
featureResponse.summary: Part 2 of 2. HBO Films in association with BBC presents this two-part miniseries event that focuses on the aftermath of the tsunami that devastated the coast of Thailand on December 26, 2004. This gripping tale of loss, survival and hope follows a group of fictional characters whose lives are irrevocably transformed by the cataclysmic destruction.

featureResponse.title: Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie
featureResponse.shortSummary: The Power Rangers must defeat the evil witch Divatox to save the world from certain doom in this adventure.
featureResponse.summary: Can the Power Rangers save the world from certain doom? They'll have to defeat the evil space pirate Divatox to do it! It's a battle to end all battles in this fantastic adventure.

featureResponse.title: The Tuskegee Airmen
featureResponse.shortSummary: High-flying drama about the 'fighting 99th'--the first squadron of African American U.S. Army Air Corps combat fighter pilots in WWII.
featureResponse.summary: The 'fighting 99th' was the first squadron of African-American U.S. Army Air Corps combat fighter pilots in WWII. When they began training, few, if any, in the Army wanted them there. They had to prove that they were stronger, tougher, smarter and better fliers than most white pilots...and they did! Laurence Fishburne stars in this high-flying drama.

featureResponse.title: Two Brothers
featureResponse.shortSummary: Twin tiger cubs living a carefree life are separated,, until fate brings them together for a dramatic reunion.
featureResponse.summary: In this “amazing” (Today Show) family film, twin tiger cubs living a carefree life are separated. One is sold off to the circus, while the other becomes the pampered pet of a governor's son, until fate brings them together for a dramatic reunion.

featureResponse.title: Two of a Kind
featureResponse.shortSummary: Direct orders from Heaven pair John Travolta with Olivia Newton-John as the only people capable of saving the human race from extinction.
featureResponse.summary: Direct orders from Heaven pair John Travolta with Olivia Newton-John. As the only people capable of saving the human race from extinction, they must mend their ways and fall in love by a specific deadline. What's the hitch? She's a bank teller and he's a bank robber! Co-starring Oliver Reed, Beatrice Straight, Scatman Crothers and Charles Durning.

featureResponse.title: Tyson
featureResponse.shortSummary: The life of Mike Tyson who rocketed to the top of the boxing world before he was sidetracked by personal demons and bad advice.
featureResponse.summary: His talent took him from a poverty-stricken childhood on the mean streets of Brooklyn to fame--and unimaginable fortune--as the youngest heavyweight champion in boxing history. Mike Tyson was on top of the world until bad advice--and his own personal demons--turned his American dream into an American nightmare. Newcomer Michael Jai White plays Mike Tyson in this riveting film.

featureResponse.title: Unaccompanied Minors
featureResponse.shortSummary: A snowbound airport on Christmas Eve is the setting for hilarity and holiday cheer for a group of stranded young travelers.
featureResponse.summary: A snowbound airport on Christmas Eve is the setting for hilarity for a group of stranded young travelers. Ushered into a basement room for the night and monitored like prisoners, these "unaccompanied minors" band together despite their differences and undertake a series of comic adventures as they outwit their temporary guardians who are led by airport Scrooge Lewis Black.

featureResponse.title: Unfinished Business
featureResponse.shortSummary: Small-business owner Vince Vaughn takes his quest to land a make-or-break client to Europe where things unravel in every way possible.
featureResponse.summary: Small-business owner Vince Vaughn takes his quest to land a make-or-break client to Europe where things unravel in every way possible. Finding the company up against his former boss, Vaughn and his two screwball associates--retiree Tom Wilkinson and naive newby Dave Franco--endure one insane situation after another as they try to land the account.

featureResponse.title: Unfriended
featureResponse.shortSummary: Five teens in an online chat are threatened by an uninvited guest who wants them to admit their part in a girl's suicide a year earlier.
featureResponse.summary: Be careful what you post on social media...not only can it haunt you--it can kill you. In this suspenseful meld of terror and technology, five high-school teens have their group chat hacked by an uninvited guest--who vows revenge unless they reveal the truth about an embarrassing post exactly one year earlier that led to a girl's suicide.

featureResponse.title: Unhitched
featureResponse.shortSummary: A struggling writer's attraction to a bride-to-be prompts his best friend to sabotage the engagement in this romantic comedy.
featureResponse.summary: A struggling writer's trouble coming up with a best man's speech for an old college pal's wedding is complicated when he falls in love with the bride-to-be. Stuart Townsend stars as the klutzy nice guy whose feelings prompt his best friend--a mortal enemy to the groom--to try to sabotage the nuptials. Amy Smart and Seth Green co-star.

featureResponse.title: The Uninvited
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young woman finds herself haunted by nightmarish visions and a venomous stepmother upon her return from an institution.
featureResponse.summary: A young woman finds herself haunted by nightmarish visions and a venomous stepmother upon her return from an institutional stint in this remake. Anna was put in a psychiatric clinic following her ailing mother's tragic death. Ten months later, she returns to find her mother's former caregiver married to her father--and ghostly apparitions that have something to tell her.

featureResponse.title: Vacation
featureResponse.shortSummary: A new generation of Griswolds undertakes an epically bad car trip to Walley World in this hilarious installment in the 'Vacation' series.
featureResponse.summary: Prepare yourself for a family vacation as only the Griswolds can undertake! Ed Helms stars as Rusty Griswold, Clark's son from the original films, who has now taken on the mantle of Griswold patriarch. With his family life in a rut, Rusty decides to take his clan on their very own journey to Walley World amusement park...a trip that goes epically bad right out of the driveway!

featureResponse.title: Vertical Limit
featureResponse.shortSummary: Chris O'Donnell plays a former mountaineer who scales K2 in an effort to save his snowbound sister in this breathtaking thriller.
featureResponse.summary: Scarred by the tragedy of a previous climb, a former mountaineer must steel himself for a battle against the ultimate challenge--K2 in the Himalayas--in order to save his sister in this fantastic climbing adventure that will have you on the edge of your seat. Chris O'Donnell plays the climber who must reach the ultimate high to help his sibling.

featureResponse.title: Volunteers
featureResponse.shortSummary: Cheerfully self-centered rich kid Tom Hanks heads to back-country Thailand to escape his huge gambling debts in this comedy.
featureResponse.summary: The time is the 1960s. Peace Corps volunteers spread American goodwill--and the secrets of sanitation--all over the world. But one cheerfully self-centered rich kid (Tom Hanks) has come to back-country Thailand for another reason: to escape his huge gambling debts. 'Newsweek' magazine called this 1985 comedy 'One of the year's funniest.'

featureResponse.title: Wagons East!
featureResponse.shortSummary: John Candy leads a pack of screwball Wild West settlers back east in this western spoof.
featureResponse.summary: When the Wild West proves too wild for a group of screwball settlers, they set a course back East that proves far more dangerous--and comical--than expected. Starring John Candy in his final film along with Richard Lewis, Ellen Greene, John C. McGinley, Robert Picardo and Rodney A. Grant.

featureResponse.title: Waitress
featureResponse.shortSummary: Late filmmaker Adrienne Shelly's funny, poignant tale of a small-town waitress caught in the middle of some big-time problems.
featureResponse.summary: Adrienne Shelly's final film is a funny, poignant tale of a small-town waitress caught up in big-time problems. Jenna (Keri Russell) mans the tables and bakes tasty desserts for Joe's Pie Shop, but at home she's a possession of her loathsome husband. Her plan to run away stymied by an unexpected pregnancy, Jenna soon has bigger issues when she drifts into an unexpected affair.

featureResponse.title: Walkout
featureResponse.shortSummary: The stirring true story of Chicano students who staged a walkout to protest injustices in the high-school system in 1968 Los Angeles.
featureResponse.summary: This HBO Films production details the stirring true story of a group of Mexican American students who staged a compelling 1968 walkout to protest the injustices of the public high-school system in East L.A. Alexa Vega stars as an idealistic honors student whose desire to fight the system's blatant discrimination leads her to coordinate a multi-school walkout of students.

featureResponse.title: A Walk Among the Tombstones
featureResponse.shortSummary: An unlicensed private eye hunts a pair of vicious kidnappers who are targeting drug dealers' families.
featureResponse.summary: An unlicensed private eye takes on the case of a heroin dealer's wife who was kidnapped and brutally murdered by a pair of vicious psychos who are targeting drug dealers' families.

featureResponse.title: Warm Springs
featureResponse.shortSummary: The stirring true story of Franklin Delano Roosevelt's battle with polio in 1921.
featureResponse.summary: As U.S. president, he led America through the Depression and World War II. But the toughest challenge Franklin Roosevelt ever faced was one the country never saw. Kenneth Branagh stars in this true story of Roosevelt's battle after being left a paraplegic by polio. Cynthia Nixon plays his dedicated wife Eleanor, who took up the mantle of the public FDR while he sought a cure.

featureResponse.title: The Water Diviner
featureResponse.shortSummary: An Australian farmer travels to Turkey to search for his three sons, who all went missing during the bloody Battle of Gallipoli in 1919.
featureResponse.summary: Russell Crowe makes his feature-film directorial debut with this “heart-warming tale of family, love and sacrifice” (Screen International). Crowe stars as an Australian farmer who travels to Turkey to search for his three sons, who all went missing during the bloody Battle of Gallipoli in 1919.

featureResponse.title: Wes Craven Presents Wishmaster
featureResponse.shortSummary: A diabolical Djinn grants wishes to the greedy with a terrible twist in this shocking horror film.
featureResponse.summary: Be careful what you wish for when you meet the Djinn, a diabolical 'genie' who is accidentally freed from captivity. Offering the greedy their dreams come true and more, the Djinn grants their wishes...with a sinister spin. Tammy Lauren stars as a young woman desperate to stop the malevolent being before he permanently gains human form.

featureResponse.title: We Are Marshall
featureResponse.shortSummary: Matthew McConaughey stars as a young coach who attempts to rebuild the Marshall University football team after a devastating tragedy.
featureResponse.summary: On November 14, 1970, a jet carrying 75 members of Marshall University's football team, staff and fans crashed. There were no survivors. But from the ashes of the tragedy rose hope. Led by new head coach Jack Lengyel (a stellar Matthew McConaughey), the team was rebuilt from those who were left behind--and slowly resurrected the small college town after its devastating loss.

featureResponse.title: We Are Your Friends
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young DJ trying to make it big in Hollywood falls for his mentor's girlfriend.
featureResponse.summary: A young San Fernando Valley DJ trying to make it big in Hollywood is helped out by a famous L.A. DJ., but conflicts arise when the cocky upstart falls for his mentor's girlfriend.

featureResponse.title: What Happens in Vegas
featureResponse.shortSummary: A wild night in Vegas leads to an ill-fated marriage for New York singles Cameron Diaz and Ashton Kutcher in this riotous romantic comedy.
featureResponse.summary: A wild night in Vegas leads to an ill-fated marriage for two New Yorkers in this riotous romantic comedy. Cameron Diaz and Ashton Kutcher are the spontaneous screwballs whose drunken night leaves them in need of a divorce. But when he wins $3 million on the slots, the newlyweds face off in court where a judge orders them to stay married for six months to settle their issues!

featureResponse.title: What to Watch: May 2016
featureResponse.shortSummary: Check out some of the exciting programming coming to HBO in May 2016...and beyond.
featureResponse.summary: Check out some of the exciting programming coming to HBO in May 2016...and beyond.

featureResponse.shortTitle: What We Do in the Shadows
featureResponse.title: What We Do in the Shadows
featureResponse.shortSummary: Mockumentary chronicling the comic misadventures of four vampire roommates in present-day Wellington, New Zealand.
featureResponse.summary: Jemaine Clement and Taika Waititi ("Flight of the Conchords") wrote, directed and star in this mockumentary that explores the comic misadventures of four vampire roommates who reveal the hilarious details of their nocturnal life in present-day Wellington, New Zealand.

featureResponse.title: When Trumpets Fade
featureResponse.shortSummary: An American soldier becomes caught up in the desperate struggle to survive during the bloodiest battle of WWII.
featureResponse.summary: In the winter of 1944, the bloodiest battle of WWII was fought in the Hurtgen forest near the German border. Ron Eldard ('Sleepers') heads a cast of extraordinary young actors in the story of one American soldier caught in the violence whose desperate struggle to survive brings into sharp relief the meaning of bravery and morality during war.

featureResponse.title: Whitewash
featureResponse.shortSummary: This unique family special, based on a true story, uses animation to tell the story of a little black girl's encounter with racism.
featureResponse.summary: This family special, based on a true story, uses animation to tell the story of a little black girl's encounter with mindless racism. On their way home from school, Helene and her brother are attacked by a group of white thugs who beat him up and spray-paint her face white. Why would anyone do this? With her wise grandmother's help, Helene is able to get over her hurt.

featureResponse.title: White Fang
featureResponse.shortSummary: Ethan Hawke is a naive prospector on a harrowing trek for gold in the Alaskan wilderness in this film based on the novel by Jack London.
featureResponse.summary: From Jack London's classic novel comes this searing film with Ethan Hawke as a naive prospector on a harrowing trek for gold in the Alaskan wilderness. Saved from a bear by a half-wolf, half-dog named White Fang, Hawke must try to return the favor when he discovers the animal being held captive and trained for fighting by a greedy villain.

featureResponse.title: The Wicker Man
featureResponse.shortSummary: A missing-child case draws a cop to a remote island community whose surly inhabitants are up to no good in this eerie remake.
featureResponse.summary: A missing child draws a cop to a remote island community in this eerie remake. Nicolas Cage is the troubled patrolman who answers the call for help from his ex-fiancee--now a member of a cult--whose daughter is missing. As the lawman digs deeper into the group, he begins to fear the girl is about to be set up as a sacrifice. Can he find her before she meets the Wicker Man?

featureResponse.title: Wild Wild West
featureResponse.shortSummary: Two screwball federal agents face their arch-nemesis in this post-Civil War spoof based on the cult 1960s TV series.
featureResponse.summary: Saddle up for this energetic western romp from the director of 'Men in Black.' Based on the cult 1960s TV series, this post-Civil War spoof focuses on screwball federal agents James T. West (Will Smith) and Artemus Gordon (Kevin Kline) as they face their arch-nemesis Dr. Arliss Loveless (Kenneth Branagh)--a wheelchair-bound psychopath who plans to take over the country!

featureResponse.title: Wimbledon
featureResponse.shortSummary: A rising American tennis star falls for a British contender on the downside of his career.
featureResponse.summary: From the makers of "Bridget Jones's Diary" and "Notting Hill" comes this "sexy love match" (US Weekly) about a rising American tennis star who falls for a British contender on the downside of his career, while competing in the prestigious Wimbledon tournament in London.

featureResponse.title: Wishmaster 2: Evil Never Dies
featureResponse.shortSummary: The evil Djinn genie returns to grant wishes--and steal men's souls so he can inherit the Earth--in this terrifying horror sequel.
featureResponse.summary: Be careful what you wish for--you might die having it granted! The evil Djinn genie returns in this sequel. After a shoot-out in an art museum frees the genie, he changes into the human form and gets sent to jail. Needing souls so he can inherit the Earth, the Djinn starts granting wishes to inmates--and then stealing their souls. It's up to a convict and her ex to stop him.

featureResponse.shortTitle: Wishmaster 3: Beyond the Gates of Hell
featureResponse.title: Wishmaster 3: Beyond the Gates of Hell
featureResponse.shortSummary: The diabolical Djinn schemes to bring hell on Earth after being awoken by an innocent co-ed.
featureResponse.summary: The evil Djinn returns--granting more wishes with a sadistic twist! Accidentally awoken by an innocent co-ed, the diabolical Djinn schemes to bring hell on Earth...while tormenting his many greedy victims along the way.

featureResponse.title: Wishmaster 4: The Prophecy Fulfilled
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young woman unleashes the diabolical Djinn once again in this adventure that finds the evil wish-giver plotting to take over Earth.
